posts.Title: ADIDAS POLE VAULT @ HERALD SQUARE….JENN SUHR 15' 6"…MEGAN CLARK… 14' 6" !!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC POLE VAULT MANIA HITS THE BIG APPLE !!!! ******************************************************* Jenn Suhr pole vaults in NYC's Herald Square History was made today at Herald Square in the Heart of New York City….. with the Adidas Grand Prix Pole Vault Gala…featuring champions galore!!! The packed venue was filled with vault nuts…lunch time business spectators and full time music blasting the enthusiastic crowd. IT WAS POLE VAULT…CENTER STAGE !!!!! Olympic Vault Champion…JENN SUHR put on a show…with her 15' 6" winning jump into a strong headwind all day….. and USA National Junior Champion…Megan Clark (Duke University-Sophomore) flew high over 14' 6" for third place in this stellar International field… Megan had one close jump at 15' 0" and the crowd enjoyed her spirit…. CONGRATULATIONS TO ALL on PROMOTING POLE VAULT SPIRIT.

posts.Title: Jenn Suhr pole vaults in NYC's Herald Square
POLE VAULT BLAST @ NATIONALS !!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC
The Pole Vault Development Project
Warwick Valley,NY

  FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vaulters  carried their family…friends…team -mates    and  'vault - spirit'  to the New Balance Nationals this past weekend in Greensboro,NC and enjoyed  the best competition of the year  and huge performances.  CONGRATULATIONS to all vaulters for a truly SUPER OUTDOOR SEASON -on-FIBERGLASS!!!! 
      ….. Now…time for a short rest… then summer  camps…summer technique sessions…and  SEASIDE HEIGHTS  BEACH VAULT….August 1-3!!!!!

   PERFORMANCES….. Emerging Elite Girls..  Senior Jenna Calandro(Newtown,CT) put on a show on Friday  with her 4th place vault of 11' 11.75"…and then her pole broke  and put a fault to her big day…..the Bucknell University bound Calandro finished a sensational  High School Vault career!!!
  Also jumping uper was Kara Snyder(Colonie,NY) with her 11' 5.75  air-strike  and very strong jumps  at 11' 11..Kara finishes a stellar  career and is ready for  her Villanova Track Family.  Monroe-Woodbury,NY team mates  Catherine Walker   and Samantha Beyar were a powerful duo this spring and both cleared 11' 5.75"  and return for the Crusaders next year…. Junior Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John,NJ) placed All-American in her 5th place in the Championship Shuttle Hurdles with her 15' 2 split  and then flew huge over 11'0" on her brand new poles….Kalli Manly(Burnt Hills,NY)  had a nice bounce back from the state meet and moves to  her longer poles  this summer!!!!

  Emerging Elite Boys…..Pole Vault justice  came to "never-give-up" Patrick Lynch of Cranford,NJ!!!!   Battling back from illness that kept him out of State Finals…this Notre Dame bound super star taught us  about…"Staying-the-course" in athletics  and life…with his BIG 14' 8.5" leap of faith and near bar at 15' 2.5"!!! Our underclassmen…juniors Sam Siegel(NV-Demerast)  and Chris Rough(Westhill,CT) competed hard  and gained National experience this weekend!!!  Zach Lieberman  flew 14' 2" easily.

  Girls Championship Pole Vault….Maddie Schneider(Darien,CT)…just a junior on that BLUE WAVE STATE CHAMPIONSHIP TEAM  of Steve Norris's…had her best meet with  her 11th place at Nationals  and a Big Air miss at a seasonal best of 12' 3.75  on her biggest grip  and poles of the year.  Maddie will be hitting 3 summer camps(Flying Circus…William& Mary….and Duke Camps) for this scholar athlete before she  finishes at Seaside Heights Beach Vault….Junior Samantha Beyar(MW)  jumped 12' 2.5" this year at FAST TIMES  and is ready for her West Coast Pole Vault Camp in July…placed 13th in Nation at 11' 5.75" for Purple Pride!!  Kari Stromhaug(Vestal,NY) soared 11' 5.5" on her longer poles  and heads to Norway this summer for her federation championships  and hospital work in South Africa!!!!

  Boys Championship Pole Vault…… Todd Uckermark(Warwick Valley,NY) finished a story book pole vault career that was  one of the most consistent ever for our event… winning Indoor and Outdoor Public Vault titles… and soaring 16' 9"(indoor)  and 16' 3"(outdoor) school and sectional records    and then jumping over 16 feet in 10 separate meets is unmatched  by any NY State vaulter…ever!!  Todd heads to High Point University next fall to study communications!!! Luke Annichiarico(Old Tappan.NJ) was unbelievable this year at 15' 6"  and place 10th   and heads to Wake Forset University next fall… Derek DiBona(Warwick Valley,NY) will return  for his senior season with a personal best of 16' 1" this year for Purple Wave State Champions … and Travis Fountain(MW,NY)  blasted his 15' 7" school record and heads to Binghamton University Vault Machine…headed by Coach Mike Thompson!!!!  Our "16 Foot Superman "NJ State Champ  Andy Ghizzone(Union Catholic)  had and MVP weekend in 5 events at Nationals… with All American coming in  3 relays…14.2 hurdle split  along with his 14' 8.5"  vault into wind on Sunday. Andy will be attending Colorado University next fall on scholarship for this multi event star… 4: 20 mile…1:54.5/800m….14.2 Hurdles… 22.2/200m…. 48.5/400m….   54.6/400 hurdles…. 16 foot pole vault !!!!!  Watch out BIG 12 CONFERENCE!!!

  Decathlon Pole Vault…..Pope John,NJ senior Tim Schanstra became an ALL AMERICAN agin this year at NATIONALS… This  well rounded athlete…heading to  PENN UNIVERSITY next fall… flew to 13' 3.5" personal best vault for Coach Corcoran….Dylan Altland hit 14' 7.5" in Decca and heads to Rutgers…Will Ackerman(HVFC) vaulted 11' 3.5" !!!

  SIMONET SOARS @ Icahn Stadium ….. Flying Circus  Pole Vault Coach Ben Simonet found the right pole this week  and took over the Northeast Masters lead  with his 14' 3.25  gold medal jump at NY Open/Masters meet at Icahn….. Jame s Schuler(HVFC) won his division at 13' 7"… Bill Crouse won the 50-54 Division at 10' 4"   and Carlton Huff(ShoreAC) won the 60-64 Division at 10' 4"  !!!

   Other Great Performances were turned in by HV Flying Circus stars on the track…as sophomore Julia Valenti(North Reading,MASS) multi-event/pole vaulter  sizzled to  her 100m hurdle seasonal best at 15.8…for the 2 time state pole vaulter Group champion at 11' 0"this  spring….  and congratulations to HVFC pole vaulter  Dominque Beltrez(Cortland Manor,NY)…competing in the Heptathlon Championship..this powerful junior… leaped 17' 10.5" in her Long Jump   and then raced to 14' 70 in her 100m Hurdles for personal bests!!!!! She returns to pole vault next fall @ Circus!!!

  New England Championships…. Congratulations to senior Rachel Moroknek(Ridgefield,CT) for  placing 4th with a school record 11' 3" vault…Jane Wall(Weston,CT)  10' 9"  Laurel Bailey(Shelton) 10' 9" PR   Chloe Brown(Gladsburry) 9' 9"  Ali Moroaveck(Masck,CT) 9' 9"  Jess Thornbury(Darien,CY) 9'9"….  CONGRATULATIONS TO ALL VAULTERS!!!

    FLYING CIRCUS MANIA…CONTINUES @ SUMMER CAMPS
    Boys June 30-July 1  4-8PM      Girls  July 203 4-8PM

posts.Title: JR. OLYMPICS WEEKEND …. TODD UCKERMARK 15' 5"…. MADDIE SCHNEIDER 12' 4" !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault ACademy, LLC The Pole Vault Development Project Warwick Valley, NY Welcome to SUMMER AGE-GROUP POLE VAULTING !!!! "Flying Circus Pole Vault"… "NEVER-GIVE-UP" The USATF JR. OLYMPIC AGE GROUP Association Championships were a" CRICUS of FUN " today at Litchfield High School,CT and at the world famous Icahn Stadium at Randalls Island,NY. Under bright sunny skies at Icahn Stadium… Todd Uckermark(Warwick,NY) pushed onto his 15' 7" Spirit poles and soared high over 15' 5" for the gold medal in the Young Mens Division and advances to Regional Championships at Fitchburg State University,MASS next month. Team mate Derek DiBona(Warwick,NY) also enjoyed advancing with his runner-up 15' 0" leap off the fast Blue Mondo runway on his 15' 7" sticks!!! Placing third was Sophomore Andrew Matta(Newburgh,NY) at 12' 0". Both Todd and Derek will be Flying Circus Camp Assistants next week in VAULT-TOWN, USA!!!!! Girls Sweep @ Icahn……Catherine Walker(Monroe,NY) and Samantha Beyar(Monroe,NY) completed the Girls 1-2 Sweep…as both juniors sizzled of 11' 6" and had great bars at 12' 0". Catherine joins Circus Camp and Samantha travels to Anthony Curren's UCLA Pole Vault Camp next week. Circus Vaulter..Dominque Beltez(Cortland Mannor,NY) exploded again in her 100m Hurdle win at 14.55(PR) and her Long Jump gold medal 17' 10.25" in the Young Women's Division. At Litchfield High School's New Track & Field oval…Darien,CT junior Maddie Schneider put up a personal best vault of 12' 4" for the Gold Medal honors. She had 2 close bars at 12' 7" School Outdoor Record!!!! Maddie will jump in our Girls Vault Exhibition at Camp on July 3 AT-THE-BARN!!! Also at Litchfield Open meet last week…James Schuler(HVFC) blasted over 15' 3" for a seasonal best and will help coach at camp next week. " SCHOOL IS OUT …… CAMP is IN " !!!!!!!!! ******************************************** The 8th FLYING CIRCUS SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMP BLAST is about to begin… Many thanks to all pole vaulters and parents for entering our CAMPS next week. We have a SOLD OUT group of "Pole Vault Nuts" that are ready to learn and improve and a super group of Elite Pole Vault Coaches waiting for the chance to work with you. Campers should be dressed and ready for activity…including spikes… light snacks and drinks. Campers should plan to arrive at 3:45pm and pick up is 8pm each day. All pole vaulting poles will be supplied by FLYING CIRCUS. Stay active this week and report to camp in shape. IT's going to be…"ANOTHER VAULT BLAST" !!!! FOR SALE !!!!! ************* 1 UCS SPIRIT VAULTING POLE…(Nearly new) Size 14' 7" x 185 (16.8 Flex) Contact ..coachst@gmail.com "The POWER of SPIRIT" …. FLYING CIRCUS.

posts.Title: CIRCUS SUMMER CAMP ALERT !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC
The Pole Vault Development Project
Warwick, New York
USATF Club # 1129

    READY…. SET…. GO  !!!!
     *************************
      FLYING CIRCUS SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMP IS HERE !!!!
      THANKS to your interest  and  support … Our  8th SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMPS are SOLD OUT  for BOYS AND GIRLS AGAIN !!!!    Here are the final camp instructions:

    BOYS CAMP…. June 30  and July 1   At  The FLYING CIRCUS FACILITY  at  3 Warwick Center Drive  and Hoyt Road.   
    Camp is from 4pm-8pm each day.  Campers should arrive at 3:45 and Pick Up is at  8:00pm. All High School Coaches  come to Camp FREE!!!! We want  to share all drills with you  and we want your feedback… this is a partnership project for elite pole vault development!!!
     Campers should bring  workout gear…training flats…spikes… Drinks  and  small snack…notebook  and a super positive spirit !!!  Campers will receive the 2014  Camp T Shirt  and Pole Vault  Booklet.  Camp  is a RAIN or SHINE  BLAST-on-FIBERGLASS!!!

   GIRLS CAMP…July 2  and July 3  At The FLYING CIRCUS FACILITY. Directions at our web site   www.hvflyingcircus.com  .  HS COACHES COME FREE!!! JOIN US for the latest Drills  and Fun.
  
   Elite Coaching Staff… Elite PV Exhibition on Final Day… Video… Apparatus… 5 Vault Pits…SUPER MUSIC…  Cool Camp Shirts… Great Friendships… Super Atmosphere !!!!

    Instruction will be  pointed  to the  5 Ability Groups.   There are 7 States represented in this years camps…and it promises to be  our BEST EVER!!!!  Registration is  CLOSED.
  
    FLYING CIRCUS…. MORE-THAN-POLE-VAULT.

posts.Title: JENN SUHR WINS USA NATIONALS AGAIN.…MEGAN CLARK ALL-AMERICAN @ 14' 3" !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC
Warwick Valley, New York
"Home of Pole Vault- Mania"
 ********************************

  NEWS FLASH…….
  USA Track & Field National Championships
  Sacramento,CA

   It was familiar faces on the USA Track & Field Podium  in the Women's Pole Vault…as  Olympic Champion…Jenn Suhr won her 15th NATIONAL VAULT  CHAMPIONSHIP with a clean 15' 1" leap for the Gold Medal   on Friday….and close friend  Megan  "Flips" Clark (Duke University) gained her ALL-AMERICAN  honors   with her 6th place jump off win at 14' 3"  for Coach Shawn Wilbourn. There will be much joy at the Duke Pole Vault Camp next week in Durham….
         CONGRATULATIONS JENN  and MEGAN !!!!!
         *************************************************
               FLYING CIRCUS REJOICES 
               **********************************

posts.Title: JO Regionals
posts.Content:
Uckermark and Walker win Junior Olympic Region 1 Meet at Fitchberg State University in Massachusetts on Saturday July 12th

Catherine Walker won the Girl's Competition with a jump of 11' 6"  and Todd Uckermark completed the sweep for the Flying Circus by winning the Boys Competition with a jump of 15' 6".  Both Catherine and Todd qualified for the National Meet in Houston Texas in late July.

Coach Cauthers

posts.Title: BENOIT SIMONET ...... NATIONAL VAULT CHAMPION !!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Development Project Warwick Valley, NYC CONGRATULATIONS to Coach BENOIT SIMONET of THE FLYING CIRCUS for winning the USATF MASTERS POLE VAULT title on Saturday at Wake Forest University. Competing in the USA. 35-39 Age Division. And coached by WILL NESBITT the past 2. Years... Ben soared to 14' 7.25" on. A borrowed 15' x 185 UCS. Spirit and had close. Bars at 15' 1". This. Energetic and talented coach now has won National PoleVault Championships in two countries!!!!! That's right..... 3 Time National Belgium Champion. And now. USA National Champion !!!!!!! NEXT UP.... Seaside Heights Beach Vault Fun Meet. August 1-3 . STAY FIT...... FLYING CIRCUS LIVE @ THE BEACH.

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS OPENS "FALL VAULT SEASON"…SEPTEMBER 5 …JOIN THE THUNDER !!!
posts.Content:
THE HUDSON VALLEY FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT ACADEMY, LLC The Pole Vault Development Project Warwick Valley , NY USATF Club 06-1129

WELCOME VAULTERS... It's time to start your"VAULT ENGINE" again.

We are proud to announce the starting of our 9th CLUB SEASON here at FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT ACADEMY and we look forward to helping you this Fall…Winter….and Spring seasons both at our scenic Warwick Valley Barn facility and at the ever-busy New Balance Track & Field Center at the Armory in New York City.

Our pole vault instruction has expanded in scope, staff, participation, and format. We hope you can join us in our various team clinics, camps, meets, private and semi-private sessions, and our open instructional activities all year long. Let's FLY TOGETHER !!!!!!!

2014-15 FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT

For better instruction we have designed ABILITY GROUPING SESSIONS for the FALL SEASON. This will provide a greater teaching/learning atmosphere for every vaulter in our club and produce greater improvements and performance.

  • LEVEL 1 ABILITY GROUP…. BEGINNING VAULTERS
  • LEVEL 2 ABILITY GROUP…. INTERMEDIATE VAULTERS
  • LEVEL 3 ABILITY GROUP…. ADVANCED VAULTERS (Girls 11' 0" & UP Boys 13'0" & UP)

2014 FALL TRAINING SCHEDULE (September 5 - November 9)

The Flying Circus will be open four days per week for Open Instruction Groups. Cost is still just $30 per vaulter per 90 minute open sessions for the 2014-15 seasons. Athletes pay at the door policy on each day participating. Each athlete must be a current member of USATF to participate in any and all activities.

FALL SEASON BEGINS SEPTEMBER 5th Sundays:
  • 12:30PM-2PM Boys & Girls Co-Ed Open, Levels 1 and 2 Vaulters
  • 2:PM-3:30PM Boys Level 3 Vaulters Only (13' 0" & Up)
  • 3:30PM-5PM Girls Level 3 Vaulters Only (11'0" & Up)
Mondays:
  • 5:30PM-7PM Boys Open … Level 1 and 2 Vaulters
  • 7PM-8:30PM…. Girls Open….. Level 1 and 2 Vaulters
Wenesdays:
  • 5:30PM-7PM Boys Open Mixed, Levels 1, 2, 3 Vaulters
  • 7PM-8:30PM Girls Open Mixed, Levels 1,2,3 Vaulters
Fridays:
  • 5:30PM-7PM Boys, Levels 3 Vaulters Only (13'0" & Up)
  • 7PM-8:30PM. Girls Level 3 Vaulters Only (11' 0" & Up)

2014 FALL & WINTER POLE VAULT RATES

NO PRICE INCREASES ….HOORAY!!!!

OPEN GROUP SESSIONS: $30 per Vaulter per 90 minute session

TEAM CLINIC SESSIONS: $30 per Vaulter per 90 minute session

CIRCUS CLUB MEETS: $20 per Vaulter per meet

SUMMER 2 DAY CAMP: $275 per Vaulter per Camp

PRIVATE INSTRUCTION: 1 ATHLETE $75 per 90 minute session

SEMI-PRIVATE INSTRUCTION

  • 2 ATHLETES ……$50 per athlete per 90 minute session
  • 3 ATHLETES…….$40 per athlete per 90 minute session

WINTER CLUB MEMBERSHIP: $450 per Vaulter for 3 Month Package

  • Begins Nov. 10 thru Feb.10
  • Boys Monday and Wednesdays (90 minute sessions)
  • Girls Tuesday and Thursdays (90 minute sessions)
  • *Winter Club pmited to first 20 Boys and first 20 Girls Registered.
  • Applications available Oct. 1 here at hvflyingcircus.com

2014 INDOOR BARN MEETS

  • Saturday October 18: 5 STEP MEET @ BARN ( Girls @ 10AM Boys @ 2PM)
  • Saturday November 1: 6 STEP MEET @ BARN (Girls @10AM Boys @ 2PM)
  • Saturday November 22: 7 STEP MEET @ BARN (Girls @ 10AM Boys @ 2PM)
  • Saturday December 27: ANDY WASNIK FESTIVAL @ BARN (Girls @ 10AM, Boys @ 3PM, College/Open @ 7PM)

(Complete list of Flying Circus Indoor MEET TOUR will be posted on web site on September15)

SUMMER CIRCUS NEWS

  • Super Vaulting highlighted the 2014 Jersey Shore Beach Vault…as Flying Circus Coach Benoit Simonet soared to Masters Vault Gold Medal at 14' 9" in Mens Open section…Stephanie Duffy placed 3rd in the Elite Women's Vault Final for the Bronze and Cash prize…National Champ Emily Savage placed 3rd from her training 4 Step in College Section….Marissa Robbins looked sharp…Derek DiBona placed 2nd in HS division with his massive 15' 6" launch..Peter Fagan..Whit Oheler-Marx and Chris Rough produced at the Steel Pier again..Seaside Heights!!!!
  • Congratulations to our very own…Jessica Reifer…as she set a NEW AMERICAN AGE GROUP RECORD(40+) in the DECATHLON in Neosh,MD on July 5-6. She won the MASTERS WOMEN's 10 Event title with her 5513 points… bettering the old American Record of 4949 !!!!!
  • Congratulation to Coach MIKE POTTER of the Warwick Valley High School PURPLE WAVEfor his National COACH of the YEAR honors for the 2014 Spring Track season in New York. Coach Potter's team won the NY State Federation Team Title at STATE !!!! Purple Wave Magic lives on!
  • DUFFY & YOUNG WIN JACKSONVILLE STREET VAULTS…. Coach Don Marsh is up to his old pole vault tricks in Florida…the U of South Florida coaching guru produced the winners in Jacksonville Street Vault on August 16…with Stephanie soaring 12' 6" for gold…and team mate Sean Young lifting BIG OVER 17' 3" for the BUCS SUPERMAN on FIBERGLASS…Congrats!!!

Keep your eye on our web site…designed by Connor Mulcahey(Weston,CT)…New Music and BUBKA Video !!!!!

FLYING CIRCUS…… See you all soon !!!!

posts.Title: "FLYIN' CIRCUS" ….JOIN-OUR-VAULT TEAM !!!
posts.Content:
CIRCLE the DATES ... JOIN OUR VAULT TEAM !!!!!

...The Train is a coming... Greetings from your FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT ACADEMY !!!! We are about to open the BARN Vault doors for the 2014-15 season … as we invite you and your friends to…"RIDE-the-FIBERGLASS" with us in our Fall in scenic Warwick Valley, New York.Our 9th edition of Pole Vault Development is loaded again with up-and-coming young vaulters and seasoned veterans… ready to emerge onto the Pole Vault stage. Check the training schedules….circle the dates and take your ' Vault Spirit' to the next level of performance. See you all soon. Congratulations and thanks go out to our Web-Master Connor Mulcahey (Weston,CT) for up grading our web site design to include 5 GREAT MUSIC VIDEO's that send positive and inspiring messages to all that connect to our club site. Each Sub Link now has music… check it all out ASAP!!!! Music moves the world.

2014 FALL MEETS

Sat. Oct. 18 5 STEP MEET @ BARN Girls 10AM Boys 2PM $20 Entry Sat. Nov. 1 6 STEP MEET @ BARN Girls 10AM Boys 2PM $20 Entry Sat. Nov. 22 7 STEP MEET @ BARN Girls 10AM Boys 2PM $20 Entry

FALL OPEN INSTRUCTIONAL DAYS

We have moved to ABILITY GROUP INSTRUCTION this Fall..Sessions begin on Friday Sept. 5 for Level 3 Vaulters… Check Complete Schedule for our Mon-Wed-Fri-Sunday Ability Group Classes. The 90 minute sessions are still only $30 per athlete per session. LEVEL 1 ABILITY GROUP……. BEGINNER VAULTERS LEVEL 2 ABILITY GROUP……. INTERMEDIATE VAULTERS LEVEL 3 ABILITY GROUP……. ADVANCED VAULTERS (Girls 11'0"& Up / Boys 13' 0"& Up)

2014-15 COMPLETE MEET SCHEDULE (Winter-Spring-Summer)

Our Winter-Spring and Summer FLYING CIRCUS TOUR of meets is posted. We want you to join us in as many of these meets that your High School Coach deems possible. FOLLOW THE FLYING CIRCUS BUS for some of the very BEST MEETS in the COUNTRY!!! We are thrilled to announce that Coach Will Nesbitt will be taking on more Flying Circus Coaching responsibilities at the Barn this Fall. This is a BIG PLUS for all our club vaulters. Coach Ben Simonet (USA NATIONAL MASTERS OUTDOOR CHAMPION) will again lead our Coaching at the Armory this indoor season.

SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMP DATES SET !!!!

JOIN the FUN with us this summer…at our 2 Day Vault Camps … Our Summer Pole Vault camps have SOLD OUT the last 8 years…Forms available Oct.1 here under the Forms page. Cost is just $275 per vaulter. Great Coaching Staff… 5 Pits….T-Shirt…PV Drills Packet…Fun. BOYS 2 Day Summer Camp… Monday and Tuesday July 13-14 Rain or Shine at Flying Circus Headquarters, Warwick, NY Girls 2-Day Summer Camp…Thursday and Friday July16-17 Rain or Shine at Flying Circus Headquarters,Warwick,NY FLYING CIRCUS... UNITED WE VAULT!

We are building a strong foundation for the Indoor and Outdoor Vault seasons , with our New Drills and Short Run Technique Vaulting…. check our schedule for your ability group instruction at www.hvflyingcircus.com and hope to see you soon. * SUCCESS TRAITS * *********************** * STAY POSITIVE….. * ENCOURAGE your TEAM MATES… * BE FAITHFUL TO YOURSELF…. * IF IT IS TO BE..THEN IT'S UP TO ME. * EVERYONE COUNTS. * "SPIRITED EFFORTS"…The Key to High School Athletics. * SHOW CHARACTER in all situations. * REFOCUS your Desire…. Fullfill your PROMISE. * BECOME YOUR OWN HERO. * "BELIEVE YOU CAN ACHIEVE" * GIVE ALL THE CREDIT TO YOU PARENTS. * Our First FALL INDOOR MEET…Saturday October 18, 2014 @ BARN…. Girls at 10:00AM…Boys at 2PM… ALL LEVELS..(Middle School,High School.Open,Masters) Enter at the Door..$20 each athlete. * FLYING CIRCUS @ ATLANTIC CITY COACHES CLINIC…Friday December 5, 2014. posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS…."LET the SHOW BEGIN"… WINTER CLUB  SIGN UP ..WED. OCT. 1 !!!!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy,LLC The Pole Vault Development Project Warwick Valley, New York USATF Club # 1129 GET READY to secure your WINTER CLUB MEMBERSHIP @ FLYING CIRCUS !!! Our Pole Vault Club has exploded in numbers the past 5 years and we look forward to coaching you this winter season(Nov. 10 - Feb.10) in our Club Membership sessions. These sessions consist of 2 Vault days per week for each full member for the 3 month instructional vault package. This program is our most economicial instructional package… We only take the first 20 Girls and first 20 Boys who register by mail with full payment ($450 per athlete) . We sell out these spots VERY FAST… so your must act immediately if you are serious about joining us this Winter in these Monday-Tuesday-Wednesday-Thursday Vault Sessions. The Boys 2 Day Day InstructionalInstructional Vault Package are on Monday and Wednesday evenings and the Girls 2 Day Instructional Package are Tuesday and Thursday evenings. The only Open Vault Days for all other vaulters not in the Winter Club Package are on Sunday afternoons 12:30- 5:30pm. The Cost of this Winter Club Membership is $450 per vaulter for the 3 months. There are no make up days for missed classes. We hope you can join us again this Winter at the VAULT BARN. Registration forms posted on our web site on Wednesday Oct. 1… Down load IMMEDIATELY and Include Full payment and mail it FAST to : HV FLYING CIRCUS…176 North Church Street…Goshen,New York 10924 All athletes should indicate desired session time….Session 1 5:30-7pm Session 2 7-8:30pm When sessions close..athletes will be added to the other section. ********************************************************************************************** * Check out this photo of a perfect on time PLANT and DRIVE PHASE by American Record Holder Jeff Hartwig. DYNAMIC DRIVE with CHEST and lead KNEE!!! * Special THANKS to our WebMaster ..Connor Mulcahey(Weston,CT) for posting up our NEW VIDEO VAULT TECHNIQUE SECTION on web-page (Video supplied by Masters Bill Crouse) and creating our NEW FACEBOOK PAGE SECTION for greater reach… * Our first FALL BARN MEET is coming on us fast… 5 STEP MEET ..Saturday Oct. 18 Girls at 10AM Boys at 2PM… MARK YOUR CALENDAR!!!! * Athletes wishing to purchase the famous FLYING CIRCUS NIKE MEET SINGLET ..($50 each/ Nike Dri-Fit) must e-mail Adult Sizes to coachst@gmail.com by October 18th.. Order goes in the next day to Nike!!! FLYING CIRCUS….. MORE-THAN-POLE VAULTING.

posts.Title: "TRADITION & DREAMS" ………FLYING CIRCUS
posts.Content:
We must never under-estimate the POWER of TRADITION & DREAMS !!!

Here at FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT…we realize the TRADITION of all past Vault Champions on both the Boys and Girls Pole Vault programs . 97 STATE VAULT CHAMPIONS…. 4 NATIONAL VAULT CHAMPIONS… 737 Young Circus Aspiring Vaulters since 2005 !!!! The tradition runs deep and the DREAMS of each vaulter is INSPIRING. With each new vaulter joining our club, there comes a new and spirited mission to measure up to the very best within us. This is the real prize in athletic participation. CONGRATULATIONS to all vaulters and families. It's time to SOAR!!!

WINNERS

Some athletes set HIGHER STANDARDS for themselves. They come out early and stay late. They always find the time to do things right. Funny…how they're usually the winners. At FLYING CIRCUS WE SET HIGHER STANDARDS. And our athletes put in that EXTRA EFFORT. BE A WINNER WORK HARD Set a GOAL for yourself …STICK TOGETHER. Be POSITIVE, Be filled with "COMPETITIVE SPIRIT," DEMONSTRATE HIGH SPORTSMANSHIP, IMPROVE each day, ENCOURAGE A TEAM MATE, BELIEVE in YOURSELF, SHOW RESPECT, EARN your SPOT, NEVER GIVE UP, and HAVE FUN.

Club News

  • Exciting 5 Stap Meet coming around the corner…Saturday Oct. 18 AT VAULT BARN !!! Girls at 10AM Boys at 2PM Real Bar in Place… Come EARLY…STAY LATE $20 /athlete!!!
  • WINTER CLUB MEMBERSHIP filling up super FAST… Get registration in if you are serious about the 3 month package(Nov 10-Feb10). Application on Web Site.
  • GREAT VAULT Video's on our Web Page…Check out the Slow-Motion Vault study.
  • INDOOR TRACK SEASON will be a BLAST on FIBERGLASS… Only 60 DAYS LEFT TO TRAIN… a missed day of training can never be made up…..ARE YOU MOTIVATED TODAY!!!
FLYING CIRCUS…. TAP INTO THE POWER of DREAMS

posts.Title: "SUPER-SUNDAY'S" @ FLYING CIRCUS !!!!!!
posts.Content:
It has been SUPER-SUNDAY'S at The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy this Fall season in scenic Warwick Valley,NY. We would like to thank all our young vaulters for making our Open Sunday Pole Vault sessions a productive huge success. Vaulters travel from far-a-way places to take part in our "SUPER-SUNDAY'S"…and the spirit is contagious. Because of the large number of vaulters joining the instruction each Sunday this Fall-Winter-Spring seasons…we have made a small adjustment to our schedule for SUPER-SUNDAYS for the next 9 months…

NEW SESSION FORMAT for "SUPER-SUNDAY'S" @ FLYING CIRCUS

Begins Sunday October 19.Many thanks for all your support! Session #1 12:30PM-2PM GIRLS ONLY LEVEL 1 and LEVEL 2 Vaulters..(Beginner & Intermediate Level Vaulters ) Session #2 2PM- 3:30PM BOYS ONLY LEVEL 1 and LEVEL 2 Vaulters..( Beginner & Intermediate Level Vaulters) Session #3 3:30PM-5PM BOYS & GIRLS LEVEL 3 Vaulters(Advanced Vaulters) Boys 13'0" and Up/Girls 11' 0" and Up JOIN the SUPER-SUNDAY'S FUN and FRIENDSHIP !!!!

FLYING CIRCUS 5 STEP MEET KICKS OFF this Saturday, October 18

It's time to get the dust off and see the technical models from 5 Step Approach. Join the ALL LEVELS of ABILITY FUN COMPETITION DAY with us on Saturday October 18 at the VAULT BARN!!! The action kicks off in the morning with the Girls MS/HS and Open Competition at 10:00AM Sharp…the Boys MS/HS/Open/Masters competition starts at 2:00PM…. Barn Doors open at 9AM for the Girls Warm Up.. Still just $20 to enter the meet AT-THE-DOOR!!!! 9:00AM…Barn Doors Open..Registration /Warm Up 10:00AM…Girls Fun Meet..MS/HS/OPEN/MASTERS 2:00PM.. Boys Warm Up /Registration 3:00PM.. Boys Fun Meet…MS/HS/OPEN/MASTERS

WINTER CLUB VAULT PACKAGE….(Nov. 10-Feb 10)

Only 5 spots left for both the Boys and Girls to enter… ACT NOW to AVOIOD the WAITING LIST!!! ** WORK HARD …. STAY HUMBLE. ** EVERYDAY is a TRAINING DAY. ** SPORTSMANSHIP TRUMPS PERFORMANCE. FLYING CIRCUS…… THE POLE VAULT FACTORY.

posts.Title: CIRCUS 5-STEP THRILLER"..…DiBONA (14' 7")..…SCHNEIDER (12'1") LEAD-THE-WAY !!!!
posts.Content: The Pre-Season Technique Meets have begun @ FLYING CIRCUS!!!! CONGRATULATIONS to ALL 48 MOTIVATED VAULTERS taking part in this weekends FLYING CIRCUS 5 STEP MEET at the Warwick Valley Headquarters VAULT BARN. The Spirit..Friendship…and Fiberglass "Flying" was a treat for all parents… friends and coaches and we now have the 'Fall Ball Rolling'…… The results were AWESOME and it's going to be another sensational year AT-THE-CIRCUS!!!!! Thank you all for your support. BOYS/MEN.. HIGHLIGHTS … Warwick Valley,NY senior Derek DiBona lead the charge with his 14' 7" clear from 5 Step on his 15' 1" UCS Spirits. He had BIG AIR at 15'1" while holding 14' 8" grip!!!!! Three others cleared 14'1"…Ryan Herrera-Murphy(IP)…Chris Rough(Westhill,CT) and Sam Seigel(Demarest,NJ). Luis Escarret(Ridgefield Park,NJ) won the Open at 13' 7" Colby Quackenbush(Warwick,NY) won the Middle School Division and John Patterson(Doyletown,PA) won the Masters at 11' 1". Perhaps the BIGGEST THRILL of the Meet was the 73 Year Old Long Island Master..John "Doc" Andresen(Aquebogue,NY) who leaped 9' 7" and near missed at 10' 1" (World Record is 10' 8" in his Age Group !!!!) GIRLS HIGHLIGHTS…. Darien,CT senior Maddie Schneider, last years Outdoor State Vault Champ.. soared to a Short Run vault of 12' 1" to lead the 20 Girls competition. Using her 13'1" x 145 UCS Spirit from 5 Steps..near misses next bar at 12' 5"!!!! Seniors Samantha Beyar(Monroe,NY) and Katlyn Rymarzow(Sparta,NJ) both lifted over 11' 3" easily!!! Seventh Grader Molly Palma(Bronxville,NY) competed in her fist ever meet and won gold at 7' 7" !!! Complete Results: 5 Step Meet @ Circus High School Division: 14' 7" Derek DiBona(Warwick,NY) 14' 1" Ryan Herrera-Murphy(Iona,NY) 14' 1" Chris Rough(Westhill,CT) 14' 1" Sam Seigel(Demarest,NJ) 13' 7" Matt Fay(Iona.,NY) 13' 7" Ivan Mieses(Middletown,NY) 13' 3" James Ball(Fordham,NY) 13' 1" Ike Osbun(Montclaire,NJ) 13' 1" Adam Dillion(Holbrook,NY) 12' 7" Brandon Nebiker(Monroe,NY) 12' 7" Dylan Scribani(New Paltz,NY) 12' 7" Chris Elliot(White Plains,NY) 12' 7" Martin Desmery(New Paltz,NY) 12' 1" Nick Marino(Hatsboro,PA) 12' 1" Caleb Duffany(Demarest,NJ) 11' 7" Ian Allen(Chatham.NY) 11' 1" Brian Rubenstein(Berkley Heights,NJ) 9' 7" Kyle Pfister(Park Ridge,NJ) 9' 1" Benard Lincoln(NYC,NY) 8' 7" Henry Spangler(New Canaan,CT) Middle School Division: 7' 1" Colby Quackenbush(Warwick.NY) Open Division: 13' 7" Luis Escarret(Ridgefield Park,NJ) 13' 7" Mike Thorne(Lebanon Valley,PA) 12' 7" Dan Matson(Stanford,CT) Mens Masters Division: 11' 1" John Petterson(Doylestown.PA) (53 Years) 10' 1" Bill Crouse(Columbus,NJ) (50+ years) 9' 7" Dave Petterson(Red Hook.NY) (40+ Years) 9' 7" John "Doc" Andresen(Aquebogue,NY) (73 Years !!!!!!) GIRLS High School Division: 12' 1" Maddie Schneider(Darien,CT) 11' 3" Samantha Beyar(Monroe,NY) 11' 3" Katlyn Rymarzow(Sparta,NJ) 11' 1" Tedi DeMaria (Bethlehem,NY) 11' 1" Emily Taylor(John Glenn,NY) 10' 7" Kerstyn Civlle(Sachem,NY) 10' 7" Kalli Manly(Burnt Hills,NY) 10' 1" Jordan Messinco(Sachem.NY) 10' 1" Leah Saifi(Berkley Heights,NJ) 9' 7" Vivian Mroz(Bronxville,NY) 9' 7" Sophia Alter(Rondout Valley,NY) 8' 7" Izzi Mroz(Bronxville,NY) 8' 1" Danielle Cass(Weston,CT) 8' 1" Kerry Quafter(New City,NY) 8' 1" Maurin O'Connor(Chatham,NY) 7' 7" Allison Stern(New City,NY) 6' 7" Gabriella Lepe(White Plains,NY) Middle School Division: 7' 7" Molly Palma(Bronxville,NY) 6' 7" Celia Bernard(Los Angles, CALF) CONGRATULATIONS TO ALL VAULTERS ************************************************** NEXT BARN MEET… 6 STEP MEET..SATURDAY NOV. 1 Girls Meet 10AM Boys Meet 3PM … JOIN THE FUN!! SPECIAL THANK YOU to all vaulters entering our Winter Club Practice Package(Nov 10-Feb.10)… BOTH BOYS and GIRLS SESSIONS are now SOLD OUT!!!! SUNDAY OPEN SESSIONS will take place for all other vaulters ALL WINTER and SPRING..Check Schedule on Web Page…www.hvflyingcircus.com FLYING CIRCUS…… PLANT HIGH and DREAM BIG!

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS 6 STEP MEET COMING NOVEMBER 1 !!!!
posts.Content:
BRING-YOUR-SPEED !!!! The 8th Annual… " FLYIN' CIRCUS 6 STEP MEET" will be held Saturday … November 1, 2014 and you and your vault friends are invited to.."Raise the Barn Roof" with us at the antique VAULT BARN in Warwick Valley, New York. The Indoor Season in the Tri-State area is almost upon us… and we want you to be ready to compete when your first High School Team meet arrives. Our 6 Step Meet is filled with beginners…Middle School vaulters…Intermediate High School vaulters…Elite High School and Open/Masters vaulters… Come spend the day with the Flying Circus Community of"Pole Vault Nuts"…. and make some new friends. It's time to JOIN-The-CIRCUS!!!! 8th… FLYIN' CIRCUS 6 STEP MEET ******************************************* Saturday November 1, 2014 The HV FLYING CIRCUS INDOOR VAULT BARN 3 Warwick Center Drive & Hoyt Road Warwick, New York 10990 Still Just $20 per vaulter…Pay at the door…. Girls Meet… Warm Up Begins 9:01AM Meet Starts at 10: 01AM Starting Height 5' 1" … Real Bar Boys Meet…Warm Up Begins 2:01PM Meet starts at 3:01PM Starting Height 7' 1"…. Real Bar COME FLY WITH US and JOIN THE FUN. ###########################
CLUB NEWS UP-DATES: ***************************** * Thanks to your great support..our WINTER CLUB INSTRUCTIONAL PACKAGE is SOLD OUT with our 44 young aspiring athletes. Program begins Nov. 10-Feb.10 Monday thru Thursday evenings. We are extremely excited with this years group of dedicated student/athletes. Full list of athletes and their vault sections next week. * During the Indoor season…the Flying Circus Staff will be engaged in coaching at Friday and Saturday meets in the Tri-State area. Our facility will be CLOSED on Friday and Saturday beginning December 10- March 15. * "SUPER SUNDAYS" …. these instructional 90 minute sessions will continue all FALL-WINTER and SPRING. These are ability and gender groups..Check web site for your exact ability group. Cost just $30 per 90 minute session. * VAULTING POLE REPLACEMENT POLICY: Athletes are encouraged to bring their own vaulting poles to practice at all instructional sessions. This allows the athlete to become very confident on the poles he or she will be using this Indoor and Outdoor season. We also supply poles for use HERE ONLY. We DON NOT LEND or RENT POLES to athletes for meets. Please DO NOT ASK TO BORROW A POLE FOR A MEET. Talk to your Athletic Director and High School Coach about your pole needs. If an athlete breaks or damages a pole at practice…he or she will be responsible for FULL REPLACEMENT value of that vaulting pole. * We sell UCS SPIRIT VAULTING POLES to individuals with FREE SHIPPING. We DO NOT SELL to SCHOOLS. Check your inventory this early season. Order before December 1 before the NEW PRICE INCREASES!!! * FLYING CIRCUS WILL BE CLOSED on Friday October 31 HALLOWEEN. * ALL VAULT SESSION BEGIN and END ON TIME. ################################ Things to Remember………. * Arrive Early for Vault Class * Dress like and ELITE ATHLETE… Neat and Clean. * Bring your spikes to every practice. * Avoid Social Media during practice. * Always remember who you represent…Your Family..School…Self * Always guard your language. There is no place for Rudeness or Loudness. * Treat each other with the HIGHEST RESPECT. * WORK HARD …STAY HUMBLE. * Always be LOYAL to YOURSELF. FLYING CIRCUS…. MAKE TRAINING COUNT.

posts.Title: "CIRCUS 6 STEP MEET" ..DEREK DiBONA (16' 1.75") … SAMANTHA BEYAR (12' 4") FLY GOLD / "DOC" ANDRESEN SOARS 10' 1" !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Development Project Warwick Valley, NY EXCITING FIREWORKS @ FLYING CIRCUS MEET ************************************************************* Nov. 1, 2014 Flying Circus 6 Step Meet

Congratulations to all 44 athletes and family members attending this weeks "SUPER SIX STEP MEET" here in Warwick Valley. The day was filled with 12 hours of 'Pole Vault Spirit' in all divisions and great stories of fiberglass filled the 100 year old dairy barn's hay loft. New personal bests…school records and the best of all…three great jumps at a 73 Year Old Masters WORLD RECORD!!!!! Yes… this season will be SPECIAL !!!!!

Girls Highlights... Monroe-Woodbury,NY senior Samantha Beyar took home the gold..with a personal best of 12' 4" to lead the HS Girls and club team mate Maddie Schneider (Darien,CT) flew 12' 2" with a small grip…to lead the 19 Girls Meet. Warwick Valley 7th Grader Genevive Reilly won Middle School at 6' 7".

Boys Highlights... Warwick Valley,NY senior Derek DiBona also set a personal best at 16' 1.75" on his 15'1" x 190 UCS Spirit Glass Rocket. posts.Title: CIRCUS VAULT LAUNCH… WINTER CLUB OPENS !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development Warwick, New York READY….SET…. LAUNCH !!!! ********************************* The 2014-15 HV FLYING CIRCUS WINTER POLE VAULT CLUB has begun. The 44 member club is sold out… and the emphasis for the next three months will be on this select group of serious athletes. The 22 member Boys Group meets every Monday and Wednesday evenings… and the 22 member Girls Group meets every Tuesday and Thursday evenings at the VAULT BARN at The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development. The focus will be on mastering drills for the transfer to the full Competitive 8 Step Vaulting technique. There is a waiting list for this Instructional Package…as all other Vaulters can still take advantage of Indoor Vaulting on all "SUPER SUNDAYS" this winter and spring. Check our web site for details on Sunday Vaulting at www.hvflyingcircus.com LET"S LAUNCH!!!! News… * The Flying Circus Nike Meet Singlets will be ready for the 28 athletes who pre ordered this club jersey will be ready for pick up at our 7 STEP MEET on Saturday November 22. Cost is $50 per singlet and we are proud to have you represent us this winter!!! * Congratulations to all our athletes for their early college acceptances. We will announce all early signees next week here on our blog. Stay tuned. * Flying Circus Pole Vault will be cranking up at the New Balance Track & Field Center Armory very soon with HVFC Staff Coaches Ben Simonet and Will Nesbitt… Check armory track.com for all details on registration and fees for this Winter. Join the pole vault fun and excitement at the World's Most Famous Track & Field venue!!!! * Please check our web page for the sensational inversion position of Silva(Cuba) !!! It's time to GET-TO-THE-TOP and CLOSE TO FIBERGLASS !!!! FLYING CIRCUS…. LOVE…LAUGH… DREAM

posts.Title: CIRCUS 7 STEP MEET COMING…..SAT. NOV. 22 …. JOIN THE VAULT FUN !!!!
posts.Content:
The FLYING CIRCUS VAULT FAMILY is growing !!!!

The Flying Circus Pole Vault instruction is now available in both The Vault Barn,Warwick,NY and The New Balance Track Center Armory, New York City!!!!! Thanks to your great dedication and interest…our event is now taking the spotlight in the Tri-State area. Check both web sites for all details on pole vault sessions this winter at www.hvflyingcircus.com and www.armorytrack.com and JOIN THE VAULT FAMILY !!!!!

CONGRATULATIONS to Warwick Valley senior pole vaulter…DEREK DiBONA

...for signing his commitment to the University of Connecticut for next fall. The HUSKIES Track & Field program ..under the direction of Head Coach Greg Roy is outstanding and the TRADITION in the Pole Vault has been sensational. Derek, voted Indoor Captain for this year was NY State Runner Up last year Indoor and Outdoor seasons and set the Junior New York State Class All Time record at 16' 1" last indoor and has recently jumped 16' 1.75" at our 6 Step Meet. Derek is the son of Craig and Bobbi-Jo DiBona, Warwick,New York. GO HUSKIES !!!!!

7 STEP FUN MEET !!!! JOIN THE MUSIC!!!!

Saturday November 22, 2014 AT-THE-CIRCUS in WARWICK, NEW YORK GIRLS MEET… Warm Up at 9:01AM Meet Starts at 10:01AM REAL BAR STARTS at 6 FEET BOYS MEET…. Warm Up at 2:01PM Meet Starts at 3:01PM REAL BAR STARTS at 7 FEET COST: $20 per Vaulter at the door registration Athletes wear Club Singlets!!!! FREE PARKING…FREE MUSIC…FREE HEAT !!!! ############################## Things to remember in athletics * Strive for Short Range Goals * Make Training a Priority and Fun * Train your Body…Mind…and Spirit. * Be Coachable…..Accept Feedback Graciously. * Take Chances on Yourself. * Stay HUMBLE. * Be a FULL-TIME Athlete. * Display SPORTSMANSHIP in every situation. * Mind-Your-Manners. FLYING CIRCUS…. MORE THAN POLE VAULT.

posts.Title: "DOC" ANDRESEN ... Vaults WORLD RECORD 10' 8.25 @ CIRCUS 7 STEPP MEET !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Center Warwick Valley, New York Flying Circus 7 Step Meet was filled with Cheers…Clapping and whistling…as John "Doc" Andresen ( 73 year young) set the very first WORLD RECORD in that tiny little barn before an overflow crowd of pole vault 'Nuts". Using all his run speed from 7 steps…"Doc" flew over 10' 8.25 " on his 5th jump of the competition..as the crowd in unison even step. The real bar was measured BEFORE and AFTER his RECORD JUMP. "Doc" is coached by Jimbo Hendersen at The Warehouse in Long Island. CONGRATULATIONS "DOC" !!!!! DEREK DiBONA SOARS 15' 2" in Boys HS Division by 2 Feet!!! / SAMANTHA BEYAR(Monroe,NY) and MADDIE SCHNEIDER(Darien,CT) share the spotlight..as both hit 12' 2" in Girls HS Division…. posts.Title: TECHNIQUE RE-MODELING @ FLYING CIRCUS !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy. LLC The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development Warwick Valley, NY It's…"RE-BOOT" Time at FLYING CIRCUS !!!! ******************************** The easy results of our Technique Re-Modeling at Flying Circus are yielding huge improvements for all our beginner…intermediate and elite training groups. The 123 Flying Circus acrobats are ready for the 2015 Indoor season next week. We thank all vaulters for buying into the new Flying Circus Technique changes… and as Steve Chappell(UCS Spirit) refers it…."the hay is in the barn"… Best of luck to all vaulters in their easy season meets!!! CIRCUS NEWS…. ****************** * Great starts…. Congrats to out alumni college vaulters this past weekend in their meets…. Marisa Robbins won the Manhattan Opener at Draddy Fieldhouse with her ECAC Qualifier 11' 11.75 vault for the Jaspers. Coach Cauthers summer project produced again!!! Also hitting the women's ECAC Qual was Jenna Calandro(Bucknell-Freshman) with her 11' 9.75" gold medal win at Bison Open in her first college meet!!! Maddessen Weeks(Manhattan) open well at Jasper at 10' 10" and Karmen Auble(Xavier University-Freshman) hit it big for Coach Ryan Orner with her 11' 5.75 jump and close at 12' 1" from 5 Lefts!!! The best vault news came out at Harvard Invite….. as former CT State Champ..Lexi Schachne came back from her injury to leap 11' 5.25 for the Crimson… She is proof of the 'Never Give Up' Spirit in athletics!!! Destiny Distasio (Kutztown University-Junior) is sprinting better the ever and also leaped 10' 4" in her opener!! Men's Results were also reported…as Manhattan University junior Savio Paul hit a PR at Jasper at 16' 1" for Head Coach Dan Mecca!!!.. Todd Uckermark(High Point University,NC-Freshman) was impressive with his 15' 0" silver medal opening vault at JD Classic!!! More to come next week from Alumni….. * Duke University Women's Pole Vaulter Record Holder Megan Clark is finishing up her Fall Vault Program with Coach Shawn Wilbourn and is one of the final considerations for the 2015 MILLROSE GAMES @ The Armory on Feb. 14. This High Flying "Dukie" will also be at the Armory Invite on Friday Jan 30… GET YOUR MILLROSE TICKETS ON SALE TOMORROW at armory track.com !!! * SUPER SUNDAYS @ CIRCUS…. The new talent has arrived in Warwick NY and The Armory New Balance Center in NY City. It is a joy to star the next generation of pole vault athletes at both Circus venues..as athletes are working drills and technique for the future!!! Super Sundays in Warwick Groups **************************************** 12:30-2PM BEGINNERS/INTERMEDIATE GIRLS GROUP 2-3:30PM BEGINNERS/INTERMEDIATE BOYS GROUP 3:30-5PM ELITE BOYS & GIRLS GROUP JUST $30 per athlete..Walk In Sessions… ALL Vaulters Welcome FLYING CIRCUS… The Human Body is a series of Springs.

posts.Title: GRACE WEISBECKER SOARS AGAIN!!! VERMONT RECORD !!!!
posts.Content:
NEWS BLAST !!!! NEW RECORD……GRACE WEISBECKER( Vermont University) SOARS TO 12' 5.5" SCHOOL & FACILITY RECORD VAULT!!! Vermont University Pole Vaulter…GRACE WEISBECKER is up to her old vault tricks again… with her setting of a NEW SCHOOL and FACILITY RECORD of 12' 5.5"(3.80m) at her home meet this weekend for the CATAMOUNTS!!! Grace, the 2013 New York State Pole Vault Champion Division II…. soared the record on her second jump from just 6 lefts..breaking Mary Krug's school record of 11' 11.25 " from 2013 season. The jump is posted at our web site…CONGRATULATIONS GRACE from your Team mates @ Flying Circus!!!

COLLEGE HOLIDAY PRACTICE SCHEDULE @ CIRCUS

Here is the schedule for all returning college and open vaulters for the Holiday break… Hope all alumni can join us every session: Sunday December 21 5pm-6:30pm Men & Women Saturday December 27 Andy Wasnik Open Meet 7pm Men & Women Sunday December 28 5pm-6:30pm Men & Women Sunday January 4 5pm-6:30pm Men & Women FLYING CIRCUS….. The Final Stop for Pole Vault Enthusiasts .

posts.Title: "PLANT HIGH"…. CIRCUS SEASON BEGINS !!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Center Warwick Valley,NY GET READY FOR THE RIDE…… The 'ROLLER-COASTER' has left the dock !!! *********************************** Another great week of training at Flying Circus culminated in some very good early season performances around the Tri-State area. Circus Vaulters pushed up their hands at take-off in Albany,Ithaca,West Point and New York City this weekend… the Fall Vault training program worked !!!! BIG ARMORY VAULTS…. Congratulations to Monroe-Woodbury,NY senior Samantha Beyar..who won gold on Saturday with her 11' 6" for the Crusaders at the New Paltz Camp meet. Freshman Team mate Kristen Lubeskie placed 4th at 8' 0" Seraya Freidmen(MW) hit 7' 0" for Coach Goodwin. In the section1 meet..Kerry Qualter(CS) took silver at 8' 0"..Vivian Mroz(Bxville) 8' 0'..Alison Stern(CS) 8' 0" for the Vikings. New Rochelle,NY junior Devon Feuer placed 2nd at 8' 6" in Section 1 development meet for Coach Capellan. The Boys at the Armory were also turning it up…as Iona Prep,NY Senior Matt Fay…coached by Jerry Cahill punched a personal best of 15' 4" for the win and moved up the Millrose Games Invite list!! Taking silver medal was Senior James Ball(Fordham Prep,NY) at 13' 6" and Liam Ackerman(St.Anthony,NY) 12' 0". Matt DeLorenzo(Wallkill,NY-junior) won New Paltz meet at 13' 0"..Brandan Nebiker(Monroe,NY) also hit 13' 0" and Vinnie Depaslo(Monroe,NY) set his best at 11' 0" for the Crusaders. Suffern.NY senior Matt Leanza placed 1st at 12' 6" at Section 1 meet followed by Jeff Sanawong(Nanuet,NY) 11' 0" and Connor Burke(Pearl River,NY-Frosh) at 9' 0" . WEST POINT MEETS… Gillis Fieldhouse @ West Point is a great place to vault…and Ivan Mieses(Middletown,NY) opened his season with 12' 0" fiber win for the Midddies…The Girls competition was close as Cornwall,NY senior Katarina VanLedtje edged Sophomore Colleen Leahey(Burke,NY) as both soared over 9' 0" as Leahey set another New School record for the Eagles … Andrea Dolan(Wallkill,NY) placed third at 8' 0". BOMBER INVITE @ ITHACA,NY… Vestel,NY senior Kari Stromhaug had a sensational night in the new Ithaca University Track facility…with her 11' 6" pole vault win and her 5' 4" high jump win. ALBANY AREA @ UNION COLLEGE ….. At the Union College unique and cozy Track & Field facility this weekend in multi meets the season started up big for Burnt Hills,NY junior Kalli Manley. The super fast and experienced young vaulter flew big over 11' 0" for the the gold medal win on Saturday late afternoon. She moves up to her new poles at Bishop Loughlin this Saturday. In the earlier section of vaulters…Tedi Demaria..the converted level 10 gymnastic specialist…on her first ever High School meet with a New School Record of 10' 6" for Coach Ashley Gansle. She also won the high jump at 4' 10" and returns at Bishop Loughlin Games on Saturday in Armory. NICK MARINO FLYS 13' 0"….Hatsboro,PA super soph..Nick Marino vaulter 13' 0" for a personal best fo LOJO ASSULT CLUB and returns to the Barn on December 27 for our last indoor meet. ANDY WASNIK INDOOR MEET … Sat. Dec. 27 @ CIRCUS Girls HS Meet at 10:AM Boys HS Meet at 2PM College/Open/Masters Meet at 6PM Coach Andy Wasnik was an inspirational Track and Field Coach at Park Ridge High School,NJ who always found the time and compassion to help everyone around him. His calm personality and extreme knowledge of field events…particullary the pole vault attracted many young aspiring athletes to his side. This meet pays forward his positive spirit of athletics. Please come join us this December 27 in honoring his contributions to our sport and kids. UCS SPIRIT POLE VAULT SUMMIT ..registration closes on January 5th… If you are attending this years summit.. you must act now ..on line registration at ucsspiritsummit. "The GREATEST POLE VAULT EVENT of the YEAR" ….. Jan 16-17-18 in Reno.NV. Here are our Flying Circus Summit Event Records ********************************* Flying Circus Boys HS Record…. Todd Uckermark(Warwick,NY) 16' 2" 2014 Flying Circus Girls HS Record….. Stephanie Duffy(Wash'ville,NY) 12' 4" 2006 Flying Circus Coaches Record….. Will Nesbitt(Duke) 12' 2" 2014 Are these records in trouble in 2015 ? ******************************** FLYING CIRCUS…ACCELERATION DEVELOPMENT IS A SKILL.

posts.Title: HAPPY HOLIDAYS from FLYING CIRCUS !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project Warwick, NY

SEASON GREETING and HAPPY HOLIDAYS!!!

The HV FLYING CIRCUS Coaching Staff would like to wish all our athletes…families and volunteers a joyful and healthy Holiday Season . We can not fully express our gratitude for having the opportunity to work with everyone in our little Vaulting Club... both here in Warwick and in New York City. Your support and spirit….. makes it easy. Enjoy your holidays . Hugh Cauthers…Ben Simonet…Will Nesbitt … Tim St.Lawrence * REPORTING RESULTS…… We want your name in our weekly results…the SUNDAY NIGHT CIRCUS NEWSLETTER goes out to over 850 Pole Vault Enthusiasts…High School and College Coaches….Active and Alumni Vaulters and Families. It is our way to promote all the great time and effort each one of you put into 'Chasing-Your-Dreams' in athletics. E-mail all your results by 6PM every Sunday Night to make the Newsletter Splash!!!! * BIG WEEKEND is HERE… the Tri- State area Pole Vaulters are taking it up in many places tonight and tomorrow. ALL YOUR WORK will soon be seen by many observers….Enjoy your moments and stay humble. * KATLYN RYMARZOW COMMITS to PRINCETON UNIVERSITY !!!! Senior Multi Event Track star..Katlyn Rymarzow of Pope John Academy,NJ will be taking her academics and pole vaulting/hurdling to Princeton University next fall. Katlyn…a Seven Time State Pole Vault Champion for Coach Brian Corcoran and now emerging as an elite hurdler/sprinter for the LIONS. The 5 time State Gymnastic Champion is the daughter of Chuck and Kelly Rymarzow of Warwick, NY… CONGRATULATIONS KATLYN!!!! * ALFONSO SCANNAPIECO FUND…. Our 17'6.5" Flying Circus vaulter…Alfonso Scannapieco has graduated from Albany University and it now continues his journey for the 18 FOOT VAULT CLUB. This Multi-Event athlete has transformed himself…from a 12' 6" High School athlete at Lakeland-Panus.ny to one of the best in the USA!!! He needs our help to continue… If you are interested in helping Alfonso fund his dream… go to http://Fundly.com/support-alfonso-spath-for-usa.s Many thanks in advance. * Our BIG HOLIDAY MEET is JUST 7 DAYS AWAY!!!! Please join us at our ANDY WASNIK HOLIDAY POLE VAULT MEET on Saturday December 27, 2014 at the WORLD FAMOUS FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT BARN. There will be a High School Division…Middle School and Open Divisions…Masters Division. Athletes will be competing UNATTACHED in this USATF Meet. ALL ATHLETES are encouraged to enjoy the LIVELY FUN and SPIRIT on the second floor of that old Dariy Barn on Warwick Center Drive. Check times for your group.. Cost..Just a thin $20!!!! ANDY WASNIK HOLIDAY POLE VAULT CLASSIC Saturday December 27…(Snow Storm Date..Dec. 28) 9AM…BARN OPENS for Warwm Girls HS Warm Up 10AM…MS & HS Girls Division(Real Bar starts at 6 Feet) 2PM..MS & HS Boys Warm Up 3PM.. MS & HS Division (Real Bar starts at 7 Feet) 7 PM.. OPEN/MASTERS/ALUMNI DIVISION FLYING CIRCUS…. A LIVELY POLE VAULT PROJECT

posts.Title: SAMANTHA BEYAR (Monroe,NY) FLYS 12' 0" @ LOUGHLIN GAMES !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project Warwick,NY SAMANTHA BEYAR TAKES NEW YORK !!!! Congratulations to Monroe-Woodbury,NY senior pole vault star..Samantha Beyar for bringing home the Gold Medal Pole Vault at the Bishop Loughlin Games in the Armory on Saturday morning. The humble and hard working CRUSADER in PURPLE Made her winning jump on attempt #1.. and then moved to her biggest poles and grip for 3 super close bars at 12' 6.5"!!!! She added a 16' 1.5" long jump for warm up purposes!!! Three other Circus Ladies placed in the Top 7…as Erin Leahey(Warwick,NY) lifted high over 11' 0" to start up her senior season for Coach Thompson…Burnt Hills,NY junior Kalli Manly was super over 11' 0" to tie for 3rd place and Tedi Demaria(Bethlehem,NY) soared over 10' 6" to equal her indoor school record for Coach Ashly Gansle. Hannah Bolick(Hereford,PA) looked great over 10' 6" for Coach Matt Conconnan and Jim Henderson's Warehouse Girls each made 10' 6" for Sachem East,NY…JordanMessineo and Kerstyn Ciulla are making their move up. The Boys Vault was a 1-2 finish by Coach Jerry Cahills Iona Prep Vault duo…Ryan Herrera-Murphy at 15' 0" and Matt Fay(Iona Prep) at 15' 0". Brian Sagendorf(Union Catholic,NJ) made 13' 0" Matt Leanza(Suffern) 12' 6".. posts.Title: "BOOM" @ MARINE CORP MEET.. MATT FAY(IP) 15' 9"…MADDIE SCHNEIDER(Darien) 11' 6" !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC
The Pole Vault Center
Warwick,NY


  It was truly …."BOOM" at the Pole Vault runway today at the 15th Marine Corps Indoor Classic at the New Balance Track & Field Center on 168th Street, New York City!!!!

  The  Iona Prep,NY  Pole Vault "BOOM" Club…coached by Jerry Cahill  treated the  sold out crowd to exciting  vaulting  and great sportsmanship at mid day Varsity section od champions… Iona Prep…senior Matt Fay made  his statement  with 2 new PR's at 15' 6"   and 15' 9" for the Gold Medal. His near 16' 0"  jump moves him up the MILLROSE GAMES HS  BOYS POLE VAULT LIST  for the February 14, 2015 TV Meet!!!!  The TOP 8 vaulters  in  our reach will be invited based on performance thru Feb. 1.   "Boom" team mate   Ryan Herrera Murphy also looked great all day and his 15' 6" PR also places him on the list. Luke Ammirati(Farrell) sailed 13' 6"  again ...   Flying Circus junior Matt deLorenzo blasted over 13' 6"… Ormando Watson was solid  on new poles and Brian Sagendorf(Union Catholic) 12' 0" .   

  In the evening Girls Championship Pole Vault… Connecticut State Champ sailed huge over 11' 6" for gold and used her BIGGEST POLES EVER at 12' 0" close bars.. She  then took the Marine Corp "Chin-Up" contest with  her 20 Straight chins record!!!  Sabrina Anderson(HC) coming off her 11' 6" win on Saturday..placed 2nd at 11'0" followed by junior Kalli Many(BH) at 11' 0"…Erin Leahey(Warwick) 10' 6"   and Andrea Dolan(Wallkill) at 9' 0" !!!

   Circus Performers win  both FROSH/SOPH VAULTS!!!  The next generation is creeping up… with James Ammirati(Farrell,NY)  winning the gold Frosh / Soph meet at 9' 6"   and Soph Colleen Leahey(JS Burke,NY) winning the Girls Frosh / Soph Vault  at 8' 6"!!!!

      BACK TO TRAINING DRILLS …. MORE -TO-COME !!!!!

posts.Title: "DISCOVER POLE VAULT" @ FLYING CIRCUS…..JORDAN YAMOAH SAILS 17' 8" !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley,NY "DISCOVER POLE VAULT"…… Welcome to the Flying Circus Discovery Zone. Thanks to all our great vaulters and families…Your Flying Circus Pole Vault Club has expanded and is reaching out to all level vaulters at The Armory,NYC and in Warwick, New York. Our Armory classes with Coach Ben Simonet are producing hugh personal best performances and our Membership classes in Warwick,NY are thriving… The biggest improvements are coming from our Beginner/Intermediate classes on all 'SUPER SUNDAYS'. Our college vaulters are also ready to start up their Indoor Vault Competitive season next week. We are looking forward to our 2 Day SUMMER CAMPS in Mid-July and we have posted up the camp registration form for all early registration athletes. This Camp CLOSES OUT at the first 50 Boys and Girls to register. Join the Camp registration today!!! JORDAN YAMOAH(FLYING CIRCUS) ….. is READY for the 18 FOOT CLUB!!!!! posts.Title: "MOTIVATION" …… The FLYING CIRCUS BLUEPRINT
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley,NY " ARE YOU READY" ……..The Name of the Game in Athletics is "MOTIVATION". We are privileged and inspired by the dedication of our young vaulters…the Beginner vaulters learning the drills…the Intermediate vaulters gaining strength… and the Elite vaulters showing the leadership skills necessary to reach the Top of the Mountain. The real Power of Motivation….. ….. stems from the Day-to-Day Team Work Ethic... ….. the Commitment to Reach for Excellence… ….. the 'Positive Spirit' of Hard Work… ….. the Emphasis of Placing a Priority on Training…. ….. the Understanding of the 'Joys of Movement' TODAY….. posts.Title: MEGAN CLARK (DUKE) ….."MILLROSE BOUND" !!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project Warwick,NY Vault News Blast …. Jan. 7 It's official …….MEGAN CLARK (DUKE UNIVERSITY) Pole Vault Record Holder has accepted her invitation to the 2015 NRR MILLROSE GAMES in New York City!!!! The story begins ….. in the spring of 2009... in the small town of Hayfield , Virginia….where Pole Vault Coach Randy McConchie hands freshman Megan "Flips" Clark her first fiberglass pole vaulting pole. The speedy sprinter/hurdler takes the bait…and a star is born for the pole-vault event. She jumps 9' 9" and places 5th at the Virginia State meet. The journey moves to West Point ,NY for her Soph and Junior scholastic achievements at Flying Circus…where she booms 13' 0" for 2 State Vault Titles at James O'Neill High School. She also cranks up 25.6 @ 200m and 14'66 in 100m Hurdles. Her dad… US Army Cornel Ron Clark takes over command at Fort Banning ,Georgia as Megan enters her senior year at Columbus High School. Her Mom…Simona Clark takes over her pole vault coaching and she agin wins another State Championship..this time the Georgia Vault Title and graduates with honors. …….Duke University Associate Head Track & Field Coach Shawn Wilbourn. then takes the reigns on this runaway stage coach…. and Megan Clark jumps thru the roof!!!! She improves from 13' 0" to 14' 7" in less than 18 months… and technique and speed/strength year-round work pays off with a USA Jr.National Title and the USA uniform!!!!! Last spring ..Megan is invited to compete at the Adidas Street Vault in Times Square,NY…and places third at 14' 6' and near 15' 0" bar from her short run into a 9mph HeadWind!!!! Yes… Millrose Games committee…. You invited the right women for this year!!!! The Megan Clark FAN CLUB will be in full force on Saturday February 14 in the New Balance Armory …. GET YOUR TICKETS NOW !!!! CONGRATULATIONS Megan and Coach Wilbourn !!!!!

posts.Title: MILLROSE GAMES …. "POLE VAULT TRADITION" !!!!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC
The Pole Vault Project
Warwick,NY


    Fot the past 108 years….THE MILLROSE GAMES has  always been about the Wannamaker Mile   and  The Pole Vault.  The history and tradition of the Pole Vault at The Millrose Games has been unmatched at any other Indoor  Track & Field  meet in the world.  From World  Records…Olympic Champions…International Pole Vault Guests …the sight of "Flying Humans" has always been the crowd favorite…. and this year's 108th NYRR MILLROSE GAMES  will again be stacked with excitement.
   There are five individuals responsible for this continuing  ' TRADITION  of the VAULT ' .  Meet Director Ray Flynn ….Armory President Dr.Norb Sanders….Armory Visionary Jack Pfeifer…  Armory Foundation Will Nesbitt   and Armory High School Chairman Tim Fulton. These individuals are the backbone of Pole Vault Development  east of the Mississippi River. We salute their "Spirit of the Vault".

   This edition  of NYRR MILLROSE GAMES will feature 3 separate Pole Vault Gala's. posts.Title: MILLROSE GAMES …. "POLE VAULT TRADITION" !!!!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC
The Pole Vault Project
Warwick,NY


    Fot the past 108 years….THE MILLROSE GAMES has  always been about the Wannamaker Mile   and  The Pole Vault.  The history and tradition of the Pole Vault at The Millrose Games has been unmatched at any other Indoor  Track & Field  meet in the world.  From World  Records…Olympic Champions…International Pole Vault Guests …the sight of "Flying Humans" has always been the crowd favorite…. and this year's 108th NYRR MILLROSE GAMES  will again be stacked with excitement.

posts.Title: MEGAN CLARK (DUKE)…. SOARS 14 FEET @ Armory Invite !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC Warwick,NY VAULT NEWS-BLAST …… **************************** ….. Duke University Junior Megan Clark… blasted over 14' 0" last night in the BIG APPLE'S New Balance Track & Field Center and had close bars at 14' 3.5" for the Blue Devils Track & Field team. Using just her small UCS Poles for this early season prep period…Megan used her taller and more controlled run approach to perfection and showed sportsmanship and class in her battle with friend Robin Bone(Canada) allay long. Bone..the former Darien,CT High School star and Junior World pole vault athlete..flew 14' 3 on her final jump for the gold. Megan returns to the Armory in two weeks for the 108th NYRR MILLROSE GAMES!!!! SUPER-BOWL SUNDAY POLE VAULTING IS ON….. The Flying Circus classes are on for tomorrow…as we catch the Super Bowl Spirit on the Fast runways at Flying Circus…Join us before the game.. 12:30-2PM Class… Girls Open Beginners Vault Class 2-3:30PM Class …. Boys Open Beginners Vault Class 3:30-5PM Class…. Boys and Girls Elite Vault Class Today at 4:30PM…. TV ALERT for Pole Vault… Armory Invitation for Men… Shawn Baber vs Sam Kendricks… NBS Sports Network Live… Will it be the first 19 Foot Vault in the Armory !!! FLYING CIRCUS…. PASSION CHANGES EVERYTHING.

posts.Title: "LET US TAKE YOU HIGHER" …. FLYING CIRCUS
posts.Content: "A person with BIG DREAMS ….. is more powerful than a person with all the facts." *************************************************** Now…at mid-indoor season …the results of all your fall and early season foundation work is about to be displayed. This is the time of the season for the "Peaking Phase" to take over in your training and your competitive meets. This is the time to REACH HIGH both mentally and physically. IT'S YOUR TIME NOW!!!! Enjoy these next four weeks of pole vaulting !!!! CIRCUS-NEWS ….. * Our Regular Membership Classes will conclude on Tuesday Feb. 10 and we would like to thank every one of the 45 Membership Class Vaulters this winter. You were beyond our expectations. We will move on to Open Tuesday and Wednesday and Sunday Open Classes to continue your instruction. See Below for details on this Vault Package. * MILLROSE GAMES are coming !!! The " VAULTERS of FLYING CIRCUS" are blessed to have 6 athletes invited to this year's…GREATEST POLE VAULT EVENT of the YEAR…. Derek DiBona(Warwick,NY)..Samantha Beyar(Monroe,NY) ... Sabrina Anderson(Flemington,NJ)… Julia Valenti(North Reading,MASS)…Maddie Schneider(Darien,CT) and Katlyn Rymarzow(Sparta,NJ)… CONGRATULATIONS and GODD LUCK from your team mates at Circus. Girls Event Thursday Feb 12 ..Boys Event Saturday Feb. 14. Come join the Circus Vault Fan Club!!! * JOIN THE SUMMER VAULT BLAST @ CIRCUS… Our Summer 2 Day Pole Vault Camps are filling up very FAST NOW… Applications at our web site www.hvflyingcircus.com We take only 40 Boys and 40 Girls…. Avoid the Waiting List.. Register now for the Summer Fun… and pour SUMMER POLE VAULT MEET on Saturday July 18…The BARNYARD VAULT SHOOTOUT and BBQ !!!!! 5 Pits… Great Music… Great Friendships..Alumni Vault Section… BBQ at 2PM…Volleyball at 6PM …. END of the Vault Season FUN !!!!! * NEW VAULT OPEN INSTRUCTIONAL PACKAGES…Beginning Tuesday Feb. 17…The Flying Circus will be blazing every Tuesday…Wednesday and Sundays for the Open Walk In Vault classes in Warwick,NY The 90 minute classes offer Warm up Drills…Apparatus..Short Run Vaulting and Full Run Vaulting for just $30 a visit. Girls Tuesday evenings All Levels 5:30-7pm or 7-8:30pm Class Boys Wednesday evenings All Levels 5:30-7pm or 7-8:30pm Class Sundays Beginner/Intermediate Girls Level… 12:30-2pm Beginner/Intermediate Boys level… 2-3:30pm Note: There will be NO CLASS on March. 3 due to EASTERN STATES CHAMPIONSHIPS Pole Vault at the Armory. * This week in Review….. Congratulations to University of Connecticut Sophomore Craig Hunter who set a personal best of 17' 7" on Saturday morning at The Armory Invitational !!! Peter Fagan(Binghamton University) blasted over 16' 5" for Coach Mike Thompson at Cornell..Travis Fountain(Bing) 14' 9" Zach Liebmann(Bing) 14' 3". Kutztown University team Captain Sean Burns won the Bison Open at Bucknell at 14' 9" Tim Schanstra(Penn) 12' 5" Destiny DeStascio(Kutztown) 10' 10" this week. At the John Thoma Terrier Invite at Boston University… Jackie Briggs (Northeartern) flew a PR at 13' 1.5" for gold Marissa Robbins(Manh) 12'1.5" Madessen Weekes(Manh) 11' 9.75PR..AliPariese(HC) 11' 0" Shannon Lenzi(U/Mass-L) 10' 0" Carllina Frisina(Rider) 10' 0" Dana Placentra(NYU) 9' 7" Morivian University senior Dana Fineman hit 11'1.75 to qualify for ECAC Champs.. Claire Murphy(Laf) 10' 8"…Ryan Karnopp(Morivian) 15' 3" Trevot Knowles(Lehigh) 15' 3". Savio Paul(Manh) 15' 9" Anthony DeFranco(Rider) 15' 9" Nick Perez(RIT) 15' 0" Billy Thibault(Rhode Island) 15' 0" ..Whitman oehler-Marz(Brockport) 15' 3". James Steck(VATech) hit 16' 1.5" last week… and Albany Kindergarden classmate Kara Snyder(Villanova) made 12' 3.5" for Coach Talen Singer at Metro Challenge Cup. James Deutemeyer(Villanova) 15' 3" Todd Uckermark(High Point,NC) hits 16' 0"… Dylan Altand(Rutgers) 14' 9" Joe Crispi(Wagner) 14' 3.5" !!! Emily Savage is back to her winning ways with a short run win in Oklahoma Open Meet last week from the left side!!! Megan "Flips" Clark flew high over 14' 0" at Armory Invite..as Duke won the Sportsmanship Award! Megan returns Feb. 14 for Millrose!!! High School Review… Samantha Beyar(Monroe,NY) hit 11' 6" at West Point for her Division 1 win for Crusaders… Kat Van Ledtje(Cornwall) 9' 6"… Erin Leahey(warwick) won Division 4 at 10'6"..Colleen Ann Leahey(Burke) placed 2nd at 8' 6" to Sophia Alter(RV) a 9'6"… Meagan Horowitz won Division 5 with a school indoor record of 8' 0" for the Comets… At New Balance last week..Erin Leahey(Warwick )placed second at 11' 0" Lauren Bilali(Old Tappan,NJ) set a school record of 11' 0" Kalli Manly(BH) hit 11' 0" Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope) 11' 0" Tedi DeMaria(Beth) 9' 6" Devon Feuer(NR) 8' 0" Ormando Watson(Bacon) 12' 6". Watch out for the rising freshman Kristen Lubeskie of Monroe,NY.. The freshman gymnast hit 10' 3" to take the NYS Freshman lead on fiberglass Sabrina Anderson(HC) hit 11' 6" and close bars at 12' 1" Team mate Stephaine Tack is improving at 8' 6" At Rockland County Champs… Matt Leanza won the title at 13' 0"..Jeff Sanawong(Nanuet) 12' 0" Jake Dioamond(Suffern) 11' 6" Connor Burke(PR) 9' 0" ..Alison Stern(CS) won at 8' 6" Kerry Qualter(CS) also hit 8' 6' for the Vikings!! Up in Connecticut… Chris Rough(Westhill) won FCIAC at 14' 6" over Leland Roberts(Danbury) 14' 0" at Wilton. Henry Vossler(Darien) placed 3rd at 9'0{" Kenny Yamaguchi(Darien) 9' 0". It was Maddie Schneider(Darien) setting a New ZEOLI FIELDHOUSE Pole Vault Record at 11' 7" taking out former Blue Wave Robin Bones record at 11' 6'. Maddie also won 45 Hurdles and Sprint Medley Relay for Coach Steve Norris. The West Point bound Schneider will be at Millrose!! FLYING CIRCUS ….. BE A FULL TIME ATHLETE.

posts.Title: EMILY SAVAGE RETURNS TO VAULT WINNERS CIRCLE !!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project … "Everyone Counts" WarwickNY /Armory,NY WORK HARD …. … DREAM BIG …… Welcome to the 'CHAMPIONSHIP SEASON" . It is time to deliver….. and the 'Circus Mailman' was active with delivering some great results this weekend. Congratulations to ALL VAULTERS…FAMILIES and COACHES…… DREAMS DO COME TRUE !!!! Southwest Great News…. EMILY SAVAGE has returned ….. the 2013 HS NATIONAL VAULT CHAMPION from Weston, CT is rounding back in super form with her winning 12' 8.5" jump yesterday in Norman,Oklahoma at the Bison Invitational …and super jumps at 13' 1" on her 13'1 x 150!!! After great work on the drive take off with her club coach Tim McMichael for the last 15 months…Emily is back better than ever and ready to move up to 13' 7" and 9 Step approach . The Penn Relays Record Holder at 13' 1.5" is ready for more…Congratulations Emily !!!! College Results…. Todd Uckermark(High Point,NC) enjoyed his 15' 5" performance for a second place finish at JD FastTrack…as team mate jumped 16' 4.75" for the win. TJ Murphy(UCONN) lifted 15' 5" also for the Huskies. Sarah DeVita..a senior at University of Virginia hit her personal best of 12' 8.5 also this weekend. The former Ridgewood ,NJ elite hurdler is excelling in pole vault in college. Ridgewood Team Mate Kayla Polcari jumped 12' 1" this weekend for Notre Dame at the Spire meet… Grace Weisbecker..Soph at University of Vermont won gold at 12' 5.5" at the Harvard Open on Saturday and now moves to the 1' 7" series. Dana Fineman(Moravarian University,PA) is jumping off the charts with her 11' 11.75" for gold in PA Meet at Susquehanna Invite. Up in Boston… Destiny DeStascio(Kutztown,PA) leaped 11' 5.75PR and moved to 13' 7" series…and Kara Snyder(Villanova-freshman) jumped 11'5.75 for Coach Singer. Karmen Auble(Xavier University,OH) looked strong making 11' 6" for Coach Ryan Orner. Kari Murnane(New Hampshire) freshman was finally cleared from injury to compete in her first meet..and hit 10' 4" from small run . Lexi Schachne(Harvard) placed 4th in the Harvard-Yale-Princeton BIG MEET!!! 4 STATE POLE VAULT CHAMPIONS CROWNED this weekend. ***************************** * Madeline Schneider(Darien,CT) followed up her Millrose Games gold medal..with her 7th State Pole Vault crown..with an 11' 8" sail for Coach Steve Norris in the Class Large School Division at Hillhouse. Placing second was Soccer Elite/ Pole Vaulter..Ali Moraveck(Masuk,CT)..who won 3 events the week before including her 10' 0" vault. In Class S Division…Weston,CT freshman Danielle Cass placed 4th at 9'6" for Coach Meadve. * Brian Sagendolf from the powerful Union Catholic team won his State Title at 13' 6" in the New Jersey Non-Public A meet at Toms River. Amanda Grieco(Union Catholic) placed 7th at 7' 6". * Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John,NJ) won her 7th NJ State Pole Vault Championship at 11' 6" for the Lady Lions of Sparta ,NJ. Coach Brian Corcoran has guided her career all the way to Princeton next fall. posts.Title: DEREK DiBONA(Warwick,NY) Flys 15' 6"….KATLYN RYMARZOW(Sparta,NJ) Soars 12' 1"  @ CIRCUS LAST CHANCE MEET!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy

The Pole Vault Project
USATF Club  #1129

  2015 LAST CHANCE MEET @ FLYING CIRCUS
  Sunday  March 1, 2015

﻿﻿

  Warwick,NY---   The Snow storm outside the FLYING CIRCUS  could not hold back the" Pole Vault Nut's" inside that little old dairy barn on Warwick Center Drive.  With 28  competitors competing "Unattached" for their home towns… new school records…new Personal Bests  and some new National Qualifiers enjoyed the fun..friendship  and joy of pole vault.  Many thanks  to all athletes…parents   and coaches for making our meet a hugh success.

  In the High School Boys Division.. it was hometown hero..Derek DiBona(Warwick,NY)  who  flew 15' 6" easily  and then had 3 great  bars at 16' 3.5" for the Purple Wave on his short poles and short grips. Derek  will take it up at Eastern States on Tuesday. Westhill,CT  senior  Chris Rough soared over 14' 9' by a miles   and  was close at 15' 6" on his new poles.   In the Girls Division… Sparta,NJ and Flying Circus  Katlyn Rymarzow almost hit the roof..with her 12' 1" seasonal best  for the Princeton University to be TIGER next fall. Amanda McNelis(Commack,NY) hit the National Standard with her 11' 3" clear for Coach Henderson…and Junior Samantha Kaplan(New Paltz,NY) junior set a new Indoor School Record 0f 11' 3" to qualify for Nationals.

posts.Title: DEREK DIBONA(Warwick Valley) wins State Public Title/ SAMANTHA BEYAR(Monroe) Soars to SILVER!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy
The Pole Vault Project
Warwick,NY


  The New York State Pole Vault Meet  at Cornell University on Saturday  was  a  BLAST  for all the  26 Boys and 26 Girls competing in one of  the oldest  and   most unique Field houses in the USA… BARTON HALL.
   These 52 Elite athletes….taking part in our sports highest  State level…were a sight-to-witness. Showing composure… spirit…toughness  and sportsmanship  … and when all the dust settled….friendships  were strengthened thru  sport.  CONGRATULATIONS to all athletes  and parents for another  day at STATE !!!  

  Boys  STATE FINALS…The morning edition  saw Warwick Valley,NY senior DEREK DiBONA win his first NYS Public School Division STATE CHAMPIONSHIP  for Coach Mike Potter's Purple Wave. Using his 15' 0" poles thru  his 15' 6" clear and the Public win..he then pulled out the 15' 7" poles at 16' 0"… The State Federation PV Title  went  to close friend Ryan Herrera-Murphy of Iona Prep,NY  ..with his 15' 9" clear for Coach Jerry Cahill.  Middletown,NY senior Ivan Mieses placed 6th at 13' 6"  and Matt  Leanza(Suffern)  hit 13' 0"… and Matt Delorenzo(Wallkill) made 12' 6".
 On-to-Nationals next week…….

 Girls STATE FINALS…..It's the Dream of  every athlete to ever compete in the STATE FINALS of any sport…and the 7 Flying Circus Girls were honored  and ready… Monroe,NY senior  SAMANTHA BEYAR  was ready to compete  and was clean  all day on first jumps  and place  second with her 11' 6"  Silver Medal performance  for the Purple Crusaders.  She  was ever so close  at her 12'0" bars..but was gracious and humble in congratulating Kari Stromhaug(Vestal)  event winner at 12' 0"  for Coach Jim Cerra!!!   Kalli Manly(BH)..Erin Leahey(warwick)..Tedi Demaria(Bethlehen)  ... Kristen Lubuski(Monroe).. and ...Vivian Mortz(Bronxville) all helped each other all day long!!!  Team Pole Vaulting Matters!!!!!!

       12  CIRCUS VAULTERS @ NATIONALS !!!
       ************************************************
  Congratulations  to our 12 Flying Circus  athletes  for making the NB National Indoor Track & Field Championships  this coming weekend.  Competition begins on Friday  March 13  with  the Emerging Elite  Competitions… followed by Saturday's  Boys Championship Competition… followed by Sunday's Girls Championship Competition.
      Our  Flying Circus will be CLOSED Friday-Saturday-Sunday March 13-15. We  will reopen Tuesday /Wednesday with our Open Classes in the evening.
  
     " OUTDOOR SPRING TRACK is BACK"  ….
       *********************************************
    We will be offering Open Classes  the entire month of March to keep  everyone going strong  and helping our new spring track vaulters. Check web site  for  complete schedule for Tuesday-Wednesday  and Super Sundays.

    "LEARN-TO-POLEVAULT DAY" …..
     ***********************************
      Saturday  March 28, 2015
      Boys Session 10AM-1PM     Girls Session 2PM-5PM
    
     Join us  for the Introduction of Pole Vault Mechanics for Grades 7-8-9-10  and LEARN TO VAULT. Just $25  for the 3 hour session..Open to all Boys  and Girls in Middle School   and High School  Frosh-Soph Grades.  All details  @ www.hvflyingcircus.com

    "FLYING CIRCUS MANIA"…. GRINDING OUT SUCCESS.

posts.Title: MEGAN CLARK FLYS 14' 9" @ NCAA…. 2nd Place ALL AMERICAN !!!!!
posts.Content:
The FLYIN' CIRCUS
GREAT NEWS DEPARTMENT


March 15, 2015
NCAA @ ARKANSAS

  MEGAN CLARK is TOUGH!!!!!    Congratulations  to Duke University junior pole vault c star…MEGAN P. CLARK  foe a spectactular Silver Medal performance at yesterday's NCAA NATIONAL CHAMPIONSHIPS.  Clearing her last 3 bars on her first attempt…Megan set a new Duke School Record of 14' 9"  for Coach Shawn Wilbourn  and the Blue Devils…  Clark placed  first or second in  7 Indoor meets this winter   and had close bar at 15' 1"….. Consistency was key  and she stepped up at the BIG MEET!!!
   CONGRATULATIONS  from all you Flying Circus team mates  and coaches!!!!

CONGRATULATIONS DEPARTMENT...

Megan P. Clark and Coach Shawn Wilbourn…Duke University Track and Field..placing 2 nd at NCAA Division 1 Championships at 14' 9" before running out of poles!!!! MT SAC here they come !!!! Julia Vanenti of North Reading,Mass… placing 11th at NB Nationals yesterday with a personal best 12' 4.5" for Coach Eric Hastings and Coach Abbot… This junior and 2 time MASS State Pole Vault Champ used her biggest pole 13'7" x 160 UCS and a 12' 10 Grip to soar and was close at 12' 8.5"!!!! Also jumping great were Kari Stromhaug(Vestal) 12' 1" and Samantha Beyar(Monroe0 at 11' 7" and CT State Champ..Maddie Schneider. Our adopted Sunshine State Champion…Nikki Carroll(Tampa Catholic,FL) was sensational placing 8th at 12' 8.5" on her new pole for Coach Bobby Heck @ Pole Vault City. Now… it's REBOOT TIME….we all meet again in Greensboro on June 19-21 for more friendship on fiberglass!
