posts.Title: "LEARN TO POLE VAULT DAY"…. ONLY 3 DAYS AWAY………
WARWICK VALLEY POLE VAULT …. ON-THE-RISE !!!!!
posts.Content:
The storied history of fiberglass pole vaulting at Warwick Valley Central  is  filled   with magic…mystque  and folk lore tradition   and the new generation of "Flyer's on Fiberglass" are  about to  write some new chapters on soaring.
   The Purple Wave Flyers of Coach Mike Potter's Boys Track & Field team…and the  Girls Purple Wave  Team Flyers coached by Rich Furst have taken  wings for the up-coming Spring season at Track & Field  Central… Warwick Valley High School.

   Championship Pole Vaulting was started in the very early 1970…with George Odell setting records for the Purple and Gold Wildcats of Coach Frank Lacalimetta. The  progress to fiberglass vaulting poles soon shot the  school records into orbit the next 40 years…with Dave Holt holding the  school record for an  astonishing  33 years at 15' 7" (1978-2011).. Todd Uckermark(2014)  shot the record to 16' 9"..the second highest  ever in New York State High School History. In the Girls  rich history…Meredith Mante won the  first NY State Pole Vault Title  with her 11' 9" sail for gold in 2003 for her  new school record….  Kayla Leahey followed with State Scoring Vaulting in 2010   and the current Purple Wave Record Holder  …Jenna Marrione won National Titles in 2008  for the Wildcats and zoomed 12' 7.5"  her senior year at Warwick Valley.

   Now.. it's  time  for the "NEW KIDS on FIBERGLASS" to Raise the Bar.   The New Wave in Boys Vaulting is led by Warwick Valley  senior…Derek DiBona…who sailed to a personal best this past weekend at the New Balance Indoor National Championships of 16' 2"  to place 5th   and become ALL-AMERICAN. He leads an exciting group of "New-FLYERS-in-PURPLE"….and Erin Leahey…a State Scoring Vaulter/Sprinter will lead the LADY FLYERS this spring.  There is a surge going on  with our Middle School "RISING STARS on FIBERGLASS" to keep all this tradition moving fast-forward.  

   We invite all athletes… from all sport backgrounds…to  join us at The Warwick Conference Center,Warwick,New York...   for  the Flying Circus  "LEARN  -TO-POLE VAULT-DAY" on Saturday  March 28, 2015. Come join the RISING STARS and learn to  fly.   All 7-8-9-10th graders welcome.. Boys  3 Hour Session 10AM-1PM   Girls Session 2PM-5PM.. Cost $25 per athlete.. Learn more  at www.hvflyingcircus.com    Register At The Door…Dressed for activity.

posts.Title: SABRINA ANDERSON SIGNS @ NEW HAMPSHIRE UNIVERSITY !!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Academy The Warwick Center For Pole Vault Warwick Valley,NY NEWS FLASH ------ April 17, 2015 IT'S OFFICIAL…. Multi-Event Track and Field Pole Vaulte Champion … SABRINA ANDERSON of Hunterdon Central,NJ has signed her Letter of Intent Track and Field Scholarship at The University of New Hampshire for next Fall. Sabrina…the New Jersey Indoor State Pole Vault Runner Up with Circus Team Mate, Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John,NJ) this winter , will take her talents in the pole vault and javelin to North Country next fall for the Wildcats of New Hampshire. This 12 Foot vaulter will be competing in the 121st Running of THE PENN RELAYS this Thursday at Franklin Field. Sabrina is the proud daughter of Robert and Sarah Anderson of Flemington, New Jersey. CONGRATULATIONS SABRINA fro your FLYING CIRCUS TEAM MATES and COACHES !!! FLYING CIRCUS…. MORE-THAN-POLE VAULT.

posts.Title: "SUPER-LEAPS" this weekend…. DEREK DiBONA FLYS  "BIG" @ New York Relays  !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC The Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley, NY The weather is heating up and so are the Circus performers on runways all across the NorthEast sector…

CONGRATULATIONS to all vaulters this weekend… here are some of the reported results.

New York Relays…Icahn Stadium was buzzing both days ..as Warwick Valley,NY seniors Derek DiBona and Erin Leahey won the super Pole Vault Plaques this year with solid fly-overs. Derek, using his 15' 7' x 195 UCS Cannon…flew BIG over 15' 6" for gold. Enclosed is his BIG jump Over… Ryan Herrera Murphy looked great over 15'0" for Coach Jerry Cahill's Iona Prep crew and James Ball(Fordham Prep,NY) is improving fast over 14' 0" with some air... Senior Matt Greenlaw(Warwick,NY) leaped 13' 0" ands Soph Isaac Heatley punched over 11' 0" for Top Soph honors for Coach Potter's Purple Wave. Jeff Sanawong(Nanuet) flew over 12' 6" and Ormando Watson(BB) made 12' 6" Senior Erin Leahey..the champion sprinter/pole vaulter for Coach Rich Furst's Lady Wave…won her gold at 10' 6"…also by a BIG margin on Saturday morning…matching her older sister Kayla… winning this event in 2011. Red Raider Relays…North Rockland,NY…. Great vaulting both days at North Rockland High School…with Matt Leanza(Suffern,NY) sizzling over 13' 3" PR for gold from the Mounties…team mate Jack Diamond hit 11' 6" to place. Peter O'Neil(CS) leaped 10' 0" for the Vikings. Vinny DePaolo(Monroe,NY) set his personal best in winning his 3rd Frosh-Soph event of the spring ..with his 12' 3" PR on his 13' 7" x 150 UCS Spirit!!! Connor Burke(Pearl River) made 8'6" for the Pirates. In Girls competition..Catherine Walker(Monroe) vaulted 11' 0" for the gold and team mate Samantha Beyar(Monroe) started her comeback with silver at 10'6". In Frosh /Soph action..it was Kristin Lubeskie(Monroe) with the win at 10'0" meet record for the talented freshman from Coach Chris Goodwin's Vault team. Seraya Friedman(Monroe) 8' 3" Kerry Qualter(CS) 8'0" Kali Greenberg(Suffern) 7' 6' !!! New Jersey Up dates… University of New Hampshire signee…Sabrina Anderson(Hunterdon Central.NJ) made 11' 6" on Saturday and had 1 close jump at 12'0" before she blew out her 150 UCS Spirit!!! Section 2,NY- Lady Eagles Invite… Bethlehem Central hosted their invitational at Colonie Central's track while there track is under construction… and Junior Tedi DeMaria was the Jump star…with her winning Pole Vault of 11' 1" and near make at 11' 9".. the first year Track athlete..then placed 2nd in Triple Jump at 34' 10" and placed in High Jump at 4'10" for Coach Ashley Gansel Orange and Black Track Cats!!! Mt SAC, California….. Megan Clark is having an unbelievable year on the vault runways all over the USA!!! Competing for Coach Shawn Wilbourn and the Duke Blue Devils at Mt. Sac.. Megan flew 14' 6" and placed 2nd overall on her Big UCS poles. Megan last weekend flew 14' 9" at the Duke Invite and near missed a New Collegiate Record of 15' 1.5" !!!! Congrats MEGAN !!!! **************************************************************** Club News…. * Another Super Instruction Day today at Circus Outdoor and Indoor Pits. The enthusiasm of our Open Vaulters is inspiring… Many improvements are happening every Sunday… and the NEW KIDS on GLASS are coming!!!! * We start up our Wednesday Night's At-The-Circus program this week with Boys and Girls invited every Wednesday… Class #1 5:30-7pm Class #2 7-8:30pm Join the Flyin' Fun with us!! * Summer VAULT - HOOPLA POLE VAULT MEET and BBQ… Saturday July 18 ALL DAY… EVERYONE INVITED ALL Divisions… All FUN! FLYIN' CIRCUS ……. JOIN THE UPPER WORD MOVEMENT !!!!!

posts.Title: "FEEL-THE-ZOOM" ….  @ ….   FLYING CIRCUS  !!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC   The Warwick Pole Vault Center   Warwick Valley , NY
     It's very true ……. You have no limits !!!!
    This strong and inspiring picture of LACEY HENDERSON ( United States) was  captured  and produced  by Chris Chappell (UCS SPIRIT VAULTING) and presented  in  this years LEGACY VAULT CATALOG .  It symbolizes the spirit that lives  in each of us   … and inspires us to be more.   Not just better pole vaulters….  but even larger ….better human beings.  We believe here  at FLYING CIRCUS….that it's time for us  to step up and contribute more in all areas of our development…. We can be better  students…athletes….community members….volunteers    and   friends.  PASS-THE-ZOOM FORWARD….  YOU HAVE NO LIMITS!
  ***********************************
  Weekend  News/Results
  
  May 3 ----  These are just  some of the reported results from last week  and weekend from our 117 active members of FLYIN' CIRCUS INC.
 
               Crusader Relays….Monroe-Woodbury,NY senior Catherine Walker won the weekend in the State of New York..with her 12' 1" personal best vault at the Crusader Relays . This senior athlete has battled back  from injury and has taken off    for The Purple Pride of Vault coaches Chris Goodwin  and Hugh Cauthers. She heads to Villanova next fall. Also  zooming was  Vernon,NJ all around athlete Cara Kelly with her silver 10'6" clear  and Monroe freshman Kristen Lubeskie placed another  first in Frosh /Soph section at 10' 0". Andrea Dolan(Wallkill) jumped 9'0"  and Siobhan Mariquet(Suffern)  hit 7' 0"
               The Boys Vault went to hometown Monroe,NY   Brandon Nebiker..with his 14' 0" clear to edge Ivan Mieses)Middletown,NY) at 14' 0"..  Ivan  just set his New School Record of 14' 4" last weekend  for the Middies!!!! Matt Leanza is pushing  new heights was 3rd at 13' 0"   Jake Diamond (Suffern) 12' 0"  Vinnie Depalo(Monroe)  won  his 4th Frosh/Soph vault title  of the spring at 12' 6"  Jeff Sanawong(Nanuet) 12' 0"  Connor Burke(PR) 10' 0" PR… Tom Yanetti(Bergen Co VT) 9'6"  Trevor Hazell(Vernon) 10'0"  Mike Dugan(Bergen VT)  8' 6" for Coach Ken Cevoli !!!!
          Brian Ahearn Classic… The Competition at Warwick Valley High School was super Under the Lights…as Derek DiBona(Warwick) put on a show into  a stiff headwind…with a 15' 0" fly-over…followed by team mate Matt Greenlaw(12' 6"0 Nick Nagarsmith(Wash) 11' 6"…Issac Heatly(War) 10' 6"    Jake Corti(Warwick) 10' 0"  Breandan McShane..8' 0"  for the Purple Wave.  The Girls also battled the headwinds..as Pope John,NJ senior Katlyn Rymarzow fly 11' 8" and challenged the meet record of 12' 3" of Meagan Clark(O'Neill,NY)   Katlyn also  flew 15' 4 in  100m Hurdles and 4x4 Relay duty. Erin Leahey(Warwick,NY)   had a super nigh with her 10' 8" vault  2:23/800m  and 4x400 Relay split!!! Freshman newcomer..Emily Welling(Warwick) placed 3rd in vault and then hit 800m PR for Coach Furst's Purple Wave.
       Somers Invite….It was a GREAT NIGHT for Coach Roy Arnesen of Somers High School. Retiring after 30+ years of unbelievable Coaching Cross Country..Indoor Track  and Outdoor Track…and  many State…Section  and League Team Champions…the Track and Field Facility was named forever in his name… Former Somers Track Coach  Tim Fulton did the honors in the presentation. Placing a strong second in the Girls Pole Vault  was Vivian Mroz of Bronxville,NY with her very close jumps at 10' 0". This championship scholastic diver is moving up the ladder  and competes this Friday night @ Friendship Games in Warwick.
    Congratulations  to Samantha Kaplan(New Paltz,NY)  for breaking her school record at 11' 0" last week at Tri Valley Invite   and  Sophia Alter(RV) set her school record at 10' 3" for the Ganders!!!
    Congratulations to Madeysn Hawkins(Coughlin,PA)…this fast and talented sophomore set her school record at 10' 6" last week  and close friend…Ellie "Shooting-Star" Bennet(Crestwood,PA) flew 11' 9" for her school record!!!
  Middle School  winners this week  were Colby Quackenbush(Warwick,NY) with his 7' 6" clear for Coach DiBona on Tuesday   and Genevieve  Reilly(Warwick,NY) flew 7' 7"   in the MS meet in Vault-town.
  College News….  Congratulations to Marrisa Robbins(Manhattan College,NY)  for her 12' 9.75 New Manhattan Vault Record  and MAC Athlete of the Week honors!!!!
   FLYING CIRCUS…. FEEL-THE-ZOOM.

posts.Title: "HIGH PERFORMANCE" …. JOIN THE GROUP @ CIRCUS !
posts.Content:

posts.Title: "CELEBRATING CHILDREN" … JULIA VALENTI SOARS 12' 6" SCHOOL RECORD !!!
posts.Content:
VAULT FLASH - May 14
      *****************************
         North Reading,MASS ….. JULIA VALENT….the Multi-Event junior at North Reading High School is back to her flying tricks again!!!!!  Competing in yesterday's North Reading meet…  Julia flew big over a New School Record of 12' 6" in the Pole Vault for Coach Eric Hastings . Coming off a sensational National Pole Vault Summit in mid January  and an 11th place finish at New Balance Indoor Nationals( 12' 4.75") , this honor student is heading for the Greensboro NB Nationals on June 19-21 after her Mass State  Finals.  The  3 year associate member of Flying Circus will again be at Summer Camp  and Pole Vault Meet on July 16-17-18in Warwick , NY!!! 
         Congratulations Julia from your team mates at Flying Circus !!!!!
     Flying Circus …. Vault Vibrations.

posts.Title: MEGAN CLARK(DUKE) WINS ACC(14' 5.5") …DEREK DiBONA(15' 0") and CATHERINE WALKER(12' 4") WIN OCL VAULTS !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy, LLC
   The Pole Vault Performance Project
   Warwick Valley, NY
    DREAM IT  …….
    SEE IT ………….
    FEEL IT  ………..
    TRUST IT  ……..  
    WELCOME to the "Evolution Chain" for  Pole Vault Success.
    ***********************************************************************
     This weekend was filled  with exciting performances  and spirited attitudes from  your Flying Circus Club - mates.  Here is the scoop…..
     The powerful ACC Track & Field Championships traveled to Tallahassee, Florida to the FSU Mike Long Track Stadium   and Megan Clark(Duke) was ready to compete. After a rough warm up period.. she turned it around with Coach Wilbourn for the  Gold Medal  win at 14' 5.5" bar.  Sarah DeVita(Virginia )  and Kayla Polcari(ND) also  competed  in the rain delayed vault.
    Orange County Championships in Warwick Valley was a treat to watch..as the 23  OCL teams put on a  show of speed…strength  and endurance for  the 2 day format.  Soaring on Friday into strong headwind…senior Catherine Walker(MW) set a personal best of 12' 4"  for the  Crusaders…and Team Mate Samantha Beyar(MW)  added  big points in second place at 11' 0"..followed by Erin Leahey(War) 10' 0"  Kristen Lubeskie(MW) 10' 0")  Meagan Hurwitz(Fall) 8' 6'   Crystal Nelson(ON) 7'0"  and Emily Welling(War) at 7' 0" for the Wave.  The Boys were lead by senior Derek DiBona(Warwick Valley) with his 15' 0" clear for Coach Potter's Purple wave   and a New School Record from Ivan Mieses(Midd) at 14' 9"!!! Matt Greeenlaw(Warwick) flew 14' 0"  followed by Brandan Nebiker(MW)  13' 0"  Vinnie DePaolo(MW)  Nick Negersmith(Wash) 11'6"  Iassac Heatley(Warwick) 11' )''' Josh Hazelnis(Falls) 11' 0" PR!!!!
    Rockland County Championships @ Suffern  saw Daesebo Lim(Tappan Zee) win gold at 12' 6' for the 'Flying Dutchmen'…Matt Leanza(Suf)  12' 0"  Jeff Sanawong(N) 12' 0"  Pete O'Neill(CS) 11' 6'  Jake Diamond(Suf) 11' 6"  Connor Burke(PR) 10' 6" PR!!!  Senior Alison Stern(CS) won  again at 8' 9"  Siobham Mariquit(Suf) 8' 3"  Cali Santangelo(Suf) 6' 6'.
 Up in North Reading,MASS… a New State Relay  Pole Vault Record was broken by North Reading High School Girls Vault Team coached by Solirio Pintzopoulos  and Coach Eric Hastings!!! The 3 Girls relay total was 30'0"…breaking the  old State Relay Record by 2 Feet!!!! Congrats  to Julia Valenti(junior) at 12' 6' again… Rachel Hill..9' 6"   and Marisa Zarella 8' 0"!!!! 
   The Rising Stars are coming…as Amelia Legg(Delhi,NY) set her School   and Section 4 record at 9' 6' this weekend   and Nicole Lester(Ridgewood,NJ)  won the Bergen County Freshman Pole Vault title at 9' 0"  for Coach Brown Maroons!!!  Darien, Cy Vault Champ turned her energy into 4 Event wins (100h---300h---TJ-PV) this past Tuesday for the Blue Wave of Coach Steve Norris. She will compete in the State Heptathlon Championships later this season.
  The Eddy Games at Union College,NY was another sensational gathering of vault athletes…with Bethlehem,NY junior  Tedi DeMaria winning at 11' 6" School Record for Coach Ashley Ganzel.( Picture coming Tuesday) Kerstyn Ciulla(Sachem East,NY) placed second at 11' 0"   Kalli Manly(BH) placed 3rd at 10' 6"   and Maurin O'Connor(Ren-Doan,NY) set another school record at 9' 6" !!!!
    Dominique Beltrez(Cortland Manor,NY)  is firing over the 100m Hurdles…with her new PR of 13.90 at the Princeton Invite  !!! The former vaulter also added  a fast 200m competing unattached this spring !!! WOW!!!!!
   Westchester County Championships @ Byram Hills…It was  senior Vivian Mroz's time  to soar…as  the  championship  scholastic diver for Bronxhills,NY won gold at 10' 0"  New School Record  for Coach Jim Mitchell…  Margaux Neborak(Somers) 9'9"    Taylor Davis(BH) 9' 0"  Devon Feuer(NR) 8' 0" ….Matt Fay of Iona Prep lead Coach Jerry Cahills Vault Crew to the TOP 8 Places…with his 15' 0" sail.
  At The Mid Hudson League Meet… Matt Delorenzo(Wallkill,NY -jumior- won the vault at 13' 6"  and was pushed by New Paltz senior Martin Desmery also at 13' 6'  Dylan Scribani(NP) 12' 0"….. Samaantha Kaplan(NP) is enjoying a super  spring season on fiberglass..winning at 10" 6'  for Coach Gregory…Sophia Alter(RV)  hit 10' 0"  Andrea Dolan(Wall) 9' 9"PR…Kira Magani(NP) 8' 3" !!!
  Great Vaulting is a family affair… and at the Golden Bear Classic in Vestel,NY… the brother-sister team of Johannes  Stromhaug(Vestel)   and Kari Stromhaug(Vestel) dominated the Boys  and Girls Pole Vault… each soaring 11' 6" to bring home the Gold to the   evening Diner Table   . Both are coached by James Cerra!!!
********************************************************************
  SUMMER CAMP REGISTRATION STILL OPEN
  ********************************************************
  We are 90 % Full for our 2 Day Pole Vault Camps at Circus.
  Boys July 13-14    
  Girls July 16-17
  Cost $275 per athlete if received by May  30.
  Late Registration  $300 per athlete  if received by  Camp Deadline  June 15.
      FLYING CIRCUS   …. YOU GOTTA' FEEL IT.

posts.Title: TEDI DeMARIA (Bethlehem,NY) VAULTS TO GOLD @ EDDY CLASSIC !!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Poe Vault Academy, LLC  The High Performance Pole Vault Project  Warwick Valley, NY     TEDI DeMARIA CONTINUES THE FAMILY VAULT TRADITION …..         Vault history was made on Saturday in up state New York as.. first year pole vaulter TEDI DeMARIA of Bethlehem Central blast over 11' 6" in the pole vault to win the Classic Eddy Games at Union College. The former gymnastic star…coached by Ashley Ganzel…. used her 13' 1" x 160 UCS Spirit Fiberglass to the max in setting her New School Record for the Orange and Black of Bethlehem. It was just 20 years... ago that her dad…the legendary Joe DeMaria of CBA-Albany won his 3rd Eddy Games Pole Vault title !!! The SOARING TRADITION CONTINUES !!!!!! CONGRATULATIONS !!!!!    NEW STATE RELAT RECORD for HUNTERDON CENTRAL,NJ… The Pole Vault has always been the primer event at Hunterdon Central, New Jersey… The success was started by legendary Pole Vault coach Jeff Tindal almost 25 years ago…as he fought to have the Gilrs Pole Vault event included in the state of New Jersey. On Monday at the East Coast Relays in Randolph,NJ The Girls Vault Team set another NEW JERSEY STATE RELAYS ALL TIME RECORD with there 3 person total of 32' 0" !!!! Senior Captain…Sabrina Anderson lead the charge with her booming 11' 6' vault for gold… team mate Madison Heft hit 11' 0" and Super Soph Stephanie Tack jumper her PR of 9' 6" to take the old record by 6 inches. HC pole Vault coach Mike Robetti is producing Vault Champions!!!! Also soaring was Michelle Rubinettee(NV-D) at 10' 0" and Caitlin Reverand(NV-D) 10' 0"PR …Sam Siegel(NV-D) winner at 14'0" Brian Ruberstein(Gov.L) 11'0" Jake Doamond(Suffern) 11' 0" Noah Oliff-Lieberman(NV-D) 10' 0"..as NV-Demarest won 3 Person relay at 36' 0" !!! Congrats to Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John,NJ) for another FAST 400 IH..in 66.9!!!    Vernon Township,NJ senior CARA KELLY is enjoying her spring season… with her Sussex County Championship this past week at Newton High School with her 10' 8" jump. Cara will attend the College of St.Rose next fall and will be vaulting on there Track & Field team. Chris ought(Westhill,CT) is also enjoying a super senior season for Coach Neal Perry. Chris won the Danbury Dream Vault at 15' 6" this week and team mate Marc DeLuca placed 2nd at 12' 0"…Christian Parteno(Danbury) 12' 0".   Old Tappan,NJ is still very strong in the pole vault..as Lauren Bilali(OT) won the Bergen County Meet of Champions at 11' 0"…Bridgette Muller(Mahwah) 10' 6" Michelle Rubinetti(NV-D-Soph) 10' 6"PR Caitlin Reverand(NV-D) 9' 6" Jessica Ippolito(FairLawn) 9' 6"…. and Boys Sam Siegel(NV-D) 14' 6" Connor Abernethy(Ridgewood) 13' 0" Jason Babbini(OT) 13' 0" Dante D'Agostaro(Mahwah) 12' 0' Seth Kricheff(OT-Freshman) 11' 6".   Congrats to Dane Sorensen(Warwick Valley ,NY_ and Emily Welling(Warwick Valley,NY) for great vaulting i Mondays Goshen Freshman Pole Vault Championships !!!    FLYING CIRCUS……. CIRCUS SUMMER POLE VAULT MEET and BBQ… JULY 18, 2015 !!!!

posts.Title: "TAKING-OFF" @ FLYING CIRCUS  …. SUMMER CAMP LAST CALL !!!!!!!
posts.Content:
WELCOME TO SUMMER FLYING CIRCUS ...WE invite YOU and your team mates to join our … 8th Summer Flying Circus Pole Vault Camp Blast for 2015. The Camps are separate Boys (July 13-14) and Girls (July 16-17) and take place in the scenic meadows of Warwick Valley,NY at Flying Circus headquarters at The Warwick Center. These two day camps will be packed with Pole Vault Theory…Bio-Mechanics of Running/Jumping ...Dynamic Pole Vault Drills… Proper warm Up Routines... Apparatus Inversion ... Posture Positions… 5 Vaulting Pits… 20 Elite Pole Vault Instructors …. Video Review…Pole Vault Booklet…and the 2015 Camp T Shirt to all participants. This is a Rain or Shine Camp with our indoor and outdoor facilities. We have 225 Vault Poles on site for all campers…Just bring your Spikes …Gatorade and High Energy!!! The Camp is open to all abilities…Middle School 6th graders thru High School seniors…… Beginners…to Rising Stars… to Elite Vaulters… It's time to learn how to fly !!!!

Boys 2 Day Camp Blast Monday & Tuesday July 13-14 4pm-8pm @ The Warwick Center

Girls 2 Day Camp Blast Thursday & Friday July 16-17 4pm-8pm @ The Warwick Center

Registration Forms are available here

Costs:

Camp Registration received by May 30 …. ….$275 per Camper. Camp Registration received June 1-Jun15 ….$300 per Camper Super - Late Registration after June 15 …….. $350 per Camper. Come to Pole Vault Camp this summer….and Catch-the-Flying Circus Fiberglass "Spirit" !!!!

Circus News

May 26 Congratulations to Circus Alumni ... Jordan Yamoah(Texas A/M-Kingsville) for soaring 17' 7" in defending his Lone Star Conference Pole Vault title for Coach Ryan Dall and placing 2nd at the Division II Nationals this weekend at 17'3.5" at Grand Valley State. Jordan will be jumping at our Summer Circus Barnyard Shootout Vault meet on Saturday July 18 in Warwick,NY. There will many others pushing to be the first 18 Footer in the Barnyard!!! All vaulters invite to take part..more detains coming…. The New Jersey Sectionals were powerful in every venue..as 24 Circus Vaulters qualified for this weeks State Groups Finals!!! In Group 2..it was Sam Siegel(NV-D) sailing 14' 6' for the win Dante D'agostaro(Mahwah) 12' 6' Caleb Duffany(NV-D) 12' 6" Justin Walker(Mahwah) 12' 0" ..Bridgett Muller(Mahwah) winning at 11' 0" Caitlin Reverand(NV-D) 10' 6"PR Michelle Rubinetti(NV-D) 10'6" Jenna Braun(Mahwah) 10' 6". In Group 3 Lauren Bilali(OT) advanced at 11' 0" Cara Kelly(Vernon) 11' 0" School Record… Natalie Leon(OT) 8' 6"..Jason Babbini(OT) flew 13' 0" Trevor Hazell(vernon) 12' 6" PR Seth Kricheff(OT) 12' 0" Freshman!!! In Group 4..Jessica Ippolito(FL) 9' 6" Maxine Earl(Ridgewood) 9' 6" Kerry Callaghan(Ridgewood) 9' 0" Nicole Lester(Ridgewood) 9' 0" and Megan Good(Wallkill Valley) 7' 6" in Boys It was Connor Abernathy(Ridgewood) 13' 6' for Coach Tom DeVita!!! in Girls..Sabrina Anderson(HC) sailed to Group Finals at 11' 0"..Stephanie Tack(HC) hit 9' 6" again for the Red Devils.. The Non-Public Groups were lead by Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John) at 11' 0" and 66.3 400IH… Ike Osbun(MKA) won at 14' 0" for Coach Fleming…Brian Sagerdorf(Union Catholic) came up big with his 13' 0" Vault and 187'0 Javelin win!!! Sebastin Camacho( (NP) hit 13' 0" to advance. Congratulations to Ryan Wilkes(Valley View,PA) for winning the PA STATE VAULT title at 15' 6"!!! and Tesia Kempsie(VaultworX) won the girls at 12' 9" for Coach Matt Concannon !!!! In the Suburban Council Champs.. Tedi DeMaria (Bethlehem,NY) won gold at 11' 6" and Kalli Manly(Burnt-Hills0 was solid at 10' 6" for Coach Button!! CONGRATULATIONS TO ALL... FLYING CIRCUS.

posts.Title: MADDIE SCHNEIDER( Darien,CT)…FLYS 12' 0" @ Fairfield County Champs !!!!
posts.Content: Danbury,CT - It is Pole Vault time for Darien,CT senior Track & Field Captain…MADDIE SCHNEIDER. The 2015 Millrose Games Indoor Champion and the 2015 Armory" Indoor Vaulter of the Year" has been taking care of team business most of this spring in all events for Head Coach Steve Norris and The Blue Wave " State Champions" …. The final 3 weeks will now focus on her pole vault event. In Tuesday's Fairfield County Championships.. Maddie flew BIG over 12' 0" for the gold medal win and then was ever so close at 12' 6" on her 13' 3" x 150 from 7 lefts. Robin Bone's School Record of 12' 5.5" is still in her sights!!! The West Point bound Schneider also hit 48.23 in 400 Hurdles and 400m Relay split PR. She will compete in the State Heptathlon(7 Events) on June 16 at New Britian High School. Laurel Baily of Shelton won the SCC Champs pole Vault at 10' 6" also on Tuesday. In Boys Leland Roberts(Danbury) won at 14' 6" followed by Christian Partenio(Danbury) 13' 0" Tommy Chessman(Greenwich) 12' 6" and Soph Marc DeLuca(Westhill) at 12' 6" for Coach Perry. In todays. Section 2 Class Championships.. It was all Kalli Manly of Burnt-Hill,NY in the Fiberglass catapult event..with her 3rd chance win at 11' 0" for the junior Black Belt Champion. Tampa Catholic,Florida State Indoor Pole Vault Record Holder almost did it again at the South Florida Invite…with her very close bar at 13' 4.5". She will be coached by Don Marsh next fall at University of South Florida and will be taking it up at the Flying Circus Camp and BBQ Meet on July 16-18 in Warwick!!! Congratulations to senior Pole Vault Champion..Samantha Beyar of Monroe Woodbury,NY…as she has signed on to compete at the Clemson University,SC next fall. !!!! Samantha will compete in Monday's Twilight FAST TIMES MEET at warwick Valley High School at 6:01PM… Join us at the Most Exciting Track Meet/Pole Vault Gathering of the year!!! Here are our TOP 5 VAULTERS @ CIRCUS LIST (So Far) **************************************************** Girls…. 12 '6" Julia Valenti..North Reading,Mass (Junior) 12' 4" Catherine Walker..Monroe-Woodbury(Senior) 12' 4" Maddie Schneider…Darien,CT (Senior) 12' 4" Samantha Beyar..Monroe-Woodbury (Senior) 12' 3" Kari Stromhaugh…Vestel (Senior) 12' 1" Katlyn Rymarzow..Pope John,NJ (Senior) Boys …. 16' 2" (i) Derek DiBona…Warwick Valley (Senior) 15' 10"(i) Chrisa Rough..Westhill,CT (Senior) 14' 9" Sam Siegel..NV-Demarest (Senior0 14' 9" Ivan Meises..Middletown,NY (Senior) 14' 6' James Ball…Fordham Prep…(sSenior) BIG MEETS Coming this weekend… FLYING CIRCUS……. BUILDING CHAMPIONS…ON and OFF THE FIELD.

posts.Title: KATLYN RYMARZOW (Pope John,NJ) ZOOMS 12' 3" @ FAST TIMES !!!!!!
posts.Content: KATLYN RYMARZOW(Pope John,NJ) ZOOMS 12' 3" @ FAST TIMES !!! The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley,NY NEWS FIBER-FLASH … June 1 @ Warwick Valley,NY CONGRATULATIONS to Pope John,NJ Lady Lions Track Team Captain…KATLYN RYMARZOW ..for winning the Gold Medal tonight with her 12' 3" NEW SCHOOL RECORD for Coach Brian Corcoran. The Princton University bound vaulter/hurdler moved to her 12' 7" grip on her 13' 1" x 150 Spriit(19.3) and sailed all night.. She was super close at 12' 6.5" all three jumps.. Also shining bright again was Bethlehen,NY junior TEDI DeMARIA..with her NEW SCHOOL RECORD for Coach Ashley Ganzel at 11' 9" National Qualifier!!! She was on her 13' 1" x 160 Spirit at 12' 3" bars and was close. Super Soph Madeline Lukshaof the Ursuline School placed 3rd at 9' 9" for Coach Jerry Cahill. In the Boys Fiber action.. It was Ryan Herra-Murphy out dueling team mate Matt Fay…as both cleared 15' 6" and shared their jersey!!! Derek DiBona(Warwick) pushed his Heavest poles all night with great height..Matt Greenlaw(Warwick) 13' 6" Ivan Meises(Middletown) 13' 6"…James Ball..Fordhan Prep 14'0" Special Thanks to our officials.. pit volunteers and parents for a wonderful evening. FLYING CIRCUS ….. Choosing to be Excellent.

posts.Title: KATLYN RYMARZOW WINS NJ STATE OPEN VAULT CATHERINE WALKER (Monroe,NY) Flys 12' 7" !!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley,NY NEWS FLASH ---- June 3 History repeats itself at the New Jersey Meet of Champions Open High School Championships at South Plainfield ,NJ this afternoon…as Pope John,Nj senior Katlyn Rymarzow flew to her second MOC Pole Vault outdoor title with her first attempt clear at 12' 0" for the Lady Lions. Coached by Brian Corcoran and staff… she was close at 12' 6" bars and now heads to Greensboro NB Nationals… Complete Results tomorrow… Sam Siegel(Demerast ) vaulted to Silver at 14' 6"!!! Central Valley,NY..Section 9 State Quals… Jumping into a slight headwind did not bother Monroe Woodbury,NY senior Catherine Walker today at 3:30PM.. Vaulting in the Hugh Cauthers Vertical and Horizonal designed pole vault complex… Walker zoomed to a PR of 12' 7" and had a close bar at 12' 10.75" … Team mate Samantha Beyar also qualified for State at 11'0"…. Derek DiBona(Warwick) and Matt Greenlaw(Warwick) also advanced..as Did Samantha Kaplan(New Paltz..Sophia Alter(Rondout)..Martin Desmery (New Paltz) and Dylan Scribal(New Paltz)..Complete Section 9 results tomorrow!!!!

posts.Title: JULIA VALENTI (North Reading,MASS)  SOARS 12' 7.75" @ STATE MEET !!!
posts.Content: The UCS SPIRIT VAULTING POLES have heated up… and so have the VAULTERS !!!! CONGRATULATIONS to all FLYING CIRCUS VAULTERS across the 5 State Area for outstanding performances again this week.. The 127 Flying Circus members have taken us to a while new level of pole vault development… here is the latest edition of flying off the stick !!! Norwell, MASS - The Massachusetts State Large School Championships @ Norwell High School's New "State of the Art " Track Facility was in full bloom at yesterday's STATE MEET for Large Schools. North Reading HS junior JULIA VALENTI set a new All Time meet record in the vault at 12' 7.75" (School Record) and had 1 close bar at 13' 0" before running out of poe strength!!! This talented gymnastic champion now moves to Saturday's STATE OPEN MEET at Finchberg State University. Julia will also be attending our summer camp and meet July 16--19 in Warwick. North Reading freshman team mate Rachel Hill made 10' 0" to place for Coach Eric Hastings. Saturday's meet record of 13' 0" by Anna McFarlane (2003) is in trouble !!! South Plainfield,NJ - Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John) hit the plant hard at the Meet of Champions NJ All Groups…with her 12' 0" clear. She also won this meet as a soph at 11' 6" on the same runway…and moves on to Greensboro in two weeks for NATIONALS. She had a close bar at 12' 6" for Coach Corcoran's Lady Lions. Placing 5th was senior Lauren Bilali(Old Tappan) with her 11' 0"…Sabrina Anderson(Hunterdon Central) 11' 0" Brigette Muller(Mahwah) 11' 0" Cara Kelly(Vernon) 10' 6" Caitlin Reverand(NV-Demerast) 10' 0". Sam Siegel of NV-Demerast had another successful day with his 14' 6" runner up vault performance. This Dartmouth University bound vaulter will be in Greensboro NB Nationals. Ike Osbun(MKA) 13' 0" Sebastian Camacho(New Providence) 13' 0".. Vaulter Brian Sagendorf(Union Catholic) placed 3rd in Javelin at 194' 3" !! Willowbrook Park,CT - Many great performances from our Connecticut vaulters in their State Class Championships..with 3 taking STATE TITLES… in the rain soaked events… Maddie Schneider(Darien) 10' 6"… Laurel Bailey(Shelton) 10' 6" and Leland Roberts(Danbury) 4'0"…CONGRATULATIONS!!! Also performing super were Lauren Russo(Newtown) 9'6" Danielle Cass(Weston) 9'6" Henry Vossler(Darien) 10' 6" Sophia Corde(Staples) 8'6" Jackie Sgobbo(Newtown) 8' 0" Lia Zagattaro(Greenwich) 8' 0" Chris Rough(Westhill) 13' 0" Tom Chessman(Greenwich) 12' 0" Christian Partenio(Danbury) 12' 0" . Central Valley,NY - The section 9 State Qual meet was held at Monroe-Woodbury's Championship facility… with 8 Flying Circus Vaulters advancing to next week's New York State Finals at Albany University on Friday and Saturday. Catherine Walker(Monroe) senior set a meet record of 12' 7" for the gold medal and top mark in NY state so far this season. Using her 13' x 160 UCS Spirit..she attempted 12' 10.75 for a new section record. Team mate Samantha Beyar(Monroe) heading to Clemson University advanced to state at 11' 0". Also making state was New Paltz,NY junior Samantha Kaplan with her big 11' 0" jump and Sophia Alter(Rondout Valley) at 10' 0" Erin Leahey(Warwick) 10'0" Kristin Lubeskie(Monroe) 10' 0" -Freshman MVP at Monroe this year… Andrea Dolan(Wallkill) 10' 0" PR and Kira Magnani(Rondout Valley) 8' 6". The Boys were up next and also competed into wind.. as Derek DiBona and Matt Greenlaw(Warwick) advanced to state at 14' 0" Matt Delorenzo(Wallkill) flew 13' 9" PR Ivan Mieses(Middletown) 13' 6" … In Division II..It was all New Paltz vault Club with Martin Desmery(NP) winning gold at 13'0" Dylan Scribani(NP) 12' 6" Vinnie Depaolo(MW) 12' 6"..Issac Heatley(Warwick) 12' 0"PR Dagi Tadese(NP) 11' 6" Nick Nerergsmith(Wash) 11' 6" Cosmo Sweeney(NP) 11' 6" !!! FLYING CIRCUS … ON TO THE NEXT CHALLENGE .

posts.Title: "CIRCUS GIRLS" ….. Heading to NEW YORK STATE VAULT FINALS !!!!
posts.Content: Muarin O'Connor(Renssalaer-Doane).. Kalli Manley (Burnt Hills) Tedi DeMaria(Bethlehem) are all smiles after advancing to NY State Vault Finals next week !!!    The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Project    High Performance Pole Vault    Warwick Valley, NY    CONGRATULATIONS to our 19 FLYING CIRCUS Boys and Girls qualifying for next week's NEW YORK STATE POLE VAULT FINALS at the University of Albany. This group is deep on performance and experience and have added some bright new young 'Rising-Stars' to feel the joy and excitement of the Ultimate High School Dream…" The STATE FINALS". The Boys are scheduled for Firday June 12 at 12 Noon ... with the Girls Vault to follow at 3:30pm at the brand new State of the Art Track Facility at the University of Albany. There are 9 Club Boys and 10 Club Girls representing their High School programs……join us at the pole vault pit and CATCH-the-SPIRIT all day long !!!!    CLUB NEWS …..    June 7 …………. JULIA VALENTI(North Reading,MASS) WINS MASSACHUSETTS OPEN STATE VAULT TITLE !!! The junior pole vault/hurdle champion…JULIA VALENTI of North Reading,MASS won her first Open State Pole Vault on Saturday at Fitchburg State University…with her 11' 9" jump for gold… This goes along with her 3 State Class(Large School) Vault Championships …as she heads to NB Nationals on June 19-21 in Greensboro. Julia is the daughter of Steve and Sandra Valenti of North Reading,MASS.   Section 2 Champs @ UALBANY…. There was some great vaulting and friendship at the Section 2 State Qual meet on Friday at the State Meet site…with Bethlehem junior Tedi DeMaria flying 11' 9" again for the gold…and Junior Kalli Manly(Burnt-Hills) taking silver at 11' 0" to advance to state…In Division II(Small Schools).. Renssalaer-Doane standout Muarin O'Conor… won the vault at 9' 3" to punch her ticket to state finals…. Fonda-Fulton,NY junior Ben Vardai-Davidson finished off his sensational multi-event season with his 11' 9" sail at the pole vault pit!!!   * JOIN THE FUN @ 2 SENSATIONAL SUMMER POLE VAULT MEETS !!!      EVERYONE IS INVITED… Not just all our club members…but EVERYONE WHO LOVES TO POLE VAULT IS INVITED!!!!!      IT'S TIME TO …PACK YOUR POLES and HEAD OFF TO THE BARN!!!!     4 COMPETITION PITS GOING ALL DAY LONG…. LIVELY MUSIC BLASTING in the MEADOW…. BBQ with ENTRY FEE…. VOLLEYBALL GAMES after your vault….GREAT VAULT STORIES ALL DAY…. REGISTRATION AT THE DOOR ONLY… $30 per athlete….. ALL DIVISIONS…Middle School…High School…Open…Masters …… Girls/Women start at 10AM Boys/Men start at 2PM . JOIN the VAULT HAPPENING!!!    FLYING CIRCUS BARNYARD MEET…SATURDAY JULY 18, 2015 RAIN or SHINE.    The Warwick Center for Pole Vault    3 Warwick Center Road    Warwick, New York 10990   FRIDAY-SUNDAY July 31-August 2 @ SEASIDE HEIGHTS,NY .. The BEACH VAULT.   Join us at the final meet of the season… The one and only… SEASIDE HEIGHTS BEACH VAULT…   Entry at Vertical Adventures ..Form coming on Wednesday e-mail.    Our Club Instruction Sessions will continue to with our OPEN VAULT SESSIONS EVERY WEDNESDAY EVENINGS and SUNDAY AFTERNOONS till our July 18 Summer Meet.    FLYING CIRCUS ….. LET'S VAULT TOGETHER.

posts.Title: CHRIS ROUGH (Westhill) 16' 0" …MADDIE SCHNEIDER (Darien) 11' 0" WIN CONNECTICUT OPEN VAULTS TODAY !!!!
posts.Content: CGRIS ROUGH(Westhill) FLYS over 16' 0" PR at STATE…MADDIE SCHNEIDER(Darien) WINS 10th STATE VAULT CROWN TODAY !! The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley, NY June 8, 2015 Connecticut State Open Finals The 25 mile per hour cross winds today at the Connecticut State Open Track & Field Championships could not hold back the FLYING CIRCUS VAULT CREW !!! Senior Chris Rough of Westhill High School…coached by Neal Perry for the last 4 years was sensational with a personal best 16' 0" leap for the Gold Medal. Coming off the 6th place All American Indoor finish at NB Nationals at 15' 10"..this UCONN bound athlete is ready for the Greensboro Nationals. Placing second was Joe Fogarasi(Windham) at 15' 6"..as he takes his vault success to the University of South Florida next fall with Coach Marsh. Placing third was Ian Bergere of Daniel Hand High School at 15' 6"PR and will join Rough…Derek DiBona(Warwick) at the University of Connecticut next fall for a powerful Freshman class of Huskies. Placing 4th was Leland Roberts(Danbury) at 14' 6" Tom Chessman(Greenwich) 13' 0" Christian Partenio(Danbury) 13' 0" for Coach Murphy !!! The next runway over..the Girls Vault was shaping up…as Darien senior Maddie Schneider took home another State Pole Vault Championship. It's hard to believe in this complex event..but Maddie won her 10th State CLass(Large School) and Open Vault Championship…finishing an unprecedented career in this event. The West Point bound honor student will vault with Coach Jon Hill's .."CADET FLYER"S" next fall in her leadership program. Placing second was Shelton High School senior..Laurel Bailey at 10' 6 in heavy wind and will also be vaulting at UCONN next fall. Placing 5th was junior Hanna Campos(Weston) at 10'0" and Sophomore Lauren Russo(Newtown) at 10' 0". They will finish next week in Sacco .Maine at New England Championships… Sophomore Danielle Cass(Weston) also vaulted well after her brilliant season for Coach Meadve !!! FLYING CIRCUS…… FAMILY BBQ @ JULY 18 BARN MEET. EVERYONE INVITED.

posts.Title: TEDI DeMARIA (Bethlehem,NY) WINS STATE OPEN POLE VAULT @ 12' 3" !!!
posts.Content: " ALL SMILES" …. Bethlehem High School Head Coach Ashley Gansle(left) and "STATE CHAMPION" Tedi DeMaria celebrated the days pole vaulting at the New York State Finals.     ***********************************************************************   The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project   Warwick Valley, NY   Albany,NY….   June 12 ……… It was a grand site on Friday at The University of Albany's new Track and Field Facility..as the finest High School athletes gathered for the New York State Track and Field Championships to perform athletics …friendships and sportsmanship for the sold out crowd of track & field enthusiasts. The efforts and performances were unbelievable again this year in all events in this rain delayed opportunity.         The Boys and Girls competed on two separate pits and the competition was overlapping and exciting to the very last jump. At the South end of the infield…Bethlehem,NY junior TEDI DiMARIA was enjoying her finest pole vault day with a new school and Section 2 All Time record of 12' 3" for the Gold State Medal. This junior began pole vault just last summer and also competes for Coach Gansle in the Triple jump and High Jump this spring. She had a very close bar art 12' 6" on her UCS Spirit 13' 7 x 155!!!!! She will compete on Saturday at Nations in Greensboro. Also producing a great day on fiberglass was Monre-Woodbury team mates…Catherine Walker and Samantha Beyar… Catherine jumped 12' 3" with air-to-spare for the Federation silver medal and Samantha Beyar was super all day placing 6th at 11'6" for the Clemson bound senior. Kari Stromhaug(Vestel) placed third at 11' 9" for Coach Jum Cerra and heads to MIT next fall for her studies and vaulting. Great news came from the New Paltz Vault Team..as junior Samantha Kaplan(New Paltz) won her State Pole Vault Title in Division II for Coach Ann Gregory at 11' 0"… Junior Sophia Alter(Rondout Valley) soared over 10' 0" for the ganders in blue. Both girls return for a big senior year next fall. Bronxville,NY senior Vivian Morz finished her school record season at 10' 0" for Coach Jim Mitchell.    The Boys competition was close and exciting at the North end infield…. with Derek DiBona(Warwick Valley) staying with his Big Poles all day(15' 7" x 190 UCS) and placed silver in a jump off in the Division I Championships for Coach Mike Potter. Team mate Matt Greenlaw(Warwick Valley) received the Most Improved Award this year at Warwick Valley with his 14' 0" vault…moving his PR up 4 FEET from last year!!!!. Dlyan Scribani(New Paltz-Soph) jumped won his state medal in fifth place in Division II at 13' 6" and Martin Desmery(New Paltz) finished up a super career at 12' 0" this spring. Congratulations to Federation winner Ryan Herra-Murphy(Iona Prep) for his gold medal at 16' 6" for Coach Jerry Cahill.         Always remember……It's not how you place…it's how you compete.        FLYING CIRCUS……. CONGRATULATIONS ALL !!!!!

posts.Title: MADDIE SCHNEIDER (Darien,CT) WINS VAULT @ NEW ENGLAND CHAMPIONSHIPS.
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley, NY USATF Club # 06-1129  Saco,Maine  June 13 ------- HOORAY !!! Darien,CT Senior Captain…MADDIE SCHNEIDER finished her sensational senior season for the BLUE WAVE of DARIEN…with a winning pole vault effort of 11' 9" on Saturday at The New England Track & Filed Championships in Saco,Maine. This powerful and humble multi-event star finished her outdoor season with a perfect slate…UNDEFEATED. Her team leadership and positive modeling will now be carried to West Point Military Academy in just a few weeks. Coached for the legendary Steve Norris at Darien High School for the past four years and competing for The Flying Circus Club at Warwick Valley for the last three years has been a remarkable ride to the top of the charts and New School Records… and is the proud daughter of Christian and Brianna Schneider of Darien,CT. CONGRATULATIONS !!!!!!    Also soaring @ New England Champs was Shelton,CT senior Laurel Bailey. Runner Up at the CT STATE OPEN last week.. Laurel vaulted 10' 9" in Saco and heads to the University of Connecticut next fall. Coming on strong the last 3 weeks was Sophomore star..Lauren Russo of Newtown.CT.. This Flying Circus soph made 10' 3" personal best to end the season and will be in Circus Summer Camp on July 16-17 in Warwick,NY... Weston.CT junior Hannah Campos flew 9' 9' for Coach Medve . In Boys action… Christian Partenio(Danbury,CT) set his PR at 13' 3" for Coach Murphy.   USATF Eastern Regional Championships today at Icahn Stadium….High Point University ,NC Freshman…TODD UCKERMARK started his Summer Rise to the Top…with a short run zoom over 14' 7.75" to place 2nd..as Jen and Rick Suhr looked on with Coach will Nesbitt catching the marks… Circus Coach Ben Simonet had a super day again and readies himself for the World Master Championships in France in September!!!   ….On To Greensboro NB NATIONALS !!!!! The Flying Circus hits the road again….. and will have 15 Circus athletes competing all 3 days this weekend at the super-fast runways at the North Carolina A&T track facility in Greensboro. CONGRATULATIONS to all our National Qualifiers…our Coaching Staff will be on site all 3 days to help !!!!   ….. MARK YOUR CALENDAR NOW…. A POLE VAULT HAPPENING is just 4 weeks away!!!!!          The Flying Circus has invited very former Flying Circus Pole Vaulter …every former Section 9 Vaulter..every former Warwick Valley HS and Monroe-Woodbury HS Pole Vaulter to join our " BBQ and BARNYARD POLE VAULT GALA on Saturday July 18…Rain or Shine at The Warwick Center, Warwick,NY. The stories…performances and friendships will be a treat… Let's Get together and Vault…All Division…MS-HS-Open-Masters…GIrls at 10AM Boys at 2Pm.. Entry still just $30 per athlete… Spectator BBQ…Donation $10…. IT"S GOING TO BE A HAPPENING…HOPE YOU CAN JOIN US!!!!!     FLYING CIRCUS ….. Explore…. Educate… Soar.

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS….. THE PARTY IS ON…. JOIN US SATURDAY JULY 18th !!!!!!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley,NY CALLING ALL POLE VAULTERS…ALL ALUMNI and ALL MASTER VAULTERS…. You are invited to" Celebrate Pole Vault" at our FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Meet and BBQ on Saturday July 18th…Rain or Shine in The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development !!! It is a pure Pole Vault Day…with activities for the entire family….. Bring the kids… grab the lawn chair and blanket…and have some fun in an entertaining summer day in the country. Girls Vaulters…ALL DIVISIONS begin at 10:01AM with 3 Pits of Competition in ability grouping sections…Middle School..High School..College/Open…Masters Divisions all day… The Boys/Men take the stage at 2PM with 3 pits of vaulting to go along with the loud music and half-true vaulting stories… The BBQ kicks up at 2:01-4:01Pm on site..Cost is just $20 per individual…(athletes in the meet attend BBQ FREE!!!)….. …at 5:01pm..the real competition starts up with the old-time…Steel Vaulting Pole Competition for Men and Women…with prizes to the highest human Male and Female. Can former University of Alabama Decathlon star Rich Beattie really clear 9 feet on this day in hometown Warwick!!! Featured in today photo is the Reverend Bob Richards winning the Millrose Games in Madison Square Garden on his Steel Pole and Sawdust Pit…. It will be FUN!!!! … at 8:01pm… we evacuate the site and go thru a de-programing seminar…to bring us all back to reality!!!! Saturday July 18th @ Flying Circus 8-10AM..Girls/Women Register at the door..Cost $30 per athlete.(Includes BBQ) 10:01AM ..Girls/Women Competition Begins on 3 Pits. 1-2PM….. Boys/Men Register at the Door…Cost.. $30 per athlete. (Included BBQ) 2:01PM..Boys /Men Competition Begins on 3 Pits 2:01-4:01PM…. BBQ Starts Up… Music and Parking FREE !!!! 5:01PM… STEEL POLE COMPETITION… FREE TO ALL… WHO HAS THE REAL TECHNIQUE!!!! 8:01PM… Run-For-Your Car !!!!! ********************************************************************************* Circus News…. Congratulations to Tampa Catholic,Florida NIKKI CARROLL for being named the Jr. Sullivan Award winner in Florida last week. Nikki will be a Camp councilor at Circus on Thursday and Friday and will compete on Saturday in Girls HS Vault @ The Barn!!! …Congratulations to Megan Jamerson…the former UCLA Pole Vault Champion for taking the National Club Championship today at Icahn ,NYC with her 13' 1.5" sail for gold. This NYU Grad student in journalism is not thru yet in the vault. Marisa Robbins placed silver at 11' 8". …The BIG RESULT can from our "Belgium Flash"..Coach Ben Simonet of the Flyin' Circus. Ben soared 15' 1" today for a seasonal best and will instruct at Circis Camps this week. He is the favorite in the Steel Pole Meet next Saturday. Ben is coached by Will Nesbitt and heads to France for the World Masters Championships soon!!! FLYIN' - CIRCUS……. "JOIN-THE-MOVEMENT"

posts.Title: HOMER COMES HOME ...CIRCUS CAMPS OPEN TOMORROW. !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Project Warwick Valley,NY    "CIRCUS HOMER" is ready to greet you @ FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT CAMPS !!!! The Boys 2 Day Flying Circus Pole Vault Camp opens tomorrow July 13 and everyone is excited to learn more about the" WORLD"S GREATEST EVENT". The Girls 2 Day Flying Circus Pole Vault Camp opens Thursday July 16 also at The Warwick Center. The Staff is the best ever..the college councilors are enthusiastic and the athletes are ..Ready-To-Fly !!! Saturday July 18th is the "Celebration of Pole Vault Meet and BBQ at the Barn…and it's going to be a 'happening'…EVERYONE IS INVITED… Girls Competition at 10AM Boys at 2PM …BBQ at 2-4PM Steel Pole Exhibition at 5PM.. Bring your spikes…Drinks and Talent for a most exciting day…Rain or Shine!!!!!! Camp Councilors report at 3PM each Day for final instructions and assignments. Camper arrive at 3:30pm Program begins at 4:01pm-8:01pm each day. Each camper should bring spikes and PLENTY of DRINKS….. Our Camps are SOLD OUT for the 8th Straight Year and we thank all parents for sending your children to us this summer. FLYING CIRCUS……. JOIN-THE-MOVEMENT.

posts.Title: SCOTT HOUSTON( OakRidge,NC)…SOARS 18' 1" @ FLYING CIRCUS BARNYARD BBQ MEET !!!!
posts.Content:
FLYING CIRCUS BARNYARD BBQ…SCOTT HOUSTON(Vault House,NC)  18' 1" …MEGAN JAMERSON (UCLA  AMUMNI)…13' 6.5"  RUNWAY RECORDS!!!!!

  The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project
  Warwick Valley, NY
  BARNYARD BBQ MEET…. July 18, 2015

<iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TAlKaW24lp8" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

   It was a true….  "CELEBRATION of the Pole Vault SPIRIT".

   They came from many far places…in cars..trucks…planes   and  yes….. even motorcycles…to share  some good old-time pole vault 'spirit'.  All age…from 9 years old beginners….to 74 years  young…. carrying both fiberglass poles   and vintage steel…as the   sun began to rise over  the eastern mountains of  the Warwick Valley.  The  3 pole vault pits were ready for them…and the positive  atmosphere supplied  the fuel…as records   and great friendships captured the day. 
      
    THANK YOU ALL  for  coming to the party and picnic…the  88 vaulters appreciated   all the clapping…cheering and entertainment all day long.  The   BBQ Food  was  excellent…the  volunteers and coaches  and athletes made the meet our 'BEST EVER @ CIRCUS' ……  This family supported event makes us proud.     MANY THANKS TO ALL !!!!!

  Here's  some interesting stuff….    BBQ MEET….88 VAULTERS !!!!!(Record) !!!!
  ***********************************
   NEW OUTDOOR BARNYARD ALL-TIME RECORDS were set…as light breezes  added the vaulters on 'The FASTEST MONDO RUNWAY in the WORLD'…. certificated…but only 110' in length… Open Men's MVP   SCOTT HOUSTON( Oak Ridge,NC) Vaulthouse Club(Greensboro,NC)… drove  the 7.5 hour trip for his first visit   and lite up the fans  with his 18' 1" leap by a foot!!!. Using his UCS Spirit 16' 1"  x 205  he flew to  the first 18'0+ jump at Circus. He the brushed off 18' 6.5"  from only his  7 Step all day… Watch out Oregon..he is a com in'…. In the Open Womens' Division earlier in the day…. it was former UCLA  pole vault champion…MEGAN JAMERSON time to shine… with her BIG CLEAR at 13' 6.5" for her ALL-TIME BARNYARD RECORD- . This NYU Grad Student  had 1 close bat at 14' 1" as she gets ready for next summer.

   In HS Boys Divisions…DEREK DiBONA(Warwick,NY)   and JOE  FOGARASI(Columbia,CT) each flew 16' 1" meet record to beat of the blasting music   and NIKKI CARROLL(Tampa,FL)   and JULIA VALENTi(North Reading,Mass) took top honors at 12' 0" in the Girls  Division.

  In the  Mens Master Divisions… It was even better…with Ben Simonet(HVFC) winning at 15' 0"(4.51m) as he readies himself  for Worls Champs in France in August…  Mark Cortazzo(Warren,NJ) 13' 0"   Eric Richards(Vaulthouse,NC) 11' 6"  Carlton Huff(Spotswood,NJ) 11' 6"   Reggie Henderson(Rochester,NY) 11' 6"…Bill Crouse(Columbus,NJ) 11' 0"   and John Andreson Long Island,NY)  74 Years young   soaring 10' 0"!!!!

  In Frosh /Soph Divisions… Nick Marino(Hatsboro,PA)  blasted over 14' 0"  and super close over 14' 6" for honors…and Amanda McNelis(Commack,NY) made 11' 1" at the Indoor Pit #1 for gold .    The winner of the Girls Middle School  group  was Genevieve Reilly(Warwick,NY)  with a stunning 7' 0" fly-over for Meet Official Reggie Henderson!!!!

      Full Results  are coming Tuesday Night on our web page…. www.hvflyingcircus.com.
      ********************************************************
   NEXT STOP on the FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Tour….  Seaside Heights Beach Vault,NJ… Entry almost closed..


  Final Open practice session at Flying Circus is this Wednesday evening July 22   5:30-8:30pm…as we will be CLOSED for the month of AUGUST.


     FLYING CIRCUS …..THANK YOU ALL SUPPORTERS.
     ****************************************************************

posts.Title: Time to …… "JOIN-the-CIRCUS" !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project USATF Club # 06-1129 Warwick Valley, New York SEE IT... FEEL IT... TRUST IT... It's time to set your goals in motion... WELCOME to The FLYING CIRCUS FALL PREP POLE VAULTING SEASON. Our Barn Doors are about to fly open again and our Pole Vault Staff has been energized from the late summer rest and recuperation phase. Please join us as often as you can this fall beginning Thursday… September 10 at The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development …3 Warwick Center Road…Warwick, NY. The FALL VAULT season will focus on the Technical Model…with Drills and Short Run Vaulting…on our 3 Outdoor Pits and our 2 Indoor Pits….along with all gymnastic connection apparatus for Beginner…Intermediate and Elite Pole Vaulters who are serious about reaching their potential. Our staff has expanded…and a Positive Coaching Style continues to "SET RECORDS" and "SET POSITIVE EXAMPLES" in our pole vault community. We also will be opening a FLYING CIRCUS Club at The New Balance Armory again…as we reach out to New York City and beyond with our …. "DISCOVER POLE VAULT PROJECT". The Armory Foundation Pole Vault partnership has been a huge success under the direction of Dr.Norbert Sander …. Pole Vault Director…Ben Simonet… and Coaches Will Nesbitt and Michelle Kercado, The Armory Flying Circus will open in mid-November again this year. Our staff at the Warwick Flying Circus of Coach Hugh Cauthers and Coach St. is proud to announce the addition of All-American Pole Vaulter and Super Teacher…Stephanie Duffy to Pole Vault Instruction Crew!!!!! The Warwick Flying Circus opens Thursday September 10 - November 8…every Tuesday and Thursday evenings and every Sunday afternoons. See times and prices below… and JOIN-the-MOVEMENT when you can.

WARWICK FLYING CIRCUS FALL POLE VAULT INSTRUCTION SEASON

September 10 - November 8 Beginning September 10, 2015 Every Tuesday and Thursday Evenings…. Class # 1 5:30-7PM and Class # 2 7-8:30PM COST: Still only $30 per athlete per 90 minute class Boys and Girls Combined Classes Every Sunday Afternoon ….. Class #1…Girls only 12:30-2PM Class # 2… Boys only 2-3:30PM COST: Still only $30 per athlete per 90 minute class Athletes should be dressed for activity…including small spikes and drinks. Instruction will be Inside and outside. All athletes must have a current USATF Membership Number… Apply at usatf/membership.com . We will be hosting our annual progressive 5 Step Pole Vault Meet and 6 Step Pole Vault Meet at the Vault Barn to prepare you for your Indoor Season meets. Everyone is invited to join these "FUN DAY on FIBERGLASS". FLYING CIRCUS 5 STEP MEET... Saturday October 17 Girls @ 10 AM Boys @ 2PM Entry Fee- $30/Athlete FLYING CIRCUS 6 STEP MEET... Saturday October 31 Girls @ 10 AM Boys @ 2PM Entry Fee - $30/Athlete We are excited to help you improve this year….. Join us ASAP !!!!

NEWS NOTES

  • Congratulations to Scott Houston (VaultHouse-Greensboro,NC) for soaring to 18' 5'5" this weekend and just missing the Olympic Qualifying Standard of 18' 8"!!!!!
  • Special salute and a Club Thank You to Coach Will Nesbitt for donating and building our new HIGH BAR outside arena for real BUBKA'S practice.
  • We have added a NEW SAND VAULTING PIT for all Takeoff and Chest Drive Drills for this Fall.
  • Special Thanks to Samantha Beyar(Monroe) for donating equipment to the club members this month and Katlyn Rymarzow(Pope John,NJ) for donating her private HS Vaulting Poles to all club members !
  • Our Winter Club Vault Training Package (November 9- Feb. 9) Registration Forms will be sent out thru e-mail and posted on Web page for download on Sept. 15. We take only 20 Boys and 20 Girls in the Winter Package…on a first paid/first served basis. Cost is still $450 for the 3 month Instructional Package of 2 class per week from Nov. 8-Feb.8. This is our most popular and most economical Training Package we offer at our club. It has sold out in 3 days in the past.. If you are serious about taking part in this Training Group… Register FAST!!!
FLYING CIRCUS... LIVIN' the DREAM.

posts.Title: "VAULT CIRCUS" OPENS BIG …in  WARWICK,NY !!!!!!
posts.Content: THANK YOU and CONGRATULATIONS to all our FALL POLE VAULTING TEAM @ FLYING CIRCUS. You have started the engine and you will be ready for a SUPER INDOOR SEASON. Our Tuesday and Thursday evening classes are in full swing and our Sunday Open sessions are packed with the "RISING FIBERGLASS STARS" of the future. Good things are happening @ Flying Circus. Let's keep rolling up to the top !!!!! Fiber-News... Sept. 20... "MOTIVATING TALENT"….Kids today want disciplined direction. Set your "GOALS" and CHASE your DREAMS. We train hard and we see your spirited efforts. CHAMPIONS are made…when NOBODY is watching. Keep to your regular routines on the days when you are not vaulting. Do not let a day get by you in training… Missed Training days can not be made up later. When practicing…try to practice the little things to perfection. Remember..it's the little things that separate the Average vs Elite. Do you have the Elite Mentality to Perform BIG!!!! Keep training !!!! "GIRLS WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE" is now SOLD OUT!!!! Many thanks to the first 20 Girls who have registered and paid for our November 9-Febuary 9 WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE on Tuesday and Thursday nights this Winter. The Boys WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE has only 8 spots remaining for the Monday and Wednesday training this Winter 2 Circus.. Enter ASAP to Vault with us this Winter!!!! AVOID the WAITING LIST!!!! Registration forms at www.hvflyingcircus.com. Many thanks to all. Special thanks to two great Vault Coaches for Donations to our club athletes and facility today. Coach Neal Perry(WestHill,CT) has donated a new Steel Vault Box for Pit #6…. and Coach Rob Pasek(Mahwah,NJ) has donated a super set of steel Pole Vault Standards for Pit #3 Up-Grades !!!! Thank you both from Flying Circus athletes and staff !!!! MARK-YOUR-CALENDAR" ….. Just 26 more days till our CIRCUS 5 STEP MEET at the Barn…on Saturday October 17… Girls Meet at 10AM Boys Meet at 2PM…Entry $20 per athlete at the door!!! JOIN THE FUN in this technique meet…. from just 5 Lefts!!! Who has the best technique ???????? "SEEDS of GREATNESS" ****************************** * Speed is a skill…it can be taught. * Great athletes are not born… they are developed. * Kinetic Learners are wired for Bio-Mechnics Feel … Bio-Motor. * Extra-Ordinary Results = Extra-Ordinary Efforts. * Go beyond your boundaries. * We train animals…. but… we EDUCATE PEOPLE. FLYING CIRCUS…. Good Vibrations.

   If you can  dream it… you can achieve it .   It's time to focus and prepare for your BEST SEASON EVER.  Your indoor season success depends on your training NOW.  Don't wait till the High School teams first official practice session….. begging  NOW to chase-your-dreams.   Here are some thoughts on  'PREFORMING YOUR BEST' .

   * Beware of the 'COMFORT ZONE'…. Start push yourself HARDER in training.

   * BIG THINGS HAPPEN… when you REACH HIGH.

   * CHAMPIONS are MADE…. when NO ONE is watching.

   * Take a measure of yourself.

   *  Either  "IN"  or  "OUT" ..Get MOTIVATED.

   * ENTHUSIASM takes on a LIFE-of-it's-OWN.

   * Sweet are the uses of ADVERSITY  -- Shakespeare

   * PLANT your FEET….   and  .. STAND FIRM.

   * TODAY …..I WILL BE MOTIVATED.

   FLYING CIRCUS  5 STEP MEET…Just 18 DAYS AWAY  !!! ARE YOU READY !

   SPECIAL THANKS to MARK MERCHANT for donating 2 NEW UCS SPIRIT Pole for all Club members!!!!!!

FLYING CIRCUS …. GO FOR IT.

posts.Title: "HUMBLE CONFIDENCE" ….@ CIRCUS 5-STEP MEET !!!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project Warwick, New York October 18, 2015 It's true…'HUMBLE CONFIDENCE' ….is the Key to Long Term Athletic Success ! …… and there was plenty of this confidence flying around this past Saturday at The CIRCUS 5-STEP MEET in the 100 year old dairy Vault Barn at the Warwick Center. A record 52 vaulters for our 5 Step Meet arrived early and stayed late for the FUN…MUSIC and COMMUNITY FRIENDSHIP in the 7 hour gathering of "Fiberglass Nuts". In all, 21 Personal bests... along with 8 New School Indoor Records and a Ton-of-Fun was had by all. Thank you for a GREAT SATURDAY….NEXT MEET…Saturday October 31(Halloween Day) at THE 6-STEP MEET…Girls at 10AM Boys/Masters/Open at 2PM…Costumes Optional !!!!! JOIN the PROJECT !!!! GIRLS RESULTS … New York State Outdoor Champ…Tedi DeMaria(Bethlehen Central,NY) set the table for success with her 12' 3" PR from 5 Step on her 165 UCS Spirit…Amanda McNelis(Commack,NY) hit 11' 6" for Silver for Coach Jim Henderson. The Middle School Girls were all sensational.. with Warwick Valley 8th grader Genevieve Reilly cranking up 8' 6" to break the Warwick Middle School Record..followed by Carmen Sullivan(Totowa,NJ) making 8' 0' in her first vault meet ever….. A near NJ State 3 Girls Relay record of 30' 6" came from Norther Valley -Demarest of Caityn Reverland 11' 0"-Michelle Rubinetti 11' 0" and Erin Yuder 8' 6"…Hunterdon Central State Mark of 32'0" !!! 25 Girls competed before a roaring crowd. posts.Title: "HALLOWEEN FLYING" @ CIRCUS …Tedi DeMaria (12' 4") …. Nick Marino(14' 1.25") Lead -the-Circus-Pack !!!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Project Warwick,NY Meet #2 6 STEP HALLOWEEN VAULT October 31 - Before the candy…. The Day belonged to Pole Vault. CONGRATULATIONS to all 43 Pole Vault enthusiasts for making HALLOWEEN 6 STEP another FUN DAY TOGETHER. The chilly night air was replaced with some hot vaulting technique in the drafty old Barn at The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development. Sportsmanship and Friendship was on display all day…with costumes and music revving up the filled seats of proud parents and spectators. Many thanks to all volunteers helping with all the meet details of scoring…bar placing and standards adjustments. " VOLUNTEERS MOVE-THE-WORLD "…… THANK YOU. AM GIRLS SECTION….. New York State Champion..Tedi DeMaria flew over 12' 4" and was close at 12' 8" on all three attempts…Commack,NY junior…Amanda McNelis punched her first ever 12' 1" Leap of Faith and close bars for Coach Jim Henderson at 12' 4"!!! Stephanie Duffy(Wash'ville,NY) took the open at 12' 7" as Waldo Costume looked great…Genevieve Reilly(Warwick,NY) set another 8th grade record at 9' 1" to win Middle School…and Chloe Pasek(Mahwah,NJ) lifted to a personal best elementary school record of 7'7" for the 6th grader!!!!! 12 School Records were set by the Girls!!! posts.Title: TIME-TO-FLY" …. WINTER CIRCUS CLUB TRAINING BEGINS …
posts.Content: *********   The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Project   VAULT BARN …. WARWICK,NY   USATF Club # 06-1129    The Flying is about to start @ FLYING CIRCUS, Warwick,New York. Our Sold Out WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE ..for the 60 Boys and Girls begins on Monday November 9 for Boys and Tuesday November 10 for Girls and the excitement of Indoor Track & Field builds. The Flying Circus Fall Training on Tuesday and Thursday evenings was our 'Best Ever' and you have set a solid foundation for a super season ahead. Our Sunday Open Classes remain in effect ALL WINTER and SPRING and we look forward to helping all vaulters not in our WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE. Let the good times roll.   WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE… Guidelines and Routines. *******    Boys training groups are Monday and Wednesday's November 9-Feb.8 Class # 1 5:30-7:00pm Class # 2 7-8:30pm    Girls Training groups are Tuesday and Thursday's November 10-Feb.9 Class #1 5:30-7pm Class #2 7-8:30pm    There is now a WAITING LIST to get into this Training Group.      There are NO MAKE UP DAYS in this Package. A missed class is a missed class.    There is NO CLASS or GROUP CLASS SWITCHING…as the schedule is balanced and tight with numbers.    Any Facility CLOSING due to weather related safety will be announced by e-mail by 2PM on Class Day.    Our Facility will be CLOSED on Wed. November 25 and Thursday Nov. 26 for Thanksgiving.. Dec. 24/25 for Christmas..Dec. 31 and Thursday Jan 14 for National Pole Vault Summit in Reno,NV.        Guidelines for Athletes/Parents        ************************************          * ON TIME ATHLETICS….Athletes should be ready for class 10 minutes before the posted class start time.          * NEAT & CLEAN……Athletes should dressed NEAT & CLEAN ….. Just like World Elite Athletes Dress for Training.          * NO PROFANITY…..Athletes should represent their Family Ethics..Morals and Values at all time. Guard your language.          * SUPPORT TEAM MATES …..Encourage each other at all times.          * POLE REPLACEMENTS… Athletes breaking a club pole will be responsible for replacing 50% of Retail Value of a new vaulting pole.          * NO POLE RENTALS or LOANING of POLES …. See your Athletic Director and HS Track Coach for your Vaulting Pole needs for this Winter and Spring.       FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT(Warwick,NY) are extremely proud to welcome ALL-AMERICAN POLE VAULTER…STEPHANIE DUFFY to our COACHING STAFF. This 5 Time ACADEMIC ALL AMERICAN from The University of South Florida and 3-Time New York STATE CHAMPION and NATIONAL RUNNER-UP will be a huge asset at Flying Circus. Her positivity is unmatched and her passion for teaching is her gift. Welcome Coach Stephanie Duffy !!!!!     FLYING CIRCUS VAULT CLUB ….. "FEEL THE SPIRIT"

posts.Title: "ALL-AMERICAN"…STEPHANIE DUFFY… Joins FLYING CIRCUS COACHING STAFF !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Warwick, New York WELCOME HOME…STEPHANIE DUFFY !!! The Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy proudly announces the return one of our finest vaulters ever…STEPHANIE DUFFY .. to our Pole Vault Coaching Staff here in Warwick, New York. Stephanie Duffy put the Flying Circus on the Vault Map…with her 3 New York State Pole Vaulting Championships( 13' 1.5") …her 3 Time All-American High School honors…her Runner-Up at Nike Outdoor Nationals (12' 10.75")…Her Many Diving Accomplishments at Washingtonville High School… her National Honor Society accomplishments and her Perfect Attendance all four years in High School and her leadership skills both in High School and College. Stephanie comped at a Championship Level for the University of South Florida, Tampa,Florida for coaching legend…Don Marsh. She was BIG EAST POLE VAUL Champion…a 5 Time ACADEMIC ALL-AMERICAN with a personal best pole vault of 13' 6.25" for the South Florida BULLS Track & Field Team. She majored in Elementary Education and graduated with Honors and Dean List status and now teaches young Elementary Students in her home district at Washington Central Schools,New York. Her positive approach in teaching and her patience with young children are above reproach. She has excellent Bio-Mechanics understanding of the complex pole vaulting movements. FLYING CIRCUS MOVES UP TO A NEW LEVEL with COACH DUFFY on board. Stephanie is the proud daughter of Ed and Kathryn Duffy…Monroe, New York. FLYING CIRCUS …. "FEEL-the-SPIRIT"

posts.Title: ANDY WASNIK POLE VAULT MEET @ CIRCUS … December 5!!!!  JOIN the FUN!!!!
posts.Content: It's FULL RUN APPROACH TIME at FLYING CIRCUS !!!! The FALL VAULT PROGRAM has graduated….. the foundation is set…it's time to … FIRE-UP YOUR LONG RUN . Everyone… and I mean all Elementary..Middle School…High School…College..Open and Masters Age groups Pole Vaulters to gather for the VAULT- FEST this coming Saturday… December 5, 2015 at the ANDY WASNIK CLASSIC INDOOR POLE VAULT MEET in that ..'magical old barn on Warwick Center Road, Warwick,NY. Bring your friends…parents..grand parents and team mates to join the Pole Vault Community @ Flying Circus. The Girls/Women's Meet will start at 10:01AM…as our Barn Doors swing open at 9:01AM for warm up activities. All registration is at the door at $20 per athlete. Spectators free!!! The Boys/Men's Meet will start at 2:01PM…and Warm up begins at 1PM.. Free Parking…Free Music…Free Bathrooms!!!! Real Bar starts low…Elem/Middle School Competition on Runway #1 (Green Pit) High School/Open/Masters Competition on Runway #2 (Red Pit). Horns…Tambourines…Drums welcomed…. Join the "Greatest Spectators in our Sport" …. "Create - the - Spirit" with us this Saturday!!! * ARMORY POLE VAULT CLINIC a HUGE SUCCESS … Congratulations to Armory Pole Vault Development Director…Ben Simonit for producing our BEST Pole Vault CLINIC ever for our Armory Kids on Fiberglass program. Armory President Dr. Norbert Sander again is fueling our event..along with Armory Foundation Will Nesbitt. They have again included both the Boys Jr.Pole Vault Event for this years NYRR Millrose Games(Thursday evening Feb. 18) and the Girls Jr.Pole Vault Event(Saturday Feb. 20) . GET YOUR MILLROSE GAMES tickets NOW!!! It's an OLYMPIC YEAR!!!!! Go to armorytrack.com for detains. Meet Director Ray Flynn has an unbelievable day planned for the 'Track & Field Nuts' this year@ NYRR MILLROSE 2016!!!!! * UCS SPIRIT NATIONAL POLE VAULT SUMMIT…January 15-16… Registration for this Pole Vault Gala is on line at ucsspirit.com/summit. This Reno,Nevada Pole Vault educational summit is the best single event Track & Field extravaganza in the world. Check with your Indoor Track Coach for permission/interest and schedule. Early registration Deadline Dec. 1. * "PERSONAL AWAKING" … As the experts always say…and quite frankly they are correct… "… there is always some one your heels." There are many young.. completely dedicated pole vault athletes in the USA again this year….. Over 110,000 young boys and girls across this great land have taken up the challenge of our pole vault event. Many of them never missing a workout… always pushing themselves to an extreme level and always willing to help their team in other events. How will you measure up to this GREAT CHALLENGE ???? Will you come to practice ..'Ready-to-Grow'…ready to Take a Risk on Yourself.... Ready to MOVE UP to the NEXT LEVEL of SPIRIT ???? It's time to devote yourself to an IDEAL. …. The IDEAL that states….BECOMING THE BEST I CAN BE. NOTHING MORE and NOTHING LESS. Hope to see you Saturday ..for some "AWAKING" !!!! FLYING CIRCUS …. TRAIN…LAUGH…. DREAM.

posts.Title: "SPIRIT RINGS" …@ ANDY WASNIK POLE VAULT CLASSIC !!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project   The Warwick Center   December 5 ….. ANDY WASNIK POLE VAULT MEET       EVERY VAULTER COUNTS !!!!! Congratulations to all 52 Pole Vaulters participating in our 4th ANDY WASNIK POLE VAULT MEET at the Flying Circus on Saturday. Pole Vault Coach Andy Wasnik of Park Ridge,New Jersey was a special educator…special coach and special human spirit. Coach Wasnik always found the time for every vaulter and every athlete on his and his wife Connie 's Park Ridge team. His patience and his encouraging positive words were his trade mark that he passes on to all of us. Thank you all for competing in his name this weekend.    There was plenty of that old fashion "Wasnik Spirit" swirling around that second floor hay loft at Flying Circus …as 52 talented and determined young athletes hit their strides on the fast blue Mondo runway and keeping up with the beat and spectators clapping. The atmosphere produced 'flo-state'…as school records..personal bests and new confidence for the up coming season. Elementary student..Chloe Pasek of Mahwah.nj got the crowd going in the morning session with an 8' 1" personal best and then 74 year old Age Group Master World Record Holder..John "Doc" Andresen cleared 10' 1" by a wide margin to prove again that "SPIRIT … NEVER GRADUATES ". A shout out of THANKS to all our Vault Volunteers for helping the meet run smooth and fast… Coach Duffy..Coach Nesbitt…Soren Sorensen… Bob Sorensen…Dante..Dylan….Brian ...Samantha and all other Standard and Bar Placers all day.!!!!    Girls Recap and Results……..The Girls HS Division was loaded…as 7 Girls flew 11' 1"+… with Northern Valley,NJ Junior speedster Michelle Rubinetti clearing 11' 7" personal and school all time best for Coach Mike Ives. Using an early season low grip of 11' 8" and near misses at 12' 1". Team mates Caitlin "Rev" Reverand flew 11' 1 and Erin Yuder hit 10' 1" PR for a fantastic 32' 9" Girls Circus Indoor Relay Record !!!! Warwick Valley,NY Middle School 8th grader..Genevieve Reilly flew 9' 1" to finish her unbeaten Fall Circus series…Chloe Pasek(Mahwak,NJ) wins the 6th grade honors at 8'1"…Flying Circus Coach Stephanie Duffy went BIG over 12' 7" and close at13' 1" bars .    Girls HS Results:    11' 7" Michelle Rubinetti(Demarest,NJ) School Record    11' 1" Alana Carroll (Albany NY)    11' 1" Sophia Alter(Rondount Valley,NY) School Record    11' 1" Caitlin Reverand (Demarest,NJ)    11' 1" Kalli Manly (Albany , NY)    11' 1" Samantha Kaplan (New Paltz,NY)    11' 1" Bridget Muller (Mahwah,NJ)    10' 7" Nicole Lester (Ridgewood,NJ)    10' 7" Danileel Cass (Weston,CT)    10' 1" Jessica Ippolito (Fair Lawn,NJ)    10' 1" Erin Yuder (Demarest,NJ)    10' 1" Maxine Earl (Ridgewood,NJ)     9' 7" Lia Zavattaro(Greenwich,CT) School Record     9' 1" Sydney Woods (Demarest,NJ)     8' 1" Ali Fiore (Old Tappan,NJ)     7' 7' Kaia Becker (Northern Highlands,NJ)     7' 1" Kendra Ackerman (Warwick,NY)     Elementary School      8' 1" Chloe Pasek (Mahwah,NJ) School Record     Middle School      9' 1" Genevieve reilly (Warwick,NY) School Record      8' 1" Nicole Ruggiero(Greenwood Lake,NY) School Record      7' 1" Hannah Soloman-Holland(Suffern,NY) School Record    Open Women    12' 7' Coach Stephanie Duffy (Washingtonville,NY) ***********************   Boys Recap and Resuls…….The afternoon session featured the strong Boys and Men dueling on fiberglass…with 10 HS Boys flying 13' 1"+…and the winner is…Horseham.PA junior…Nick Marino with a super-fly over 14' 1" and a bid to Boys Jr.Millrose Pole Vault Feb. 18 at the Armory!!! Mark DeLuca(Westhill) won Connecticut honors at 13' 9"PR and Peter Chan (Delbarton) won New Jersey honors at 13' 7" and Liam Ackerman(Plainsview) took the New York crown at 13' 7" … A super performance came from 8th grader Conor Reilly(Scotch Plains,NJ) with his school record 11' 7" win… Flying Circus Coach Ben Simonet won the Open Division at 14' 7" and John "Doc" Andresen(LI.NY) again was great taking over 10' 1" to win the Masters 74 Year Division !!!!
