posts.Title: "FLY-CIRCUS" @ TEXAS RELAYS ~~~~ KAELI THOMPSON hits Target ---  13' 6" (4th Place) !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project, LLC Warwick Valley, New York

"EVERYTHING MATTERS"

This was the theme and attitude posted up on the University of Texas Football Facility front door ...as I walked into my first CLYDE LITTLEFIELD TEXAS RELAYS extravanganza this past weekend with Coach Mike Potter,Coach Curtis Ackacki, Greg Thompson and pole vaulter Kaeli Thompson. This 92nd Running of the Texas Relays was a treat for the ultimate Track & Field Nuts attending. Everything was first class.... and the the Texas Exes and constituents from around the campus teamed up to establish the ....."Texas Fans Make Us Proud" initiative to promote good sportsmanship at all athletic events for the University of Texas. The University of Texas is a leader of college sportsmanship and they make UT sporting events a model for safety, civility and team pride. THANK YOU UT for showing us the model...... "EVERYTHING MATTERS". Friday- March 29.. The Girls High School Championship Pole Vault event kicked off at 4:15pm..with a Texas Tailwind and the Top 10 Girl High School Vaulters were ready to fly. Warwick Valley,NY senior..Kaeli Thompson...Coached by Mike Potter and Curtis Ackacki was ready coming off her NB Pole Vault National Championship Indoor meet. Using her BIGGEST Poles ever.. she flew to a New School and Section 9 record with her 13' 6" clear on her 14' 1 x 170 stick. She had two close bars at 13' 9" and placed 4th overall in her opening outdoor meet. It was also the 4th Best Vault on NY States All Time Outdoor list!!! CONGRATULATIONS KAELI!!!!

CIRCUS NEWS UPDATES

* Special Thanks to all our Coaching Staff for covering our instructional classes this week. It takes a village to Run-the-Circus and eveeryone always come thru to keep the Vault Train Rolling forward. * Sorensen Consulting Pole Rentals and Sales are going strong again this spring. All athletes needing poles for the spring Track Season should connect with Bob Sorensen ASAP.... as the season is now revving up fast. All Indoor Rented poles should be returned by now to avoid any late charges. Thank you for helping fund our Pole Rental/Sales Project this year. * Our Wednesday Night Open Vault Sessions have just 2 weeks to go. We willbe open April April 3 and April 10 at Regular evening times to help all vaulters get ready. WEDNESDAY NIGHT OPEN SESSIONS END APRIL 10. ... as the Circus Coaching Staff will be at various dual meets during the weekdays and Saturdays. We will still have instruction every Sunday at Regular times posted.((We will be closed for EASTER SUNDAY... April 21... for Family Bonding). * Our Summer Pole Vault Camps are filling up FAST NOW... If you plan to be with us this Summer(July 8-12) registration forms are at our web site www.hvflyingcircus.com. We limit this summer camp to a first register/first served policy. Beginner levels/Intermediate Levels/ Elite Levels of Instruction....Four outdoor Pits/2 Indoor Pits/excellent instruction/Fun for all --- Join us this summer @ Flying Circus. * Our BBQ "AIR-RUSH" Pole Vault Meet will be held Friday Evening July 12 for Midddle School and Freshman Divisions athletes only. Our BBQ "AIR-RUSH" Meet for all others will be Saturday July 13...Girls Division 10AM Boys Division 1:45PM... BBY at 2PM. Music ...Fun....Great Food!!!! * CONGRATULATIONS to JENN SUHR for an unbelievable TEXAS RELAYS 16' 1.5" Leap to gain the global lead again. This warrior..at age 37..refuses to quit . She had 2 close bars at an American Record 16' 5"!!! Also a shout out to Dane Sorensen for another great win at Widner Invite this weekend at 15' 7" for the Cortland University Red Dragons!!!! FLYING CIRCUS.... KEEP TRAING with a PURPOSE.

posts.Title: FYIN'CIRCUS SUMMER POLE VAULT MEETS
KAELI THOMPSON FLYS @ NATIONALS.... 13'  5" !!!  SUMMER CAMPS SOLD OUT !!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC The Warwick Center ... "CIRCUS BBQ MEET"... July 12-13 !!!! FRIENDSHIPS & FUN @ NB NATIONALS CONGRATULATIONS to our "12 Circus Acts" at this weekends ...National Stage of Pole Vaulting Fun. It was exciting seeing all the wonderful interactions with other club athletes.... the sharing of ideas with the club coaches and the professional officials making it a special day for all competitors. The human performance levels and human spirit was at it's best all weekend. This is the perfect design for athletes-in-sport. ......on-to-the- BBQ MEET!!!!! GIRLS @ NATIONALS ~~~~ Warwick Valley,NY senior all purpose athlete...KAELI THOMPSON had a sensational double All-American events for Coach Mike Potter's Purple Wave Track & Field machine. Just before the pole vault event...she raced to a personal best 26'1 on her second leg of her 3rd place Sprint Medley Relay ...handing off the baton to her little sister on the fly. There 4:01.68 brought home her 4th All American medal... Then in the pole vault 12 minutes later... she flew 13' 5" for another 3rd place for her 5th All American status in her brilliant career at Warwick. She then took 2 great vaults at the NY State RECORD of 14' 1.5" held by Mary Saxer (2001). Kaeli has 2 more shots at that record... Jr. U-20 Nationals and the Circus BBQ Meet on July 13!!!! Also making Emerging Elite All American was Paige Martin ...coached by Russ VanSteeg at NFA.CT.. Paige placed 5th at a school and personal record 12' 1" ~~~~ Sprint/Hurdle sensation.. and double PA State Champion...Trina Barcarola of Western Wayne(Coached by Bob Amos) flew 12' 1" for 11th place in EE. In the Freshman National Champs competition..it was another personal best day from powerful Sophie Maiecki of Washingtonville,NY. Coached by Stephanie Duffy and brother Nick Marecki... Sophie flew 10' 6.5" and was so close at 11' 1" on her 12' x 140 UCS Spirit. Sophie is our clubs Most Improved Freshman this year!!! In the Tursday Middle School National Champion Section...a New Star was shining bright... as 7th Grader..Lily Ann Beattie of Warwick Valley Middle used her 13'1" x 140 Essx Recoil to the max...with her 15th National place at 8' 7" for the Warwick Track Club Rising Star. BOYS @ NATIONALS ~~~ 5 CIRCUS BOYS ..... Leading the Boys group was Junior Conor Reilly(Union,NJ) and Liam Landau of Pascack Hills,NJ. Conor Reilly fought his way up ...clearing 15' 1.5" in the Emerging Elite on Friday. This junior has produced big in his big meets this year. Liam Landau capped off his sensational career at Pascack Hills...which included tremendous Hurdling..long jumping ...high jumping and pole vaulting.. His 15' 1.5" on Sunday was solid. He takes his talents to Northeastern University this fall. Washingtonville,NY junior...Nick Mirecki...coached by Stephanir Duffy flew 14' 1.75" by a ton on his 187 Essx and then moved up at 14' 8" to his longer sticks for close bars.. Sophomore star..Louis Martinez of Wallkill,NY went big also at 14' 1.5" and returns for two more years.. Nanuet,NY Senior--Chris Filatov finished a sensatonal career at 13' 7.75 for Coach Larry Beckerly's Golden Knights! CONGRATULATIONS ALL... YOU MAKE US PROUD. SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMPS....SOLD OUT !!!! THANK YOU ALL For the 7th Straight Time... we would like to thank all parents for entering their children in our Summer Pole Vault Camps here at Flying Circus. It is a treat for us to help them this summer. Our 6 pits and excellent staff of coaches and college Champions will make if a strong learning experience . Each Camper is also invited to join in the Circus BBQ Vault Celebration on July 12 and 13th to end the Summer Season. Details on web site for the Registration Day-Of-Meet at site event. TUESDAY TWILIGHT MEERS JUNE 18 and JUNE 25 ...NEW START TIME The Tuesday Night Meets have EXPLODED!!! New Record 47 Vaulters last week and Growing each week. We will now start EARLIER for our final two weeks... NEW MEET TIMES... REGISTRATION at Site at 4:30pm... Bar goes up on 3 pits at 5:15pm... Rain or Shine... JOIN US!!!! FLYING CIRCUS.... "YOU GOTTA" BELIEVE"

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS CLUB CHAMPS ~~~ NICK MIRECKI  15'  .5" SCHOOL RECORD !!! ..TEDI DeMARIA Sails  12' 3" !!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project, LLC Warwick, NY ....BBQ CELEBRATION MEET Coming July 12-13!!!!!!! July 2-3 ~~~~~ CONGRATULATIONS to the 23 Circus Flyers at our Summer Club Championship Twilight Meet at the Circus Barnyard. The warm temps and calm wind helped all vaulters in the final tune up meet for our season ending BBQ Celebration Meet coming next week... July 12 & 13 at The Warwick Center. Our five Summer Twilight meets were outstanding... as 63 Personal Bests were recorded on the fast runways in the Barnyard! This represents a NEW CLUB RECORD for our Twilight Series of meets. Everyone is ready for BBQ Meet!!!! NICK MIRECKI...the junior standout from Washingtonville,NY... gave Coach Stephanie Duffy an early wedding gift... with his New Wizard School Record leap of 15' .5" !!!! This breaks Tito Sanchez old mark of 15' 0" . Nick used only training flats on his 15' 1 x 180 Essx Recoil and was very close at 15' 3" to win the JOE TEA PIN of HONOR!!!!!! Placing second was Louis martinez(Wallkill) 14' 3" and Third was Dalton Yeust (Tunnackhannock,PA) at 13' 9"!! Issac Heatley(Warwick,NY) won the Open Division at 14' 0"...Andy Cimino(Warwick,NY) won the Middle School Division at 10' 9" ..... Tedi will be helping coach at our Girls PV Camp on Monday and Tuesday next week>>>> Winning the High School Division was Washington,NY Freshman...Sophie Mirecki at 10' 3" for Coach Stephanie Duffy's Vault Crew. Taking bragging rights in the Middle School Division was Warwick Valley ,NY seventh-grader..Lili Ann Beattie.... putting on a show for her cousins and Grandfather Ray Hogan...Lily flew 8' 9" on her 13'1 x 150!!!! posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS GIRLS ARRIVE @ CAMP !!!! FUTURE IS NOW!!!!
CIRCUS BBQ MEET BUZZ ~~~~ MIKE VANI(Team ESSX)  17' 1" .... HAYLEY HORVATH(Philly Jumps)  13' 1" ~~~  RECORD  131 VAULTERS !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project, LLC Warwick Valley, NY ...... CIRCUS BBQ MEET RECAP "CELEBRATE the POLE VAULT ..... and..THEY WILL COME" !!!! The Circus BBQ was billed as an event to.. CELEBRATE FRIENDSHIPS and to CELEBRATE the "SPIRIT -of-the-POLE VAULT"..... MISSION COMPLETED!!!! Our 10th Edition of Barnyard BBQ Fun...saw a record 131 Vaulters sailing their dream skyward on both Friday and saturday 's fast indoor and outdoor runways @ Flying Circus. New meet records were set in 6 divisions.... 47 NEW PR's were recorded..... New and old pole vault stories were exchanged and the food and music were off-the-charts on a perfect day to be together. MIKE VANI of Team ESSX put on a show for the 'pole-vault crazies'... with a huge sail over 17' 1" from just his short approach and near missed at 17' 7" !!!! Special thanks for his coaching help promoting the vault at our summer camps this week. Taking the Open Women's vault crown was Towsen University freshman star..HAYLEY HORVATH with her 13' 1" fly-over and 2 close bars at 13' 7" for the Philly Jumps Club speedster. Hayley will represent USA Jr Team next week at Jr Pan Am Games in Costa Rica!!!! Heading up the High School Sections...were VICTORIA ATKINSON(Philly Jumps) of Scranton Prep,PA with her 13' 1" fly for the Cornell University bound athlete. Taking the gold on fewer misses in the Boys High School group was SHANE RACEY of Flying Circus and Ravena,NY at 15' 1" . TOP FROSH WINNERS were Kegan Mancabelli of Orchard Park,NY..sailing 14' 1" on Friday Night Under the Sorensen Lights and close miss at the All-Time New York State Freshman Class record at 14' 7'!!! SOPHIE MIRECKI(Flying Circus) and Washingtonville,NY sailed 10' 1" to edge Marisa DeAngelo (Warehouse PV Club,NY) 10' 1" on misses. The Middle School Competition on Friday night was a spectacular view of the future of our event. In the Girls Middle Schhol... Warwick Valley,NY seventh grader...LILLY BEATTIE flew 9' 1" for gold and Marlayna Concannon (VaultWork,PA) took silver and a PR at 9' 1" as both battled for the 9' 7" bar together !!!! Taking the Girls 6th Grade Division was Warwick Valley,NY RACHEL VENTER with her USA #3 7' 7" sail. The Boys middle School winner was Matt Klohs of Wilmington)Philly Jumps) at 10' 1" PR and Meet Record!!!! Perhaps the real star of the meet was... 78 year MASTERS athlete...John Andresen of Aqueboque,NY..... who lit up the stage Saturday on the Indoor runway ..with his awesome 9' 1" win for Coach Jimbo Hendersen!!!!! SPECIAL THANKS to ALL VOLUNTEERS...HEPERS in EVERY WAY... Parents for supporting their Young Children's DREAMS...the 11 Pole Vault Club athletes/coaches making our event successful again this year! WE SALUTE OUR EVENT SPONSORS !!! ******************************** The JOE TEA & JOE TEA CHIPS COMPANY The BBQ EXPRESS CATERING The ESSX POLE VAULT COMPANY The WARWICK CENTER FAMILY FULL RESULTS COMING.......... THANK YOU ALL and SEE YOU NEXT YEAR !!!!!

posts.Title: *FLYING CIRCUS CALLING*  FALL &  WINTER VAULT SCHEDULES   !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Dream, LLC The Warwick Center ~~~~ Warwick, NY

The FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault..." RIDES AGAIN " ~~~~~~ VAULT BARN DOORS OPEN SEPTEMBER 8th....JOIN-NEW-ADVENTURE !!!

Dear Vaulters and Parents ~~~~~ You are invited to join one of America's oldest and cherished Pole Vault Instructional Clubs this fall and winter here in Warwick, New York. It all began in 1978 with Dave Holt (Warwick Valley Central,NY) sailing 15' 7" in Coach Paul Richards "Flyin' Circus' singlet and....the rest is pure history. Since the beginning..the club has always been ' athlete centered ' , with emphasis on a progressive and positive teaching style, similar to the European Club model. Success at Flying Circus has always been directed toward 'Personal Improvement' of the total athlete---Physical--Mental---Psychological---Technical and ..'The Spirit of Pole Vault Sportsmanship'. We hope you can join our Pole Vault Team this Fall and Winter season. Below is the Fall and Winter Schedule..as we look forward to helping you" Reach for the Sky" again. INSTRUCTION BEGINS SUNDAY--SEPTEMBER 8 !!!

FALL VAULT INSTRUCTION.... "BUILDING~the~FOUNDATION"

SUPER SUNDAY OPEN SESSIONS (Begins Sept. 8) Boys and Girls Beginner Pole Vaulters.... 11:am-12:30pm GIrls Intermediate and Elite Pole Vaulters... 12:30pm-2:00pm Boys Intermediate and Elite Pole Vaulters.....2:00pm-3:30pm Cost ~~~~ $30 per athlete At-the-Door ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ FALL WEDNESDAY NIGHT OPEN SESSIONS (Begins Sept.11) Boys and Girls All Ability Levels.... Bring Spikes. Session #1 .......5:00pm-6:30pm Session #2 ...... 6"30pm-8:00pm Cost ~~~ $30 per athlete At-the-Door

WINTER POLE VAULT CLUB PACKAGE

Very LIMIED Package--- Forms posted Oct. 1 @ Web Site. First 25 Boys & First 25 Girls to Register ONLY. 3 Month Training Package Nov. 4-Feb 4 2 Vault Training Days per week. BOYS..Every Monday and Wednesday Evening..Session #1-5-6:30pm Session #2 6:30-8pm GIRLS..Every Tuesday and Thursday Evening..Session #1 5-6:30pm Session #2 6:30-8pm Cost ~~~~~~ $450 per athlete

NEW POLE ORDERS and RENTAL PROGRAM

NOW is the time to order your new poles for the up coming season. FAST Delivery BEFORE the season BEGINS CONTACT ~~~~ Coach Bob Sorensen at Sorensen Consulting E-Mail----bsoren29@optonline.net Phone------ 914-557-1458

TWO GREAT FALL POLE VAULT MEETS @ CIRCUS

CIRCUS AIR~RUSH MEET-- Friday--October 11, 2019 Girls Meet at 4:30pm ~~~~~ Boys meet at 7pm CIRCUS VAULT-MANIA MEET -- Wednesday --October 30, 2019 Girls Meet at 4:30pm ~~~~~~~ Boys Meet at 7pm Cost~~~~ $30 per athlete At-the-Door JOIN-the-TRADITION @ FLYING CIRCUS

posts.Title: "CIRCUS OPENS BIG"   ~~~~~~  JOIN-the-CREW !!!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC Warwick Valley. NY

WELCOME to the ... FALL POLE VAULT SEASON @ FLYING CIRCUS

We would like to thank all parents and all athletes for a super opening day at FLYING CIRCUS this past weekend. The air is filled with a new spirit... a new dedication and a new set dreams. As the Vault Barn doors opened this past Sunday in Warwick Valley,NY ... the athletes from four states.... poured in to start up their quest to fly even higher this next 10 months of their pole vaulting adventure. ... There are NO LIMITS .... when you connect your "SPIRIT" to athletics . CONGRATULATIONS ALL !!!!!

"BUILDING CHAMPIONSHIP PEOPLE"

Athletic participation helps development strong and positive MORAL CHARACTER traits in each individual. It is our goal at Flying Circus to further develop these traits of ..Fair Play...Sportsmanship....Dedication.... Loyalty ....Honesty......Team Work. .... and ....Measuring up to our very best every day. This is the reason why it's called...'Educational Athletics' in our schools and clubs. THANK YOU for joining our Pole Vault Program this year !!!!! "If you can IMAGINE it .....You can ACHIEVE it....... If you can DREAM it ........... You can BECOME it." Fall Schedule @ Circus Sunday Open Sessions...... Drills/Short Run Vault Techniques .... Cost $30/Athlete Beginner Class.....11:am-12:30pm Boys and Girls Mixed Beginners..... Girls Intermediate/Elite Class..... 12:30-2:00pm Boys Intermediate/Elite Class..... 2-3:30pm Wednesday Open Co-Ed Sessions....Drills/Short Run Vault Techniques .... Cost $30 /Athlete Session #1 ~~~~~ 5:00pm-6:30pm Session #2 ~~~~~~ 6:30pm-8:00pm Dressed for activity--Bring Spikes/Drinks FLYING CIRCUS is in SESSION.

posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Warwick, NY "AIR-RUSH" Pole Vault Meet The dust has been knocked-off!!!!!! CONGRATULATIONS to all 31 Boys and Girls who laced up their spikes for our first Circus Pre-Season Fun Meet on Friday night . It was a revealing and rewarding gathering...with new friendships shared and BIG PERFORMANCES for early October. The summer work came out in all the vaulters results ...with 12 Personal Bests and you can't make this energy up !!!! Keep Training STRONG!!!! Indoor Barn AIR-RUSH POLE VAULT MEET October 11, 2019 Recap----- The Girls lead-off at 5:07pm with three Middle School athletes and 9 High School Flyers... supporting each other every jump... Norwick ,CT State Champion, Paige Martin sailed 11' 7" to edge up-and-coming Ct.State Runner up Elise Russell of Weston High School. Both girls were outstanding from short run approach. Top New York vaulter was junior Elli Lemler of O'Neill High School with a PR at 10' 7" and close bars at 11'1" for the powerful athlete coached by Stephanie Duffy. Taking home the prize ... JOE TEAM drink for Middle School vaulters was eight grader .. Warwick Valley's Lily Beattie at 9' 2" and seventh grader Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley) soard 8' 7" on her new Essx Stick. The Boys group was' loaded with fireworks' again in the 8:01pm start..as Vault Factory,NJ ..James Zeolla, Coached by Carl Palumbo.. took home the JOE TEA drink prize at 14' 10" clear in a jump off with Circus Flyer .Louis Martinez(Wallkill,NY-Junior) at 14' 7". Top CT Vaulter was Aidan O'Connor of Lewis-Mills HS at 14' 7" new school record!!! The Boys flew 4 guys over 14' 7" and produced 8 Personal Bests on the night. Top Freshman was Andy Cimino(Warwik,NY) at 10' 1" for the Purple Fiber-Benders!!!!! FullResults Below. posts.Title: CIRCUS MEET.... "VAULT~MANIA"... coming  Wednesday  October 30....JOIN-the-FUN !!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC Warwick,NY "VAULT-MANIA" Pole Vault Meet JOIN~~~~ our "POLE VAULT MANIA" @ FLY-the-CIRCUS .....YOU and your pole vault buddies are invited to our " CIRCUS POLE VAULT MANIA MEET" on Wednesday..October 30 !!!! This is our #2 Pre-Season meet and it promises to be another thriller...just before the Halloween energy rush. Our girls will kick the afternoon off..with Registration at 4:30pm and meet begins at 5:15pm at low heights for all levels. Bring your sharpened spikes, as we compete in a friendly atmosphere ..under "the NEW JOE SAVARESE LIGHTS" at the Indoor Circus Barn. Cost still just $30 per athlete.... 12 PR's last meet and more to come!!! The Boys will register at 6:30pm and Bar goes up at 7:30pm..... on the World's FASTEST RUNWAY!!!! PRIZES...... A 20 ounce Bottle of JOE TEA MAGIC for all Middle School and High School EVENT WINNERS!!!!! World Famous...JOE TEAM BUTTONS to all Personal Best Performances !!!!!!! JOIN ----the----MANIA ......... EMBRACE the CONFUSION and JUMP at PR with us !!!!!!! FIBER NEWS * The Pre-Season new pole orders are moving fast. Order you new sticks ASAP and BE READY for ALL-COMERS!!!! * The Pole Rental Season orders begin Monday..November 4 with our ESSX...UCS SPIRIT and ALTIUS VAULTING POLES.... See Bob Sorensen for all details.... NOVEMBER 4 is the start day for renting poles at Circus. * Our Winter Club Package is SOLD OUT and we thank you for supporting our club this winter. Boys begin November 4...Girls begin November 5. Athletes arrive 10 minutes before their schedules session... No switching assigned class sessions... The sessions are balance and packed to prevent over crowding the runways. Athletes should bring spikes,water and a positive coachable attitude to each session. There are NO MAKE UP CLASSES.. A missed class is NOT MADE UP. * Special thanks go out to Joe Savarese (Warwick,NY) for installing our new 'SUPER LIGHTS" @ Barn this weekend. (See photo) * You can still register for our Armory Indoor Track Camp..to be held Saturday November 16 at the New Ba;ance Armory in NY City.. Flying Circus Pole Vault staff on site for the pole vault instruction..along with Olympic Silver Medalist ..Lojo Johnson!!!! Register at armorycamp.org today!!!! * The indoor season is almost here... LET'S GET OURSELVES READY to DEFEND!!! * Our Last Wednesday Night Open Session for the Fall is this Wednesday October 23rd.... 5-6:30pm class and 6:30-8pm class. Join the short run technique sessions. "I will get ready... and...... perhaps my chance will come." Flying Circus.

posts.Title: READY-to-FLY  @  "CIRCUS VAULT~MANIA" Meet .... JOIN the LAUNCH ---- Oct. 30!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC The Warwick Center for Pole Vault Development "VAULT~MANIA "MEET ~~~~~ Oct. 30 The FLYING CIRCUS Vault Crew is .... READY-to-FLY the Rafters this coming Wednesday and we want you to be a part of our #2 Pre-Season Meet Fun-Meet. Our newly lighted hay loft and our FAST RUNWAY will provide the perfect setting for another PR opportunity before our Winter Indoor Training Club begins November 4. Again...the cherished prize ...a delicious ... 20 oz. bottle of Flyin' Circus Magic ... RASPBERRY JOE TEA to MS and HS Boys and Girls WINNERS!!!!! JOIN the FUN and FLY WITH US !!!! " Girls Vault Mania"Meet...Registration & Warm Up at 4:30pm... Bar goes up 5:15pm (5 Feet 6 inches)... Cost $30 per athlete. "Boys Vault Mania"Meet...Registration & Warm Up at 6:30pm... Bar goes up 7:15pm (8 Feet 6 inches)...Cost $30 per athlete.

FLYING CIRCUS TRADITION... Things to remember....

GREAT TRAINING HURTS ....... for no matter how TOUGH the athlete may seem outwardly..... every new level of development or INTENSITY of EFFORT , brings it's own quality of PAIN and new levels of HUMAN PERFORMANCE. MAKE TRAINING A PRIORITY this winter. * TAKE ACTION NOW. Be a product of the 'MIRACLES of MOTIVATION. * BE LOYAL to your TEAM MATES and to YOURSELF. * FOCUS ..on what we COULD BE.... NOT...what we are! * The body can never go..... where the mind has never been ~~~ THINK BIG ! * Be true to your sport .....Leave "BIG FOOTPRINTS' ! * LIGHT-YOUR-OWN-FIRE ....It's PASSION that counts-most-in-life. * AVOID NEGATIVE PEOPLE...... Live POSITIVELY!!!! * Rise above PEER PRESSURE.... Become your own HERO ! * ALWAYS REMEMBER WHO YOU REPRESENT. Follow the "GOLDEN RULES". *TRAIN HARD and PUSH YOUR LIMITS. NO REGRETS! * BE HUMBLE with your SUCCESS. Help another TEAM MATE EVERYDAY. * .... our GOAL is NOT TO SET RECORDS...but... to SET EXAMPLES. FLY-the-CIRCUS this Wednesday....@..... VAULT-MANIA MEET

posts.Title: NICK MIRECKI SOPARS 15' 6" ... PAIGE MARTIN FLYS 11'3" .....14 PR's  @  "CIRCUS VAULT~MANIA" Meet!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure,LLC The Dairy Barn @ in Warwick Valley,NY "VAULT~MANIA" MEET --- Oct. 30 It was a rainy Halloween Eve ........ as 34 Pole Vaulters settled in the old dairy barn second floor hay loft for some good-old "FLYING FUN" at the 8th CIRCUS VAULT~MANIA Pole Vault meet. All the summer and fall pre-season work on drills and short run technique paid off early, as 14 pole vaulters set All-Time personal bests and the positive spirit prevailed again in the supportive team mates encouragement. This Indoor season will be filled with high performance. CONGRATULATIONS all Vaulters and Parents!!!! Recap ~~ The 14 FLY-GIRLS put on a show in the afternoon section.... with Connecticut State Champion, Paige Martin of Norwich Free taking the prized "JOE TEA" Award with her 11' 3" leap from short run and close bars at 11' 9" in the High School division..... 8th Grade Multi-Event Champion...Lily Beattie(Warwick Valley,NY soared to a PR at 9' 9" and had two close bars at Karmen Auble's NY State Class pole vault record of 10' 3.25". 7th Grader,Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley,NY) sailed 8'9"PR for the Purple Wave. BIG PERFORMANCES filled the 20 Boys Evening Section... with Washingtonville,NY senior Soccer Captain...NICK MIRECKI ...flying New School Indoor Record of 15' 6" for Coach Stephanie Duffy. This powerful Mirecki used his 15' 1 x 185 ESSX from 7 lefts and never looked back. He was close at 15' 9" on all three. Top Freshman Honors went to Andrew Cimino(Warwick Valley,NY) with his 11' 3" PR for Coach Potters Indoor Wave. Special Thanks and Salutes go to all our Meet Volunteers for helping run the meet like a CHAMPIONSHIP....Beth Becher ,Bob Sorensen,Coach Stephanie Duffy,James Beck.Coach Lemler,Clayton Yeust,Madeline Sorensen and all cheering Circus parents!!!!!

Full Results~~~"VAULT~MANIA"

Jason McDonough(Poughkeepsie,NY) 14' 3"PR 3-Charlie Hatzmann(Wappingers) 13' 9" Dalton Yeust(Tunkhannock,PA) 13' 9" Max Zuckerman(Woodcliff Lakes,NJ) 13' 3"PR Andrew Carkales(New Canaan,CT) 12' 9"PR Norbert Malik(Bound Brook) 12' 3"PR Connor Bothwell(Bethel,CT) 12' 3"PR Max Bothwell(West Haven,CT) 12' 3" Sam Wolf(Oxford,CT) 12' 3"PR Rich Mangogna(Kings Park) 11' 9" Andy Cimino(Warwick Valley) 11' 3"PR Ryan Pfund(Ridgewood) 10' 9"PR Alex Jones(Darien,CT) 10' 3"PR Kevin Chait(Wash'ville) 10' 3" Sean Nagel(Mahwah) 9' 9" Brian Wanamaker(Mahwah) 9' 3" Mack Hallet-Andrew Gallois-NH WINTER CLUB TRAINING begins Nov 4(Boys) and Nov 5(Girls). posts.Title: CIRCUS YOUTH POLE VAULT MEET Coming.. Saturday,November 23   ...... COLLEGE VAULTERS PRACTICE SCHEDULED  for November 29 !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC The Old Dairy Barn in Warwick, NY

CALLING ALL YOUTH POLE VAULTERS in GRADES 6-7-8-9 !!!!!!!

It's time to see the new "RISING POLE VAULT STARS" .... The Flying Circus cordially invites all YOUTH Boys & Girls Pole Vaulters in Grades 6-7-8-9 to our first YOUTH VAULT MEET ...to be held on Saturday...November 23, 2019 in Warwick, New York.. The At-the-Door Registration and warm up begins at 12 noon and our real bar goes up at 1pm at 5' 4" !!!! The progression will be in 6 inch increments all day. Cost in our 6 Youth Pole Vault Meets will be $30 per athlete and all athletes have access to all our 374 Vaulting Poles. It promises to be a great FUN DAY on FIBERGLASS again. Please join us for some friendship and flying !!!!!

ADDITIONAL CIRCUS YOUTH BOYS & GIRLS VAULT MEET TOUR DATES:

posts.Title: LILY BEATTIE Sets NY STATE 8th Grade POLE VAULT RECORD ~~~10' 3.5" ... ANDY CIMINO Sails 11' 4" PR  @ CIRCUS YOUTH DAY !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC Warwick Valley, NY Flying Circus Youth Day Meet #1

HOORAY ~~~ HERE COME'S the RISING YOUTH MOVEMENT @ FLYING CIRCUS!!!!!

There was spectacular "flying-spirit" and an electric buzz all day at The Fly-Barn today...as 9 Tough Youth Boys and Girls started up the 6 Meet Pole Vault Meet Tour for this winter. The performances produced Six Personal Bests and One All -Time NEW YORK STATE 8th GRADE RECORD of 10' 3.5" for Warwick Valley Middle School multi-star~~~Lily Ann Beattie. Lily used her 13' 1" x 155 Essx from 8 Lefts all day and was close at final bar of 11' 0"!!!!The Boys 9th Grade Champion was the powerful Andy Cimino of Warwick Valley Wave, NY , with his 11' 4" PR and taking home the prized 20 oz. Lemon Joe Tea!!!! Taking the seventh Grade Joe Tea for Girls was Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley MS) at 8' 8" and so close at NY State 7th Grade Class Record at 9' 2". Super all-around athlete..Ella Galloway of Pine Bush Middle School soared 9'2" for her New School Record!!! CONGRATULATIONS ALL for a SUPER DAY TOGETHER !!! posts.Title: CIRCUS POLE VAULT MEETS COMING .... JOIN-the-FLYING with US !!!!!!!!
posts.Content: The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault, LLC The Warwick Center....Warwick, New York It's time to "Rev-Up- Your-Pole Vault Engine" this Holiday Season. Meet entry fee is still just $30 at the door per athlete. All results will appear on MileSplit Network. Starting Height for the combined Boys and Girls meet will be 5' 2" and move up at 6" increments all day. Prizes again...the cherished and delicious 20 oz. Bottle of JOR TEA. Join the Fun and Friendship of Circus Pole Vaulting!!! Our BIG BOY / BIG GIRL Holiday Classic Pole Vault Meet is Open to all athletes on Saturday... December 28, 2019...With starting Heights at 7'2" for Girls meet...beginning at 9am Registration/Warm Up and 10' 2" for Boys Meet at 1pm Registration/Warm up. This open meet ....all High School and College athletes are listed as "Unattached". Entry Fee- $30 each at the door. FLYING FUN JUST AHEAD!!!! [ Snow Storm Date---Tuesday December 31, 2019 Same Times] CIRCUS NEWS~~~~~~ * Our Winter Club athletes have improved by leaps and bounds so far ...... as we hit the halfway mark of this 12 week instruction training package that ends on February 5th. We will be Closed on December 24,25 for Christmas break and December 31 and January 1 for New Years break. * Vault Pole Rental program with Coach Sorensen has been a huge success....Thank you to all athletes who have Rented poles or purchased new poles poles this indoor. This helps us view each jump more clearly and speeds up the athletes learning progress..... * Reminder to all Warwick Valley Central,NY parents... School Project Vote on Wednesday..December 18. TIME TO VOTE FOR KIDS . * We will be having our CIRCUS SWAG GEAR fund-raiser beginning next week. This project was super successful last year by Beth Becher and now is headed up by Brett Carey. Look for all details on your e-mail and our web site next week. THANK YOU Brett!!!!! * TRAINING DURING HOLIDAY BREAK ~~~~~ We emphasis that you focus on your traing during the 16 day Holiday school break. Be super focused on your goals this Holiday Break!!!! * It's hard to explain how grateful our pole vault staff is to have super athletes and super supportive parents representing our little pole vault experiment here @ Flying Circus. Thank you all and we wish you a healthy and joyous Holiday season. FLY-the-CIRCUS ~~~~~

posts.Title: CIRCUS Invades Armory ~~~~ Nick Mirecki 15' 6" ..Marisa DiGia  11' 1" ~~~~ Rachel Venter(Warwick) Sets NY State 7th Grade Record @ 9' 2" Today !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC Warwick Valley, NY The Hay is in the Barn ~~~ Welcome to the harvest !!!!! The Flying Circus 5 Month Training Cycle is complete and the athletes are moving their personal bests this early season. There were 33 Flying Circus Pole Vaulters in The Armory Coach St. meet on Friday night and the jumping was electric... as the Circus Girls took the TOP 7 places..with Marisa DiGia(NV-Old Tappan,NJ) sailing 11' 1" in the jump off with Sophie Mareck(Wash'ville,NY) for gold.... The Boys Stick Jumping Event was loaded with talent and 41 guys flexing their muscles...Washington,NY senior Nick Mirecki flew a school record 15' 6" for Coach Duffy and Coach White and qualifies for the championship section at NB Nationals in March. Placing third was the strongman himself.. Dalton Yeust(Tunkhannock,PA) at 14' 6" and strong School record attempts at 15' 0" to lead the 15 Circus Boys. In todays Circus Youth Pole Vault Tour...history was made again...as Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley Middle School,NY) seventh grader broke the NY State All Time 7th Grade Class Record with her 9' 2" leap on Essx. The old 7th grade record was by Warsaw,NY Standout..Karmen Auble @ 9' 1" in 2009 at the Flying Circus Golden Vault. Lily Beattie(Warwick Valley Middle School.NY) flew 9' 8 for the 8th grader and Andy Cimino(Warwick Valley,NY) Freshman sailed 12' 0" to win the JOE TEA first prize. Luke Beattie of Warwick Valley won the 6th greade event at 7' 2" PR!!!! SPECIAL THANKS to all parents for helping and to Julie Kay Christian for Score Keeping all night. posts.Title: "FLY~the~CIRCUS~SPIRIT"  @  HOLIDAY MEET ~~~~~42 Athletes....12 PR's.... 4 School Records !!! JOIN the FUN !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure Warwick Valley, New York ...... 'tis the season for spirit" ....... this was the theme at our 10th Flying Circus Holiday Pole Vault Show in the Warwick Center Pole Vault Barn this past Saturday. Family, friends and cousins were packed into every seat and cheered their was thru the exciting day of Fiber-Stick-Vaulting. When the hay and dust finally settled...the 42 athletes punched out 12 PR's and 4 New School Records and exchanged some down home friendships. The air was filled with "Spirit" ! Thank you all .... athletes,parents,volunteers and staff for a wonderful day together.

Weekend Recap

Circus Holiday Meet(Dec. 28) ~~~~ West Point,NY junior, Elinor Lemler soared 10' 8" for the gold..just edging out Randi Conroy(Allendale,NJ) on fewer misses for the High School Division. Lily Beattie of Warwick,NY won the 8th Grade division at 10' 2" for Coach Potter's Wave Track Club and Rachel Venter(Warwick,NY) equalled her 7th Grade State Record of 9' 2". Kristen Kolarik of LaGrangeville,NY won the Open Womens division at 10' 2". The afternoon Boys High School Division action was filled with power and muscle....as Nick Mirecki of Rock Tavern,NY. flew to the JOE TEA prize with his 15' 2" win and brushed off a PR attempt at 15' 8" for the Bryant University signee next fall. Nick Bianco of Massapequa Park,NY set a school record 14' 2" for the Chiefs Track Club. Top Freshman was Andy Cimino(Warwick,NY) at 11' 8"... Top Open Vaulter was Isaac Heatley(Warwick,NY) at 14' 8" !!!! Special Thanks to Beth Becher(Scorer)/Russ Lemler/Eddie Duffy/Marc DeLuca ... Pit and Standards all day.. Bob Sorensen and Stephanie Duffy Coaching....and Julie Kay Christian for MileSplit posting !!!!! Marine Corp Invitational @ Armory(Dec.28) ~~~~ Strong performances at the mecca(NB Armory) on Saturday... as Wallkil,NY ..speedy junior..Louis Martinez won the Invite Pole Vault with a School Record and NY State #1 vault of 15' 7" on his new poles and close bars at 16' 0"!!!! This qualifies Louis for NB Nationals Championship!!! Pushing Louis was Union Catholic(NJ) senior Conor Reilly with a huge fly-over at 15' 1" after his USA#1 Sprint Medley Relay performance on Friday night. NY State Outdoor Vault Champion..Shane Racey(Ravena,NY) placed third at 14' 7" for the Cornell bound scholar. Max Zuckerman(Pascack Hills,NJ) was TOP SOPH at 13' 7". Taking home a gold medal in the Varsity Pole Vault Event.. was Dalton Yeust of Tunkhannock Area,PA with his 14' 1" crowd pleaser. In the Girls Frosh/Soph Pole Vault.....it was all Angelisse Diaz of Newburgh Free Academy,NY with the win at 9' 1". The Girls Varsity PV event... featured Bella Gray(Union Catholic,NJ) ..placing second at 10' 1" SB and Jules Gravier(Bronxville,NY) also at 10' 1".

posts.Title: "CIRCUS RECOIL"..... AIDAN O'CONNOR (CT)...15' 1" ... MARISA DiGIA (NJ)  12' 0"....LILY BEATTIE (NY)... New  NY State Record !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC Warwick Valley Pole Vault Center, NY USATF Club #06-1129 "I believe I can fly...." That's the theme for all 115 Flying Circus Pole Vault Acrobats this CHAMPIONSHIP SEASON. It's now PURE POLE VAULT. Big results are pouring in this last weekend of January... and the State and Nationals are just six weeks away. Athletes are tuning every polished drill into high flying reality. Grips and poles are moving up each week in our progressive approach of mastering Track & Field's most complex event. Stay the course... your lifetime best performance is just about here!!!!! * Lewis Mills,CT senior Aidan O'Connor is back to his full run and sailed over 15' 1" School Record at the HK Invite in New Haven on Friday and then was close at CT. posts.Title: 2020 FLYING CIRCUS SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMPS ....JOIN the FUN !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Camps, LLC The Warwick Center,,,,,, Warwick, New York USATF Club #06-1129 The Flying Circus Pole Vault Club ...... presents our 2020 SUMMER POLE VAULT CAMPS... You are invited to join the Summer Camp Teams and experience new pole vault instruction. The Camps are 2-days .... full of pole vault introduction drills ..warm up and running mechanics ...lectures... competitive strategies .. ...vault technique and pole vault apparatus drills for specific positions for pole vault. The original Camp T-Shirt and Camp Pole Vault Booklet will be included in your camp registration. The Summer Camp is open to the first 50 Boys and first 50 Girls who register. Our 6 Runways will be divided into ability grouping for immediate results in gaining technique. Camp cost is still $295 per athlete. CIRCUS GIRLS CAMP... Monday and Tuesday July 6 & 7 4pm-8pm CIRCUS BOYS CAMP ....Wednesday & Thursday July 8-9 4pm-8pm

View the 2020 Summer Camp Form →

FOLLOWING both CAMPS.... We would like to invite you and your pole vault friends to our 12th FLYING CIRCUS BBQ POLE VAULT MEET !!!! This is our final week at FLYING CIRCUS for the SUMMER... and this is a celebration of our full year of pole vaulting. The BBQ meet is a must for all pole vault nuts......last year we hosted 131 pole vaulters in Middle School, High School...College...Open and Masters Divisions. Our Goal this year is to gather 200+ athletes who ...LOVE POLE VAUL:T !!! Join us and enjoy the Music...Food and Friendships.

posts.Title: MEGAN CLARK  SOARS  15'  1.25" @ USA NATIONALS !!!!!  NEVER GIVE UP
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC The Golden Valley in Warwick,NY Megan 'Flips' Clark came to New York as a sophomore from Virginia when her father was transferred to teach at West Points Simon Center for Leadership Development. She was coached by Randy Mc Conniky to a 5th place finish at her Virginia f State meet at 9' 9" for the freshman speedy ..gymnastic star. She joined Flying Circus and traveled from West Point 3 times a week with her mom,,, Simona.... and in just 2 years.. she became NY State Champion in the Pole Vault for Indoor and Outdoor Track.... sailing 13' 0" in her junior year at James O'Neill High School. She then won the Georgia State Pole Vault Championship in her senior year, as a transfer student. She sailed 15' 3.5" at Duke University for Coach Shaun Wilbourn and placed second at the NCAA Indoor Champs her senior year. Now representing the NYAC/Oiselle. as a professional pole vaulter... Megan flew to 15' 1.25" on Friday Night at USA NATIONALS in New Mexico and is aiming for this years Olympic Dream.... The moral of the story...is... FOLLOW YOUR DREAM ..... and ..... NEVER-GIVE-UP !!!! Congratulations Megan !!!!

posts.Title: SHANE RACEY SOARS  16' 6" @ Section 2 CHAMPS (NYS#1/CIRCUS#3)....CIRCUS YOUTH MEET AWESOME TODAY !!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault, LLC The Golden Valley in Warwick,NY The Fiberglass Poles are recoiling strong! Such was the case at the Section 2 State Qualifying Championships at Albany University Track Bubble this weekend. the 2019 NYS Outdoor State Pole Vault Champion...SHANE RACEY of Ravena,NY flew to a New School and Section 2Pole Vault Record of 16' 6" for his Indoor Coach and Dad and now moves way up to #3 All-Time at FLYING CIRCUS PERFORMANCE list.!!! This scholar/athlete will be taking his skills to Cornell University next fall. Jordan Yamoah's(Arlington,NY) State Indoor Record is in sight the next 3 weeks!!!! Congratulations to the entire RACEY TEAM!!!!! Alex Robin(Shaker) 13' 0" Alexander Feuer(Shaker) 10' 9" Fiona carroll(AV) 9' 0". posts.Title: "FLY-the-CIRCUS.....   3  NEW JERSEY STATE GROUP CHAMPS....... BIG SECTION 9  VAULT NIGHT !!!!!
posts.Content:
The Flying Circus, Warwick,NY "Official Home of ... JOE TEA"

"VIVA La POLE VAULT"

Here we go again......... CHAMPIONSHIP POLE VAULTING has arrived at Flying Circus!!! It's peaking time on Fiberglass and our Circus Athletes have responded to the call. Our next 23 weeks will be fun and worth all the 6 months of work you all put in to arrive at the scene with this great vibe. CONFIDENCE is a strong attribute in our pole vault event and all the drills...all the days...all the moments are now connecting to the best time of the indoor season. You all earned this position... now... ....it's YOUR TIME!!!!! * New Jersey Groups @ Toms River Sports Bubble.... Hats off to our 3 New State Group Pole Vault Campions this past weekend.... Conor Reilly of Union Catholic making pole vault history..with his 4th CONSECITIVE STATE CHAMPIONSHIP Gold in the Non=Public A Division. This Lehigh University bound gymnastic star is one of the Circus All Time Humble Athletes. Join Him in the Gold Medal Circue was Senior,,Marisa DiGia of NV-Old Tappan..with her Group 3 win at 12' 1" for the University of Maryland star. Taking her third NJ State Group pole vault gold was Grace Kellogg of Eastern Christian at with her 10' 3" win in Non-Public B Division !!! Congratulations all ... Perhaps the biggest story was that of Sophomore Max Zuckerman of Pascack Hills,NY...with his Soph Record of 15' 0" for Coach Ross Koehler.(Full Results below) * NY State Section 9 @ West Point ~~~~~ In one of America's Oldest and Storied Rich Field House setting... it was another strong showing on the pole vault runways for both Boys and Girls on Friday night. The Girl;s started the fire with Alicia Johnson of Monroe Woodbury taking the gold at 10' 9"PR for the former Kids Gym Gymnastic champion. .... 8th Grade NY State Record holder Lily Beattie (Warwick) sailed 10' 3" from her long run on bigger poles and team mate Caroline Fatta(Warwick) advanced with her 10' 3" clear before she had to go to her relays... Super 7th Grader...Rachel Venter(Warwick) upped her own State 7th Grade performance to 10' 0" and moves to USA#1 for 7th graders!!! The Boys was a shootout..filled with high flying and personal bests at Gillis 's Fast Runway. Wallkill,NY junior..Louis Martinwz flew 15' 0" to take gold and club mate Nick Mirecki follwed up his Hurdle win ..with his 15' 0" vault for silver. Noah Brown(New Paltz) punched his State Meet ticket with his 13' 0" jump for Coach Dylan Scranbini. The most impressive sights were that of friendships and sportsmanship displayed by every Vaulter in this high powered meet. (Full Results below) . NJ Full Report.. posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS  ....NEW LIMITED SCHEDULE
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure., LLC  The Warwick Center, NY


   In our  effort  to keep our  athletes in smaller groups of training  for the next   few  weeks...  we have developed   a new  spring   schedule for all   ability groups on both our outdoor  runways   and our indoor pits.  All athletes  should sanitized    and wash hands  before...during    and   immediately after practices . We have   cleaned our    facility   and disinfected  it  today  and have scheduled  regular  daily cleaning routines.  Athletes who have cold/cough symptoms  should  not  be taking part in  our  practices.  Athletes take  part  in training  at their own risk.  Let's keep our environment  safe  and our team mates safe during   our practices.  Athletes  should  also dress  for outdoor vaulting...as well as indoor  vaulting.   See  New Limited  Vault  schedule. below.
  Our staff will also  be hosting a variety of small  competitions after  the   schools  are back in session(April 16). These  small competitions  will include  YOUTH AGE GROUP MEETS.... HS ELITE BOYS & GIRLS MEETS....  COLLEGE AGE UNATTACHED ALL-COMERS MEETS   and  INTERMEDIATE HS BOYS & GIRLS MEETS...   Schedule  coming    soon.     Let's  keep  focused   and  safe  together. 
   New Limited Schedule.       SUNDAY OPEN SESSIONS..... $30 per/Athlete   Every Sunday @ Circus      11am-12:30pm.... Boys  and Girls BEGINNER CLASS      12:30pm-2pm...... Girls Intermediate/Elite Session      2pm-3:30pm.......  Boys Intermediate/Elite Session
      WEDNESDAY OPEN SESSIONS... $30 per /Athlete         (CLOSED  WED. March 25 Only)       12:30-2pm...High School Girls Session         2-3:30pm.. Boys High School Session        3:30-5pm...  Men and Women College Session     PRIVATE Sessions can be  arranged on other dates  at $75  per  single athlete/90 minute  session.  Coach St. is  SOLD OUT at this  time...Coach Duffy   and Coach Sorensen  have  some  availability left. Contact them  thru  e-mail to set up  a session.
      MANY THANKS for all understanding  and support.       Coach St. and Circus Staff
                 12:30-2pm......  Girls  High School Session

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT ACADEMY CLOSED !!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus, LLC  Warwick Valley, NY


  Monday--- March 16, 2020
 Dear Flying Circus Staff...Athletes   and Parent ....      It is  sad  to report that  we are officially CLOSED till further notice...in order to proper  you  from  and virus  harm. All our Open Wednesday  and Open Sunday classes...as well as all private  and semi-private sessions are now on hold. We will keep   everyone up as  to our  re-opening of  full activities   and  meets.  All athletes  are encouraged  to stay  strong  and  fit....both physically    and mentally ...as   we will be  back better-than-ever as soon as it's  safe.    Many thanks  for all your  support  and understanding...Coach St.

posts.Title: KEEP-YOUR-DRIVE  ALIVE !!!!!   STAY ACTIVE !!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Club, LLC

The Golden Valley ~~~~ Warwick,NY


         The FLYING CIRCUS pipeline of athletes are..."Keeping  the  Drive  Alive'  ...with  a  sustained spirit of dedication to individualized  workout routines  everyday at their homes.  This is a prime example of people setting higher standards for themselves.  They  come out on their own early  and they  stay late. They always  find  the  time   and the  space to do things  right. BIG DREAMS  will overtake BIG ROAD BLOCKS . This  was one of the  foundations that our   pole vault  club was built on.   Put in that extra effort..... work hard.....set solid  goals...  stick together.....be positive..... improve  just a little bit  each day.... encourage  a team mate...... believe in yourself......  push your limits beyond... never..never.....  ever give up.   Your ~~~~ "FLYING CIRCUS SPIRIT'  is INSPIRING !!!  Keep  your  Flame Burning!
     " MOTIVATION  for  LIFE" 

* Hitch you wagon to a  star.  Set your goals high.          * There will be challenges....... Answer the call.           * Promise   and Deliver.           * Make progress..... Not mark time.           * Leave it better...than... when you found it.           * Treat people  with Dignity.           * EXPECT MORE OF  YOURSELF.                 FLYING CIRCUS....... YOU WILL BE READY WHEN WE  GET BACK TOGETHER.

posts.Title: 2020 FLYING CIRCUS BBQ POLE VAULT MEET CANCELLED !!!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Adventure, LLC The Warwick Center..... Warwick, NY
   April 18. 2020
    Re:    2020 FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT MEET              July 10-11  2020    Warwick,NY


    Dear Vaulters...Parents....Coaches   and  Friends of  the Pole Vault~~~~
         *  We are placing safety first  and foremost in  our complying  with  Phase I   and Phase II of our National  Covid-19 Guidelines.  and our USATF  safety  guidelines ....as a joint decision by The Warwick Center  and  The Flying Circus, LLC  to cancel our 2020 FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT BBQ MEET  on July 10-11  here in Warwick, New York. Last  years meet gathered 131 pole vaulters to compete   and over 100  spectators,staff and  friends  taking part in the meet.. These numbers represent   an unsafe situation  for  this early  summer.  We will be  back in 2021  and  we look forward  to your  continuous support  of our pole vault  events  here @ FLYING CIRCUS, LLC.         * Our Small Pole Vault Camps are  still on and  are also restricted  to 50% capacity  from last year's camp  for safety and social  distancing guidelines.                Girls Camp #1...July 6-7 is  presently  SOLD OUT.                Boys and Girls Co-Ed Camp...July 8-9 still has  20 spots.(Forms  at  www.hvflyingcircus.com)        * We anticipate  opening for  small private  instruction on May 14 by appointment only.          * We will be hosting SMALL  LOCAL MEETS  @ FLYING CIRCUS in mid-June.        * All up-dates will appear on web site..as they develop.


   STAY SAFE   and    STAY STRONG.....   Coach St / Coach Duffy /Coach Sorensen/ Coach Cevoil /  Coach Nesbitt / Coach Pasek / Coach Glover

posts.Title: STAY SAFE & STAY STRONG !!!! FLYING CIRCUS UPDATES INFORMATION.
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Club, LLC Warwick Valley, NY
 HELLO   ......  FLYING CIRCUS FAMILY.    WE MISS YOU ALL !!!!!!! 

The  Flying Circus  staff of coaches would  like   to   extend our  salute  to you  and  your unyielding  spirit in these very trying  times of COVID 19.   The reports of  your   workouts  have  just been  inspiring  and  we know   you all will come out of this  stronger  and  more   focused than  ever. We now  have a greater appreciation and deep understanding of the joys  of friendships ...  shared at our little  stick jumping  club these past few years.  We will return  to  even  greater  focused training...... more  spirited optimism   and   more ..'Inspire~to~Dream ' approaches.

We are going  to ....."RAISE~the BAR  @ FLYING CIRCUS"  when  we are allowed  to return under  NY Phase II Reopen  Guilde Lines. In the meantime....  Continue to live your potential with training  everyday at home  in some  way. Train..Lift...Run..Study  and  STAY MOTIVATED for   your return day to the runways.   Below  are  some points of  emphasis to keep  you  connected to your pole vault career.    Stay Safe  and Stay Strong


  *   Summer Pole Vault Camps are both SOLD OUT. We accepted  only  half  the number of  last years   athletes  to keep it safe for all athletes  and staff. Girls 2 Day Clinic  is  July 6-7   and Co-Ed Boys/Girls 2 day  Clinic is July 8-9 . Final details   will be sent out to all campers   2 weeks before  clinic.  *  We have cancelled  our most famous Flying Circus BBQ Vault Meet  this year..but will return next summer for that refreshing JOE TEA celebration.

*  We  are planning to host  small  FALL VAULT CONTESTS @ CIRCUS.... Small groups =  HUGE VAULTS !!!!   You will be competition ready  for  your  "GREATEST INDOOR SEASON of  YOUR LIFE" !!!!!!!!

*  We will be resuming our OPEN  PROGRESSIVE VAULT SESSIONS beginning  mid-September on Sundays   and Wednesdays  again.  Beginner sessions   and Intermediate/Elite  Sessions @ $30 per athlete.

*  We have  UPDATED  our CIRCUS ALL~TIME PERFORMANCE LISTS  and  it's  a  MOTIVATING  TOOL ...to " HIT the LIST " this year.  YOU CAN DO IT !!!!!!!  Start your climb NOW!!!!  *  We are proud  to  help in promoting   a sensational  new book on pole vault  modern day technique  and the History of our  great  event.   This book by   World Class Coach David Butler , is  a must  for  every pole vaulter who wants  to  achieve.  It's The Pole Vault..A Violent Ballet... Just  $49.95(including  shipping.  A  super gift   and  a must read for all pole vaulters.  Details  coming on how to order your copy  direct.
 

 FLYING CIRCUS WILL RIDE AGAIN  ~~~~~~~~~ GET READY NOW!!!!!

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCIS SUMMER CAMP BLAST !!!! THANK YOU CAMPERS ~~~~See you in September
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Summer Camp Adventure Warwick Valley,NY

  "Working~0n~a`Dream" .................CONGRATULATORS to all  63 Pole Vault Campers and our 20+ Staff Coaches  for maling our  20th Edition  of Flying Circus Summer Pole Vault a huge success.   The improvements in all three camps was inspiring   and  the positive coaching style  was off the charts.  It's hard  to believe the rapid  progress and  electric  energy in a small, short  camp.  You had to be there to feel it all.  These smaller camps  will now   be our model  for the future. Special thanks   must go out  to all our parents  ...who sent  their  children and paid their way for this FUN  and FRIENDSHIP Camp of Pole Vaulting.  The real results  will bloom this  coming fall  and indoor season for each dedicated  camper.  There is  no better  coaching staff  of  enthuistic counsilors /coaches  than our FLYING CIRCUS SUMMER COACHING  VOLUNTEERS.   Our main goal  was  to teach---CONFIDENCE  thru POLE VAULT.  MISSION ACCOMPLISHED!!!!!     Thank you Athletes...Parents   and  Coaches.  

CIRCUS NEWS BUZZ

*  Flying Circus  is now closed  for the next 6 weeks.  This is now  a rest/recovery period from actual vaulting.  The next 6 weeks  are devoted  to INCREASING HORSEPOWER. Lifting,Plyometrics.Flexability,Speed,Swimming  and  Cross Fit  training routines.  Make  Every Day Count in this Foundation  Period.
  *  Flying Circus FALL BASE PERIODATION  begins  September 7 thru Nov. 1...... BE FIT... STRONG   and  FAST.  We open  every Wednesday Evening  and Every Sunday for all Beginners Classes..Intermediate  Classes    and Elite Classes  this Fall.   You will be ready for competition  this Indoor season.   Stay tuned  to our  web site  for all Classes...Fall meets....Activities.  (www.hvflyingcircus.com)
  * All  Instructional  Fees  remain  the  same  this  coming year.  HOORAY   !!!!!        OPEN GROUP SESSIONS.... $30 per athlete (90 minutes)  Pay -at-the-Door Only.        PRIVATE SESSIONS.............. $75 per athlete(90 minutes)  Pay -at-the-Door Only.        SEMI-PRIVATE SESSIONS (2-4 athletes)...$50 per athlete(90 minutes)  Pay-at-the-Door Only.        FALL  SEASON / WINTER  MINI  POLE VAULT MEETS......  $30 per athlete.... Pay-at-the-Door Only.        WINTER POLE VAULT CLUB...3 Months(Nov-Dec-Jan)  2 Days  per week Sessions... $450 per athlete.  Pay in Advance...Limited  to  30 Girls(T-TH)  and  30 Boys(M-Wed).        SUMMER POLE VAULT  CAMPS....   $295 Per athlete (T-Shirt & Booklet)  .. Limit   40 Boys  -  40 Girls.
   *  SORENSEN CONSULTING  POLE RENTAL  CHANGES   for this  coming year.        We will be renting ONLY  UCS Spirit   and ALTIS Vaulting poles  for  this  coming year. We NO LONGER RENT ESSX POLES...as   we now  will be   instructing with them  this  year and  not  renting  them. We will be SELLING ESSX POLE VAULTING POLES AGAIN THIS YEAR to all our  clients/athletes at  the lowest prices   ever!!!! Put  you new pole  order in EARLY  !!!!!     *  NEW THIS YEAR......  We will be carrying ESSX poles   to the meets  we attend ONLY. Any athlete can RENT A POLE AT THAT MEET ONLY  for jusy $25.  Those poles  will return  to our facility after that meet  to help service  our  classes the next day. This is the new  normal  for most Pole Vault Clubs now in USA.   BUY YOUR ESSX POLES EARLY THIS FALL !!!!!
  *   HUGE CAMP RESULTS...... NEW RECORDS...NEW FUN.......   Winner of the Steel Pole Competition  was Nick Villauenueva(Monroe,NY)  with his  13' 0"  clear for   the  T-Shirt !!!! Best Long Jump   contest  winners  were Michael Croke(Fordham Prep)  19' 7.5"   and Nick Villauenueva(Monroe)  at 19' 7.5" !!!!!   "Highest HS Girl in the Sky"---Paige Martin(Norwich,CT)   13'+ .... "Highest HS Boy in the Clouds"----Shane Racey(Ravena,NY)  17' 1".......  "High-Flyer-College"---- Dane Sorensen( Warwick,NY)  17' 1" ....    "Best Socks"---- Andy Cimino(Warwick,NY)   " Best Cartwheels"---Mallory Malz(Glastonbery,CT)  !!!!!!!!!
   CHECK WEB SITE  for all   Summer and Fall  Up-Dates   www.hvflyingcircus.com
   FLYING CIRCUS......."JOIN-the-MOVEMENT"

posts.Title: RACHEL VENTER (Warwick Valley,NY)......  NEW 7th Grade NEW YORK STATE OUTDOOR RECORD 10' 3"  !!!!
posts.Content:
The FLYING CIRCUS Pole Vault Adventure, LLC  Warwick's  'Golden Valley' , New York


  July 29, 2020 FLYING CIRCUS SUMMER  TWILIGHT POLE VAULT  Series  Meet #5


 "Let~~the~~Good~~Times~~Roll" .......  Pole Vault fun and friendship was the theme @ Circus Meet #5 on Wednesday night on the outdoor runways for  the 12 athletes still seeking the   elusive bar. The conditions  were perfect and  the sunset framed  the motivated young athletes on fiberglass.  Using her  12' x 110-115 ESSX  series to the max  was   Rachel Venter of Warwick Valley Middle School. Coming off two sensational  summer camps  at Flying Circus  and Coach Pat Manson's Colorado camp... she added  a NEW 7th GRADE NY STATE CLASS RECORD  of 10' 3" to the  All-Time books. Using her 8 step approach and  coached by Stephanie Duffy  and Dane Sorensenall the way to history. She had  one close bar at 10' 9" and  will finish her season with club mates  at Vault Factory meet(Aug.1)   and the Vertical Adventures Atlantic City Beach Vault(Aug. 8).  The old 7th Grade record  was held by super-star..Karmen Auble of Warsaw Central,NY  from  2009.She will again be on Coach Mike Potters Purple Wave of Champions team this  winter.


  Taking gold was Rising Senior  ..Randi Conroy of Highlands,NJ...coached  by Bob Sorensen....with her big air sail over 10' 9" from short run   and top New York girl  was Jules Gravier(Bronxville,NY)  at 10' 9"  Top  Open Women  was   Camp staffer... Jessica Ipolito of Fair Lawn,NJ  at 11' 3"   and Top HS Boy was  mike Carey (Washingtonville,NY)   at 11' 3". CONGRATULATIONS  to all Flyers    and  Meet Volunteers...JulieKay Christian,Stephanie Duffy,Dane Sorensen,Brian Smith   and Bob Sorensen.  Complete Results below.


Girls Division:   1-Randi Conroy(Highland,NJ)  10' 9"   2-Jules Gravier(Bronxville,NY) 10' 9"   3T-Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley.NY)  10' 3"   3T-Samantha Smith(Syosset,NY)  10' 3"   5-Isabella Gray(Union,NJ)  9' 9"  6-Sophia Mirecki(Washingtonville,NY)  9' 9"  7-Michelle Lee(Demarest,NJ)  9' 9"   8- Sandra Capani(Island Express,NY)  7' 9"  Sisi Diaz-NH  Ella Galloway-DNSWomens Open Division:   1-Jessica Ippolito(Fair Lawn,NJ)   11' 3"Boys Division:    1-Mike Carey(Washingtonville,NY)  11' 3"
 

FLYING CIRCUS ......"TWICE~the~SPEED"

posts.Title: RACHEL VENTER AGAIN !!!! 10' 4" Today @ Vault Factory Meet!!!! New State Class Record !!!!
posts.Content:
The FLYING CIRCUS ADVENTURE ....    Warwick Valley,NY

    FLYING CIRCUS  Head Coach.....Stephanie Duffy.....  rounded  up the  'Summer Fiber-Kids' and  headed  to Basking Ridge,NJ  for Carl Palumbo's  VAULT FACTORY Meet today under  hot  and humid conditions....and produced   SUPER RESULTS  from all five athletes...including   3  New All-Time  Personal Bests in the packed  and loaded   fields.  Two  runways  blasting   the music and   super  sportsmanship carried  the  day..... as 7th Grader..Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley,NY)  raised  her  State Class Record  to 10' 4" and  close bars  at 10'10" on her  bigger poles.  Syosset,NY Sophomore  Smantha Smith  leaped  big with her  10' 4"PR for  the Circus   and  up-and-coming Michelle Lee(NV-Demarest,NJ)   flew  9'10" PR  for  the Nordsman of Coach Mike Ives. Aileen Hogan  (Long Island Express)  flew  8'10"   and Sandra Capani(Long Island) 7'9" !!!!!


  The  final  summer meet will be  next weekend(Aug.8-9)  at Atlantic City Beach Vault...with  18 Circus Athletes  taking  to the runways  on the beach. Coach Duffy   and Coach Sorensens
will be on hand  to do all the  coaching  and  story telling. Pole Rentals  at the meet is  just $25 per athlete. Be  sure to connect  with them to have  your  rental pole there at the meet.
 **   Mrs. Meyer.... always  told us ........ " Be Kind  to Each Other ".

Warwick Valley, NY

The Final  Meet of the  Summer... was .... perhaps  the  best of all !!!
CONGRATULATIONS  to all athletes......parents   and Traveling Coaches  Stephanie Duffy   and  Bob & Dane Sorensen for keeping the  Circus Torch burning bright  at Vertical AdventuresBeach Vault   this weekend.   Under  clear  skies   and  hoy temps... the  FLYIN' CIRCUS  Crew  came  thru  again in the shadows  of world famous  BALLY"S Resort  Beach.The  Circus   produced   22 awesome TEAM ATHLETES... cheering  for each other all day long ...sharing poles   and encouraging in the true  spirit of the pole vault. ...
  

8 Personal Bests.... 2  school records.... 3 Divisional  Wins... and  1 New State Class Record was the final total for  the Flying Circus Summer crew. Special THANK YOU   to Stephanie...Bob   and Dane  for   creating  this  friendship  thru athletics   event.
 

NOW.. It's   time  to create  HORSEPOWER  and STRENGTH for the next 4 Weeks. We   Re-Open the  first week of September for the Base Foundation Vault Program  for  this   coming Indoor  Pole Vault Season.
 

Full Results...   Aug. 8-9  Beach Vault  Atlantic City,NJ
 High School Boys Division:   1-Connor Reilly(Scotch Plains,NJ)  15' 0"   4-Matt Bigelow(Weston,CT)  14' 0" Girls Novice A Division:  1-Michelle Lee(Demarest,NJ)  10' 0"   Aileen Hoban(Smithtown,NY) 7'6"   Jayden Beck(minisink,NY)  8' 0" College Division:      1-Dane Sorensen(Warwick,NY)   15' 6" (5 Step) Open Women Division:   4-Samantha Smith(Syosset,NY)  11' 0"   School Record!!!   5T-Rachel Venter(Warwick Valley,NY)  10' 6'  New NY State 7th Grade  Record!! Girls Novice B(Saturday) Division:  4-Samantha Smith(Syosset,NY)  10' 6"PR  Liam Conroy(Highlands,NJ)  10' 0"  Rachel venter (Warwick Valley,NY) 9' 6"  Rachel Mason(High Point,NJ)  9' 6"High School Girls Division:   7-Randi Conroy(Highlands,NJ)  10' 6"  Ellie Lemler(West Point,NY)  10' 0"   Sophie Mirecki(Wash'ville,NY) 10' 0"Jules  Gravier(Bronxville,NY)  10' 0"  Mallory Malz(Glastonbury,CT)  10' 0" Jordan Hecker(Demarest,NJ)  9'6"   Isabella Gray(Union,NJ)  9'6"
  Enjoy your  summer...... See you all in September.

posts.Title: "READY-to-FLY" ..... Flying Circus FALL VAULT Schedule.
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Club, LLC        Warwick Valley, NY

WELCOME  to  the FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT SQUAD !!!!     

Our Pole Vault Staff is ready and  excited to develop your Talents and  your Confidence  this Fall Season with Progressive  Pole Vault Techniques and  Drills  for   every level        athlete. We have deep cleaned our facility and will be following all New York State Covid Safety Guilelines ....including...  Individual Temprature  monitoring every session...       disinfecting  shared equipment   every day.....social distancing in outside   activities   and  mask wearing  on indoor  activities in open sessions. We will be limiting the size of        of our Open Group participants.... with  spectators,parents,siblings remaining outside the Barn during  all Indoor Instruction sessions  to help Flatten-the-Covid Curve and Prevent        the Spread.  All athletes   should be  on time during drop-off  and pick up.  There will be  30 minute  safety pause between sessions  to prevent close  contact.
   

SCHEDULE.... COVID WAIVER FORMS......PRICES.....  CLUB POLE VAULT MEETS     

FALL SCHEDULE  
(Sept. 9- Nov. 4)   8 Weeks       
Every Wednesday Evening
(Beginning Sept.9)

5:01pm-6:31pm    
Cost-$30/Athlete At-the-Door

7:01pm-8:31pm    
Cost-$30/Athlete At-the-Door
Every Sunday (Beginning Sept.13)

10:31am-12:01pm   Cost-$30/Athlete At-the-Door                                                                         

INTERMEDIATE / ELITE GIRLS  
 12:31pm-2:01pm
Cost-$30/Athlete At-the-Door

2:31pm-4:01pm        
Cost-$30/Athlete  At-the-Door

3 Athletes..... $40 / Athlete ........ for 90 Minute Instruction

COVID WAIVER FORMS 
Covid Safety Waiver Forms  will be necessary for  all athletes participating in  any activies at Flying Circus.   Must be  signed  by parent/Guardian to participant. 

Forms are available here on the web  and  At-the-Door.
           

CLUB POLE VAULT MEETS @ CIRCUS         
We will be providing more Circus Pole Vault Meets this year...due  to the uncertain  availability of meets   this  winter. These  will be  small meets and ability            scheduled  (Beginner Meets.....Intermediate Level Meets...Elite Meets)    Cost Increase  to $40 / Athlete.   Meets  Begin early October.  Stay Tuned.
           

INDOOR WINTER POLE VAULT CLUB  TRAINING  PACKAGE. 
With our Indoor Winter Club Training Package  # 1...this year... we  will be reducing the number of participants per session for safety  purposes. The   10 week Training package             will still be   2  Vault Training Sessions per week  for  10 weeks..Beginning  November 9 ,2020  thru  January  18, 2021. Very Limited Numbers -  Cost-$525 / Athlete.  This            Training Package sells out very fast   every year.   Sign Up EARLY to secure  your  spot... Forms available on web site  October  1.
                       

MANY THANKS in ADVANCE for all your LOYAL SUPPORT of our  activities.
           Coach St....Coach Duffy....Coach Sorensen......Coach Ceoli.... Coach Pasek

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS NEWS
posts.Content:
FLYING CIRCUS NEWS

The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Club   
Warwick Valley, NY

 It's time  to RE-FUEL your  Spirit and  Physical  Pole Vault Engine. 

CONGRATULATIONS  on your successful opening this week  at  Flying Circus  Fall  Pole Vault.  Your  spirit is leading   your work  and  we believe in the  "NO LIMITS"  theory.  Our  job here  at Circus  is  to develop  CONFIDENT ATHLETES.  This is the  way  to your  success this  season.   Consistant Training routines......Dedicated attitudes    and   the  pledging  to  reach  for the  Joy-of-Self-Movement.  

It's  YOUR TIME NOW...  DON'T  BLINK !!!!

  This Fall Prep  work is the KEY  for  your successful  INDOOR  SEASON ahead.  Only the  dedicated  athletes will prepare themselves..... only  1  athlete out of  10 .... will really  dig  down  deep  this fall  with intelligent and daily  training for  the "BIG DANCE of COMPETITION".  ARE YOU THAT ONE-in-TEN ???????????     The body can never go.... where the mind  has never been.   Let's  get  BIG in our  focus   and training routines. Your   athletic  careers  last  a very  short  time.... many athletes   can TRAIN HARDER.... TRAIN SMARTER....   and  TRAIN-with-MORE PASSION.   NOW is YOUR TIME in the  Athletic Spot Light.   GO FOR IT.... NOW.Write  your  GOALS   and DREAMS in your  small Training Journal.....  Double  your  EFFORTS in TRAINING..... SEEK MASTERY...Not just  put in time.  MAKE TRAINING A PRIORTY.

TRAINING MICRO-CYCLES  are  21 days each.Each NEW CYCLE is built  on the previous  work cycle.  This is how  your  build  your ATHLETIC FOUNDATION.A missed  training   CAN NOT be  made up.... It is a lost opportunity in your development.You must  move the weights  3  Days  per  week  for real strength to be acheived.You must  commit  to Run Fitness  and Run Mechanics  2 Days  per  week.You must   schedule yourself  to 2-3  Pole Vault Technical Days per week.You must  buy into  the DRILLS PROGRAM...the WARM UP PROGRAM   and the SMALL JUMP DAYS PROGRAM .You  must   concentrate  on eating right...  eating healthy...    and  sleep recovery increases each day.You must  support   your team mates at  every opportunity......   'as  you give...so shall you receive.'You  must start to  DREAM BIGGER  ......  WHAT DO YOU DREAM TONIGHT ???????

 ACTION CHANGES THINGS.      MOTIVATION  is the NAME-of-the-GAME.      START YOUR ENGINE TODAY. 

 * Mark  your  Calender.... We will be hosting  an IN-HOUSE  Only...(Flying Circus Athletes Only )  MINI-MEET.S  Small Groups.  See below  for  first Meet.           Friday Night  October 16        5 :01pm GIRLS  MEET Beginner/Intermediate Meet  ( Girls PR of 9' 0"   and Under)  Bar opens  at 6' 0" ....Cost $40/athlete.                                                  7:31pm  GIRLS MEET Intermediate/Elite  (Girls PR of  9'6" and Up)   Bar opens at 8' 6" .....Cost $40/athlete   Saturday  October  17            10:01am  BOYS MEET Beginner/Intermediate Meet (Boys PR of 10' 6"  and Under)   Bar opens  at 7' 0"  ... Cost $40/athlete                                                   1:01pm  BOYS MEET  Intermediate/Elite Meet  (Boys PR of 11' 0"  and Up)    Bar Opens  at 10' 0"  ... Cost $40/athlete

OPEN FALL SCHEDULE  ($30/athlete Walk-In)  Wednesday Evenings... Boys  at 5-6:30pm    Girls  at 7-8:30pm
 Sundays ...Beginners- 10:31am-12:01pm        Girls Int/Elite  12:31-2:01pm           Boys Int/Elite   2:31-4:01pm
  FLYING CIRCUS ...." I will getready...and then perhaps...my chance will come."

posts.Title: "FLY-the-CIRCUS" .... NEWS WINTER CLUB ALERT / SUNDAY OPEN SESSIONS OCT. 11  CANCELLED
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Club, LLC
USATF Club #  06-1129
 

Welcome Circus Vaulters   and  NEW CLUB MEMBERS !!!!!!!    Our  Fall Training programs   are up  and thriving  and our   Covid Safety  protocols  are  being followed. Thank you  all  for helping  'FLATTEN the  CURVE' and keeping  SAFETY FIRST  at our  club.    We are  all still using our outdoor  pits   and  runways to the max with all  classes...but we  will soon be moving indoors   for our private   and  open club  groups and there  will be restrictions   to  our  Indoor Instruction.  Class  size   with  be  reduced in our Open  Sunday Sessions (12 Vaulters/Session)  and our INDOOR WINTER CLUB(Nov.  7- January  21)  12 Vaulters per Session. During all indoor  sessions, we  will limit access to facility  to ATHLETES ONLY.   No Parents,Spectators,Siblings allowed  inside  during  the  session.  This  safety measure  also applies  to all Club Pole Vault Meets Inside  this  winter at Flying Circus.  Face Covering  MUST BE WORE by Staff   and Athletes on Indoor Facility use.


WINTER CLUB TRAINING PACKAGE  ALERT . 
This   coming Winter  we  have  cut back and reduced our WINTER POLE VAULT TRAINING PACKAGE. We  will be  reduced  to the  first  24 Boys    and first  24  girls who register with full payment for the  full 10 week training instruction. All other vaulters not making this group  will have  to be in our Sunday Open Reduced  Sessions(12 athletes  per  session). Athletes who  are in the  Winter Training Package  will not  be in the Sunday Open Sessions. We are attempting  to accomendate    everyone   with this set-up.    Applications   for Winter Club Training Package  will be  at our  web site (www.hvflyingcircus.com) on Oct. 1... Download  the  form   and  send  with full  payment  IMMENDIATELY ...as  we  sell out  every year in  24 hours.!!!!!!!!  FIRST REGISTERED / FIRST SERVED .    Check  for WINTER TRAINING PACKAGE  is   $525  ( Still the  cheapeast Pole Vault  Training in U.S.A. !!! ) ... Payable  to HV FLYING CIRCUS .   Thank you  for  supporting our  club activities.


WEDNESDAY NIGHT OPEN SESSION
These  pole vault sessions  have been FANTASTIC this fall.  Many vaulters are  exploding  now in these  sessions.  We have only 5 more Wednesday Night Open Sessions  before   we  end this instruction  on Nov. 4.  If raining/snow prevents outdoor   vaulting.. we  take  the  first  12 vaulters  to register at the table  to vault inside.   Arrive  early  to secure  your  spot in the open Session.
 
SUNDAY OPEN SESSIONS
These   Open Sunday  Sessions are breathtaking... with   new talent arriving   every Sunday in our Beginners  classes...   " Rising Stars"  from  5  different  states  in our  Intermediate  and Elite  Sessions   and    a  Coaching Staff of  6  GREAT  POSITIVE TEACHERS   showing the way to "FLYING"  to the next generation.   SUNDAY SESSIONS  are  also  restricted  to the First 12 athletes  to register at the  table  every session.  Sunday Open Sessions    will  be   ending on  MARCH  21   this  year to clear the  weekends  for  all staff members.  This  Open Sunday will be replaced  with a  day of  the week Open Sessions TBA.

IT'S TIME TO BUY YOUR OWN  ESSX  VAULTING POLES. 
 With the  Indoor  season  about to begin  this December... it is   the time  now  to purchase  your own  vaulting equipment.  Coach Bob Sorensen  from Sorensen Counsulting, LLC is the man to  contact (  Phone~  914-557-1458  /     e-mail bsoren29@optonline.net ) to get the poles  you need  now...as  we will not be renting  any of our  ESSX POLE VAULTING  stock this year.  These  poles  are for  club use  at our facility ONLY.  We do rent  UCS Spirit...Altis   and Pacer   vaulting poles for  seasonal use.  Contact   Bob Sorensen ( 914-557-1458) for pricing   and  deatils.  Act NOW.... Poles  take  21 days  to arrive.!!!!!
   FLYING CIRCUS..... Be   a  HERE   and NOW  athlete.

posts.Title: CIRCUS WINTER CLUB ~~~ SOLD OUT !!!!   THANK YOU !!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Project, LLC   Warwick Valley, NY


   THANK YOU   ALL  POLE VAULT FAMILY !!!    Our 2020-21 WINTER POLE VAULT  TRAINING PACKAGE is  now  SOLD OUT   and  we look forward  to hosting  you   this  winter in our   smaller groups  of training.  Due  to safety protocols  ,  we  have  cut our indoor   Winter  Training team this year and we  have  establised   a  WAIT LIST  to all  other athletes  not  making  the weekday training package.. We will still be  able  to service all others on our Open Sunday Schedule this  winter  , with the  first 12  athletes arriving in  the Sunday three sessions.  Stay Safe    and  hope  to  see you all soon.
   *   FINAL LIST of Class  Placements   coming   to all Winter Club  Members.  Not all athletes received  their  first  choice  of  day  and  time slot. We have  balanced our classes  for  our  6  step runway   and  8 step runway  in each session.   *   FACE COVERINGS  WILL BE MANDATORY  in ALL WINTER CLASSES INSIDE OUR FACILITY.  THERE WILL BE NO PARENTS  or SPECTATORS ALLOWED INSIDE DURING CLASSES.  There will be   a  30 minute break between  classes for  athletes  to  come  and  go immediately  after thier  session to prevent overload  and safety numbers.   *   ATHLETES MAY NOT SWITCH CLASSES.   A MISSED CLASS IS NOT MADE UP.   *   We will be CLOSED  for Sunday  October 11, 2020  for COLUMBUS DAY WEEKEND.   *   ESSX NEW POLE ORDERS are Due  to Coach  Sorensen (Phone  914-557-1458)   by Friday  October  9  to  SAVE SHIPPING COSTS!!!!!!!!!!
   FLYING CIRCUS........   " BE-A-PART-OF-THE-MAGIC. "

posts.Title: FLYING CIRCUS NEW GEAR FUND-RAISER  !!!!!   JOIN  IN !!!!!!
posts.Content:
The Hudson Valley Flying Circus Pole Vault Blast 
 Warwick Valley, NY


    IT'S TIME FOR SOME   'NEW CIRCUS  GEAR"......    This year's New Fund Raiser is happening  now   and  we invite  all out Circus  Family to join in the  fun of  "New  Circus Gear"  !!!!       Thanks  to Circus Coach Rob Pasek for taking on this  exciting project  to increase our  brand and reach .  This  fun raiser is  designed   to purchase  more  vaulting poles   for  our  125 club members  this   coming year.   This project  ends  in just  three weeks(November 6, 2020)..... so...  don't  delay... order  direct any and all gear listed  on the link  below   and all payment  and orders go direct  to  your house....    DIRECT PURCHASE  ON LINE   and DIRECT DELIVERY  TO YOU HOUSE !!!!!!!!!!      LET"S GEAR- UP TOGETHER !!!!!!!!  Many Thanks !!!
 New Gear Apparel Store Link ....      https://fancloth.shop/A3YAW

CIRCUS  POP-UP FUN MEETS 

Our first POP-UP FUN MEETS  start up next week  for  all Intermediate  and Advanced  Circus Vault   Training Groups. These   are Level 2 Vault  Groups (Boys PR  10' "0"   and Up //  Girls PR  9' 6"  and Up)   Beginner  Groups(Level 1) will be  coming  in December.  Meets will be on 2 Runways    and hopefully all outdoors if  weather permits. Cost is $40 per athlete...Checks perferred payable  to  HV Flying Circus,LLC .   Spectators,Parents cane  view  meets if outdoors... If  meets  move  to Indoor facility... No Spectators/Parents allowed   into facility  for Covid Safety protocols. Temperatures checks  at  check in  and  social distancing outdoors   and Face Coverings   by all staff  and athletes indoors.  Join us next week for  some pre-season FUN.  Circus Club members ONLY in MS  and HS levels.
     Girls Level 2  and Level 3 Fun Meet... Friday  October 16, 2020..Registration/Warm Up  at 4:45pm    2 Runways.... Bar goes up at 5:31pm   at  9' 1" !!!! Cost $40/athlete
    Boys Level 2   and Level 3  Fun Meet... Sunday  October  18, 2020..Registration/Warm Up  at 2:10pm   2 Runways...Bar goes up  ay 2:45pm  at  9' 1" (Runway A)  and   12' 1" (Runway B)  Cost $40/athlete
     Indoor    Staff Helping  with Meet Scoring,Bar  standards,Bar placement... ...  Bob Mason,Brian Smith,Bob Sorensen,Rob Pasek,Julie Christian 
        FLY-the-CIRCUS  .........

posts.Title: CIRCUS POP-UP MEET #1 ~~~~~~ SAMANTHA SMITH Soars 11' 7" School Record // AIDAN O'CONNOR Flies 15' 1.25!!!!!!!!!!!!!
